Name: Asus PRIME B650M-A WIFI II, AMD B650, AM5, Micro ATX, 4 DDR5, VGA, HDMI, DP, Wi-Fi 6, 2.5G LAN, PCIe4, 2x M.2
Description: AMD B650 Micro-ATX motherboard with DDR5, PCIe 5.0 M.2 support, Realtek 2.5Gb Ethernet, Wi-Fi 6, DisplayPort, VGA, HDMI, and comprehensive cooling solutions.

Name: Trust TK-350 Wireless Membrane Keyboard, Spill-Proof, Silent Keys, Media Keys, Black
Description: Wireless and Silent Keyboard for Hours of Working Comfort. Features silent keys, wrist support, 13 media keys, and a lifespan of 10 million keystrokes. Compatible with Windows 10/11, Mac OS X (10.15 or newer), and Chrome OS.

Name: Kingston 8GB, DDR4, 3200MHz (PC4-25600), CL22, DIMM Memory
Description: ValueRAM's KVR32N22S8/8 is a 1G x 64-bit (8GB) DDR4-3200 CL22 SDRAM memory module, featuring a timing of 22-22-22 at 1.2V. Each 288-pin DIMM uses gold contact fingers and is RoHS Compliant and Halogen-Free.

Name: Asus 1200W ROG Thor Platinum II PSU, Double Ball Bearing Fan, Fully Modular, 80+ Platinum, RGB Lighting, OLED Display, PCIe 5.0, Lambda A++
Description: ROG Thor 1200W Platinum II is the quietest PSU in its class, featuring Lambda A++ Certification, 80 Plus Platinum efficiency, and an OLED display for real-time power monitoring. Built with premium components and a 135mm Axial-tech fan for optimal cooling and noise reduction.

Name: Kingston 1TB NV2 M.2 NVMe SSD, M.2 2280, PCIe4, R/W 3500/2100 MB/s
Description: Kingston’s NV2 PCIe 4.0 NVMe SSD is a substantial next-gen storage solution delivering ultra fast read/write speeds with lower power requirements. The compact M.2 2280 design expands storage while saving space, making it ideal for thinner notebooks and small-form-factor systems.

Name: ADATA Premier 8B, DDR5, 4800MHz (PC5-38400), CL40, 1.1V, ECC, SODIMM Memory
Description: The future of DRAM is here in the form of the ADATA DDR5-4800 SO-DIMM module. Compared to its predecessors, this module provides a significant speed boost, higher capacities, reduced power consumption, and increased bandwidth per CPU core. High speed up to 4800MHz, built-in Power Management IC, On-Die Error Correcting Code, improved stability, supports Intel® Core™ 12th series CPU.

Name: WD 3.5", 2TB, SATA3, Purple Surveillance Hard Drive, 64MB Cache, OEM
Description: WD Purple™ drives are engineered specifically for surveillance to withstand elevated heat fluctuations and equipment vibrations. They provide reliable, surveillance-class storage tested for compatibility in various security systems, featuring AllFrame™ technology to reduce frame loss and improve video playback.

Name: Be Quiet! Pure Base 500 Gaming Case with Window, ATX, No PSU, 2 x Pure Wings 2 Fans, PSU Shroud, Black
Description: be quiet! Pure Base 500 Window Black combines customizable and silence features with a compact and sophisticated design. It includes two preinstalled Pure Wings 2 fans, insulation mats for noise dampening, and is water cooling ready for radiators of up to 360mm.

Name: Corsair Vengeance LPX 32GB Kit (2 x 16GB), DDR4, 3200MHz (PC4-25600), CL16, XMP 2.0, Ryzen Optimised, DIMM Memory
Description: VENGEANCE LPX memory is designed for high-performance overclocking with a pure aluminum heatspreader for faster heat dissipation. Each module is built from a custom performance PCB and highly-screened memory ICs, ensuring reliable performance and compatibility.

Name: Arctic Freezer 4U-M Multicompatible 4U Single Tower CPU Cooler, Intel/AMD Server CPUs, Continuous Operation, Dual Socket Compatibility, 350W TDP
Description: Versatile Multi-Compatible Server Cooler. The Freezer 4U-M stands as a multi-compatible server cooler, boasting an expansive contact surface and an enhanced mounting mechanism. It offers compatibility with a wide range of Intel and AMD server processors, ensuring exceptional efficiency in cooling even the most powerful processors with up to 64 cores and a TDP of up to 350 watts.

Name: AMD Ryzen 3 3200G CPU with Wraith Stealth Cooler, Quad Core, AM4, 3.6GHz (4.0 Turbo), 65W, 12nm, 3rd Gen, VEGA 8 Graphics, Picasso
Description: The Power to Play. Fully Unlocked. The AMD Ryzen 3 3200G processor includes 4 CPU Cores with a base clock of 3.6GHz that can be boosted to 4GHz. Designed with integrated Radeon RX Vega 8 Graphics, it supports DDR4 Memory and is compatible with AM4 motherboards.

Name: Adata SC610 1TB Pocket Size External SSD, USB 3.2 Gen2 Type-A, Capless Retractable Design, Key Ring
Description: The external SSD has shrunk! The SC610 flash drive features USB 3.2 Gen2 transmission speed with read/write as high as 550/500MB per second. Its Type-A interface is compatible with a variety of computers. Capless slide-out design, cutout for key rings and backpack accessories.

Name: Netac 512GB SA500 SSD, 2.5", SATA3, 3D QLC NAND, R/W 520/450 MB/s, 7mm
Description: High Performance SSD Solution with 3D NAND Flash for larger capacity, durability, and excellent performance. Supports S.M.A.R.T., TRIM Command, and NCQ.

Name: Asus ROG Ryuo III 360 ARGB 360mm Liquid CPU Cooler, 8th Gen Asetek Pump, 3 x ARGB Fans, Anime Matrix LED Display, White Edition
Description: ROG Ryuo III 360 all-in-one CPU liquid cooler with Asetek 8th gen pump, Anime Matrix LED display, and ROG ARGB fans for optimal cooling performance.

Name: Corsair Vengeance RGB RT 32GB Memory Kit (2 x 16GB), DDR4, 3600MHz (PC4-28800), CL18, XMP 2.0, 10 LEDs, AMD Optimised, White
Description: CORSAIR VENGEANCE RGB RT DDR4 memory enhances your PC’s aesthetics while delivering outstanding performance optimized for AMD systems. Each module features ten individually addressable RGB LEDs for brilliant illumination and a dual-tone heatspreader for effective cooling. VENGEANCE RGB RT automatically configures to maximum system speeds for faster load times and smoother multitasking. Customize RGB lighting with CORSAIR iCUE software to match your setup and synchronize with all iCUE-compatible devices.

Name: Asrock Z790 PG LIGHTNING/D4, Intel Z790, 1700, ATX, 4 DDR4, HDMI, eDP, 2.5G LAN, PCIe5, 4x M.2
Description: Z790 PG Lightning/D4 supports 13th Gen & 12th Gen Intel® Core™ Processors with a 14+1+1 Phase Power Design. It features 4 x DDR4 DIMMs, PCIe 5.0, HDMI, and 2.5G LAN.

Name: Corsair Vengeance LPX 16GB Kit (2 x 8GB), DDR4, 3000MHz (PC4-24000), CL16, XMP 2.0, DIMM Memory
Description: VENGEANCE LPX memory is designed for high-performance overclocking. The heatspreader is made of pure aluminum for faster heat dissipation, and the custom performance PCB helps manage heat and provides superior overclocking headroom. Each IC is individually screened for peak performance potential.

Name: Asus TUF GAMING K1 RGB Keyboard with Volume Knob, 19-key Rollover, Side Light Bar & Armoury Crate, Spill Resistant, Detachable Wrist Rest
Description: ASUS TUF Gaming K1 RGB keyboard features a dedicated volume knob, spill-resistance, side light bar, and Armoury Crate for customizable controls. It offers tactile switches with 19-key rollover for responsive performance and dynamic RGB lighting effects.

Name: Asus PRO Q670M-C-CSM - Corporate Stable Model, Intel Q670, 1700, Micro ATX, 4 DDR5, HDMI, 2 DP, GB LAN, PCIe4, 2x M.2
Description: Micro-ATX Q670 business motherboard with Intel® vPro support, enhanced security, reliability, and manageability. Ready for 12th Gen Intel Core™ processors, featuring ASUS Control Center Express for IT management and comprehensive system protection.

Name: Arctic Alpine 17 Compact Heatsink & Fan, Intel 1700,  Fluid Dynamic Bearing, 95W TDP
Description: Compact Intel CPU Cooler designed for Intel Alder Lake. The Alpine 17 is exclusively compatible with Socket LGA1700 and features a wide PWM-controlled speed range for minimal noise and maximum cooling performance. Easy tool-free installation with pre-applied MX-4 thermal paste. High-quality fluid dynamic bearing for extended fan life and improved cooling performance through innovative heat sink design.

Name: Corsair Vengeance 32GB Kit (2 x 16GB), DDR5, 5600MHz (PC5-44800), CL36, 1.25V, PMIC, AMD Optimised, DIMM Memory
Description: Welcome to the cutting edge of performance with Corsair Vengeance DDR5 memory. Push the limits of your system with faster frequencies, greater capacities, and better performance. Features onboard voltage regulation for stable overclocking and custom AMD Expo profiles for tailored settings.

Name: Kingston 512GB KC600 SSD, 2.5", SATA3, 3D TLC NAND, R/W 550/520 MB/s, 7mm
Description: Kingston’s KC600 is a full capacity SSD designed to provide remarkable performance with read/write speeds up to 550/520MB/s. It features the latest 3D TLC NAND technology and supports a full-security suite including AES 256-bit hardware encryption, TCG Opal, and eDrive.

Name: Asus 15.6" Portable IPS Monitor (ZenScreen MB16ACE), 1920 x 1080, USB-C (USB-A adapter), USB-powered, Auto-rotatable, Smart Case Stand
Description: ASUS ZenScreen MB16ACE Portable USB Monitor features a 15.6-inch Full HD anti-glare IPS display with a hybrid-signal solution for USB Type-C and Type-A compatibility. It offers automatic screen orientation, a foldable smart case, and ASUS Eye Care technology for a comfortable viewing experience.

Name: Asus 27" TUF Gaming Monitor (VG279Q3A), 1920 x 1080, Fast IPS, 1ms, ELMB, 180Hz, Variable Overdrive, 99% sRGB, VESA
Description: TUF Gaming VG279Q3A Gaming Monitor - 27-inch, Full HD (1920x1080), 180Hz, Fast IPS, ELMB Sync, 1ms (GTG), FreeSync Premium, G-Sync compatible, Variable Overdrive, 99% sRGB.

Name: Hama Sonic Mobil 183 2.0 Notebook Speakers, 3.5 mm Jack, USB-A for Power, Inline Volume Controls
Description: Hama "Sonic Mobil 183" Notebook Speaker, black/red. Active 2.0 speaker for computers and notebooks with volume control for individual, continuous volume adjustment. Power is conveniently supplied via the USB connection.

Name: Palit RTX3050 DUAL V2, PCIe4, 8GB DDR6, DVI, HDMI, DP, 1777MHz Clock, RGB Lighting
Description: The GeForce RTX 3050 is built with the powerful graphics performance of the NVIDIA Ampere architecture. It offers dedicated 2nd gen RT Cores and 3rd gen Tensor Cores, new streaming multiprocessors, and high-speed G6 memory to tackle the latest games. The Palit GeForce RTX 3050 Dual Series features two 90mm big fans for efficient cooling performance, and customizable RGB lighting for gamers to enjoy minimalist lighting effects.

Name: Kingston 960GB SSDNow A400 SSD, 2.5", SATA3, R/W 500/450 MB/s, 7mm
Description: Incredible speeds plus rock-solid reliability. 10x faster than a HDD - With incredible read/write speeds the A400 SSD will not only increase performance but can also be used to breathe new life into older systems. Rugged - A400 is shock- and vibration-resistant for rugged reliability when used in notebooks and other mobile computing devices. Ideal for desktops and notebooks - A400 has a 7mm form factor to fit in a wider array of systems. It’s ideal for slimmer notebooks and in systems with limited available space.

Name: WD 3.5", 14TB, SATA3, Purple Pro Surveillance Hard Drive, 7200RPM, 512MB Cache, OEM
Description: Professional Grade Storage for Smart Video Recording and AI Video Analytics. WD Purple Pro delivers ultimate reliability and performance for demanding video recording and analytics environments. Engineered with advanced capabilities, it supports up to 32 AI streams and is optimized for up to 64 single-stream HD cameras.

Name: Asrock H370M-HDV, Intel H370, 1151, Micro ATX, 2 DDR4, VGA, DVI, HDMI

Name: Corsair A115 High-Performance Heatsink & Fan, Intel/AMD, 2x AF140 ELITE PWM Fans, 270W TDP

Two CORSAIR AF140 ELITE PWM fans provide concentrated airflow and quiet operation. Compatible with LGA 1700 and AM5 sockets, it includes pre-applied premium CORSAIR XTM70 thermal paste for optimal heat transfer.

Name: Asus DUAL RTX4060 EVO OC, PCIe4, 8GB DDR6, HDMI, 3 DP, 2535MHz Clock, Overclocked

Powered by NVIDIA DLSS3 and ultra-efficient Ada Lovelace architecture, it features a boost clock of 2535 MHz and advanced cooling solutions for optimal performance.

Name: Kingston 128GB USB 3.2 Gen1 Type-C Memory Pen, DataTraveler 70, Cap
Description: Kingston’s DataTraveler 70 is a portable and lightweight USB-C flash drive that features USB 3.2 Gen 1 speeds. It’s designed to be used with compatible USB-C devices such as notebooks, laptops, tablets, and phones. With a capacity of 128GB, it is perfect for expanding your storage for everyday use. Backed with a 5-year warranty and free tech support.

Name: Asus TUF GAMING A620M-PLUS, AMD A620, AM5, Micro ATX, 4 DDR5, HDMI, 2 DP, 2.5G LAN, PCIe4, 2x M.2
Description: ASUS TUF GAMING A620M-PLUS combines essential elements of AMD Ryzen 7000-series processors with game-ready features and proven durability. Engineered with military-grade components, it offers rock-solid performance for marathon gaming, comprehensive cooling, and upgraded power solutions.

Name: Kingston 64GB USB 3.2 Gen1 Memory Pen, DataTraveler Kyson, Metal Capless Design, R/W 200/60 MB/s
Description: Kingston’s DataTraveler® Kyson is a high-performance Type-A USB flash drive with extremely fast transfer speeds of up to 200MB/s Read and 60MB/s Write, allowing quick and convenient file transfers. The capless metal design will save you the trouble of losing a cap, and the functional loop makes it easy to take wherever you go.

Name: Kingston 500GB Fury Renegade M.2 NVMe SSD, M.2 2280, PCIe4, 3D TLC NAND, R/W 7300/3900 MB/s, 450K/900K IOPS, Aluminium Heatspreader, PS5 Compatible

With blazing speeds of up to 7300 MB/s read and 3900 MB/s write, it enhances overall system responsiveness.

Name: Asrock B550 STEEL LEGEND, AMD B550, AM4, ATX, 4 DDR4, HDMI, DP, XFire, 2.5GB LAN, PCIe4, RGB Lighting, M.2

Name: Asus 23.8" Frameless Eye Care Monitor (VA24DQSB), IPS, 1920 x 1080, 75Hz, VGA, HDMI, DP, USB Hub, VESA
Description: ASUS VA24DQSB Eye Care Monitor - 23.8 inch, Full HD, IPS, Frameless, 75Hz, Adaptive-Sync, Low Blue Light, Flicker Free, Ergonomic Design. Extensive connectivity options including HDMI, DisplayPort, D-sub, and USB hub for versatile use.

Name: Asus PRIME Z790-P WIFI, Intel Z790, 1700, ATX, 4 DDR5, HDMI, DP, Wi-Fi 6, 2.5G LAN, PCIe5, 3x M.2
Description: Boasting a robust power design, comprehensive cooling solutions, and intelligent tuning options, the PRIME Z790-P WIFI provides users and PC DIY builders with a range of performance optimizations via intuitive software and firmware features.

Name: ADATA 960GB Ultimate SU630 SSD, 2.5", SATA3, 7mm , QLC 3D NAND, R/W 520/450 MB/s, 65K IOPS
Description: Ultimate SU630 Solid State Drive with 960GB capacity, 3D QLC NAND Flash, and read/write speeds of up to 520/450 MB/s. Ideal for upgrading from HDD to SSD with features like LDPC ECC technology and SLC caching for improved performance.

Name: Fractal Design Ridge (White) SFF Console-Type Case, Mini ITX, Requires SFX/SFX-L PSU, 2 Fans, PCIe 4.0 Riser Card, USB-C, Horizontal/Vertical Orientation

Name: Corsair 1TB MP600 CORE XT M.2 NVMe SSD, M.2 2280, PCIe4, 3D QLC NAND, R/W 5000/3500 MB/s, 700K/900K IOPS
Description: The CORSAIR MP600 CORE XT provides great storage performance ideal for PCIe Gen4-compatible laptops and notebooks, achieving impressive sequential read and write speeds. High-density QLC NAND flash memory offers an ideal combination of performance and value. Contained in a compact M.2 2280 form factor and connecting over a high-speed NVMe 1.4 PCIe Gen4 x4 M.2 interface, the MP600 CORE XT is easy to install into a compatible motherboard and is backed by a five-year warranty.

Name: WD 3.5", 1TB, SATA3, Purple Surveillance Hard Drive, 5400RPM, 64MB Cache, OEM
Description: WD Purple™ drives are engineered specifically for surveillance to help withstand the elevated heat fluctuations and equipment vibrations within NVR environments. With an MTBF of up to 1 million hours, WD Purple™ drives are designed for mainstream surveillance DVRs and NVRs that operate 24/7.

Name: Asus ROG STRIX SCOPE II NX Snow Mechanical RGB Gaming Keyboard, ROG NX Snow Linear Switches, Sound Dampening, PBT Keycaps, Intuitive Controls
Description: ROG Strix Scope II gaming keyboard features pre-lubed ROG NX Snow mechanical switches, sound-dampening foam, PBT doubleshot keycaps, streaming hotkeys, and a detachable wrist rest for an enhanced gaming experience.

Name: Microsoft Surface Laptop 4, 13.5" Touchscreen, Ryzen 5 4680U, 8GB, 256GB SSD, Up to 19 Hours Run Time, USB-C, Backlit KB, Windows 10 Pro

Name: Asus PRO WS WRX80E-SAGE SE WIFI, Workstation, AMD WRX80, sWRX8, EATX, 8 DDR4, XFire/SLI, AX Wi-Fi, Dual 10G LAN, 3x M.2

Engineered for professional creative workloads, it supports multi-GPU configurations and features extensive connectivity options.

Name: Hama Sonic LS-206 2.0 Speaker System, 3.5 mm Jack, USB-A for Power, Backlit Volume Control
Description: Hama "Sonic LS-206" PC Speakers are 2.0 speakers for computers and notebooks, powered via USB port, featuring backlit volume control for individual, continuous volume adjustment. Frequency response ranges from 50 to 20000 Hz.

Name: Palit RTX4070 SUPER DUAL OC, 12GB DDR6X, HDMI, 3 DP, 2550MHz Clock, Overclocked, RGB Lighting
Description: The GeForce RTX 4070 SUPER Dual Series features a sleek black finish, dual 95mm fans for optimal cooling, and customizable RGB lighting. Powered by NVIDIA DLSS 3 and Ada Lovelace architecture, it delivers exceptional performance for gaming and creative tasks.

Name: ADATA 2TB Legend 800 M.2 NVMe SSD, M.2 2280, PCIe Gen4, 3D NAND, R/W 3500/2800 MB/s, No Heatsink
Description: ADATA 2TB Legend 800 SSD supports PCIe Gen4 x4 interface, offering excellent read speeds up to 3500MB/s and write speeds up to 2800MB/s. Ideal for high-performance computing and creative tasks.

Name: Arctic P12 Slim 12cm Pressure Optimised PWM PST Case Fan, Black, Fluid Dynamic, 300-2100 RPM
Description: Pressure-optimised 120 mm PWM fan with integrated Y-cable, ideal for small form factor builds. Optimised for static pressure, it guarantees efficient cooling even with increased air resistance. The new motor technology ensures maximum quietness and minimum vibration, extending the fan's lifespan to 10 years. Features a speed range of 300 to 2100 RPM regulated via PWM PST.

Name: Asus Mini PC PN51-S1 Barebone (PN51-S1-BB3277MD), Ryzen 3 5300U, DDR4 SO-DIMM, 2.5"/M.2, HDMI, DP, USB-C, 2.5G LAN, Wi-Fi6, VESA - No RAM, Storage or O/S

Name: Fractal Design Meshify 2 Compact RGB (Black TG) Gaming Case w/ Light Tint Glass Window, ATX, Angular Mesh Front, 4 RGB Fans, RGB Controller, USB-C
Description: The Meshify 2 Compact RGB is a high-performing case with a bold, stealth-inspired aesthetic. It features bolt-free, flush tempered glass, a fully removable top panel, and a front USB 3.1 Type-C port. The case supports GPUs up to 360 mm and includes 4 RGB fans for optimal cooling.

Name: Be Quiet! Shadow Base 800 FX RGB Gaming Case w/ Glass Window, E-ATX, ARGB Front Strips & Controller, 4x ARGB Fans & Hub, Mesh Airflow, USB-C, White
Description: Shadow Base 800 FX aims for users looking for an airflow optimized ARGB case roomy enough for extensive components. It features impressive ARGB illumination, exceptional airflow with an open mesh design, and includes 4 Light Wings 140mm PWM fans for high airflow and quiet operation.

Name: Adata SE880 2TB Pocket Size External SSD, USB 3.2 Gen2 Type-C/Type-A, Titanium Grey
Description: Adata SE880 2TB Pocket Size External SSD supports USB 3.2 Gen2 with performance up to 2000MB/s. Highly portable and compatible with new generation game consoles.

Name: Asus ROG Ryujin III 360 ARGB 360mm Liquid CPU Cooler, 3x ROG ARGB Fans, Customisable 3.5" LCD Display, New Control Software, Black
Description: Go cooler than cool with the Ryujin III. An expansive 3.5-inch LCD screen displays live system stats, animated GIFs, or your own custom artwork. The 8th Gen Asetek pump, paired with larger coolant tubes, keeps the latest processors from Intel and AMD cool, while an embedded Axial-tech fan helps control motherboard VRM temps. The radiator features three ROG 120 mm ARGB fans for enhanced cooling performance.

Name: Antec CX700 RGB Elite Gaming Case w/ Glass Side & Front, ATX, 6x RGB Fans, LED Button, USB-C, White
Description: Antec CX700 RGB Gaming Case features a panoramic 270° view with seamless 4mm tempered glass, tool-free panels for easy assembly, and bottom-up airflow for efficient cooling. It supports simultaneous installation of a 360mm radiator on top and a 240mm radiator on the side, ensuring optimal heat dissipation.

Name: Be Quiet! BK003 Shadow Rock TF2 Heatsink & Fan, Intel & AMD Sockets, Shadow Wings Fan, 160W TDP
Description: Shadow Rock TF 2 is the perfect cooler for systems that are restricted in terms of space. It doesn’t just cool the CPU, but also other components near to the socket. Thanks to the top-flow construction, the cooler transfers heat super-fast and generates better cooling efficiency. With an impressive compact cooling capacity of 160W TDP and a silence-optimized 135mm fan, it balances performance and quietness effectively.

Name: Corsair 3000D RGB Airflow Gaming Case w/ Glass Window, ATX, 3x AR120 RGB Fans, GPU Cooling, 3-Slot GPU Support, High-Airflow Front, White

The CORSAIR 3000D RGB AIRFLOW presents a mid-tower ATX chassis with an efficient high-airflow design, including three prefitted CORSAIR AR120 RGB fans that deliver outstanding cooling and vibrant lighting effects. The addition of a tempered glass side panel turns your computer into a showcase of cutting-edge PC technology.

Name: Arctic P14 14cm Pressure Optimised PWM PST Case Fan for Continuous Operation, Black, 9 Blades, Dual Ball Bearing, 200-1700 RPM
Description: Pressure-optimised 140 mm fan with PWM PST for continuous operation. Designed for high static pressure, it ensures efficient cooling even with increased air resistance, making it ideal for heatsinks and radiators.

Name: Arctic P14 14cm Pressure Optimised PWM Case Fan, White/Transparent, Fluid Dynamic, 200-1700 RPM
Description: Pressure-optimised 140 mm fan with PWM, designed for high static pressure and efficient cooling. Features a new generation motor for energy savings, low noise, and extended lifespan with a 10-year warranty. Regulated RPM from 200 to 1700 via PWM for optimal performance.

Name: Corsair 3500X ARGB Gaming Case w/ Glass Side & Front, E-ATX, 3x ARGB Fans, USB-C, Asus BTF Compatible, Black
Description: The CORSAIR 3500X ARGB Mid-Tower Glass PC Case is your gateway to a superior PC build with easy lighting, combining builder-friendly features with a stunning wraparound tempered glass aesthetic. Three pre-installed RS120 ARGB fans deliver high cooling performance and simple motherboard lighting control. Multiple side, roof, and bottom fan mounting options ensure that even high-performance components stay cool.

Name: Corsair 2500X RGB Dual Chamber Gaming Case w/ Glass Side & Front, Micro ATX, 2x RGB Fans, Mesh Panels, USB-C, Asus BTF Compatible, Black
Description: CORSAIR iCUE LINK 2500X RGB Micro ATX Dual Chamber PC Case features dual tempered glass panels, 2x RX120 RGB fans, and extensive cooling options for a customizable build.

Name: WD Elements SE 1TB Pocket Size External SSD, USB 3.2 Gen1 Type-A, Drop Resistance, Black
Description: Get affordable performance in a pocket-size design for your on-the-go lifestyle. With speeds up to 3x faster than a portable HDD and read speeds up to 400MB/s, the WD Elements SE SSD is perfect for keeping your most important files with you.

Name: Arctic P12 12cm Pressure Optimised PWM PST Case Fan, Fluid Dynamic, 200-1800 RPM, White
Description: 120 mm PWM fan optimized for static pressure, ensuring efficient cooling even with increased air resistance. Features a 0 dB mode for silent operation, strong cooling performance, and a long lifespan with a 6-year warranty.

Name: Antec CX500M RGB Gaming Case w/ Glass Side & Front, Micro ATX, 3x RGB Fans, LED Button, 410mm GPU Support, USB-C, White
Description: Antec CX500M RGB Gaming Case features a panoramic 270° view with seamless steel-tempered glass, bottom-up airflow for efficient cooling, tool-free panels for easy assembly, and ample cable management space.

Name: Be Quiet! Pure Loop 2 120mm Liquid CPU Cooler, 1 x Pure Wings 3 PWM Fans, ARGB Cooling Block

It features high cooling performance for all consumer CPUs, a Pure Wings 3 120mm PWM fan for quiet operation, and a doubly decoupled PWM pump to minimize vibrations. The easy-to-access refill port and included coolant bottle ensure a long lifespan.

Name: Antec P101S Silent E-ATX Case, No PSU, Sound Dampening, Tool-less, 4 Fans, Supports up to 8 x 3.5" Drives
Description: Distinctive refinement meets functionality in the Antec P101S Silent, a mid-tower ATX case designed for performance and silence. It features sound dampening foam, a swing-open front panel for easy access, and supports up to 11 storage drives.

Name: Corsair iCUE LINK RX140 RGB 14cm PWM Case Fans x2, 8 ARGB LEDs, Magnetic Dome Bearing, 1700 RPM, iCUE LINK Hub Included, White
Description: CORSAIR RX140 RGB 140mm PWM Fans deliver superior airflow at speeds up to 1,700 RPM with low noise levels. Featuring eight RGB LEDs for customizable lighting effects and a durable design with Magnetic Dome bearing for longevity.

Name: Arctic 12cm P12 Pressure Optimised PWM PST ARGB Case Fan, Fluid Dynamic, 12 LEDs, 0-2000 RPM, 0dB Mode, White
Description: Arctic 12cm P12 Pressure Optimised PWM PST ARGB Case Fan features a semi-passive design with 12 digital A-RGB LEDs, optimized for high static pressure, and operates quietly with a maximum speed of 2000 RPM.

Name: Be Quiet! BK031 Dark Rock TF 2 Heatsink & Fan, Intel & AMD Sockets, Dual Silent Wings Fans, Fluid Dynamic, 230W TDP
Description: Dark Rock TF 2 offers extreme cooling performance for the CPU and surrounding components with virtually inaudible operation. It features a dual-tower layout, two Silent Wings fans, and a 230W TDP, making it ideal for high-performance gaming PCs.

Name: Adata SE880 1TB Pocket Size External SSD, USB 3.2 Gen2 Type-C/Type-A, Blue
Description: Adata SE880 1TB Pocket Size External SSD supports USB 3.2 Gen2 with performance up to 2000MB/s. Highly portable and compatible with new generation game consoles.

Name: Fractal Design Meshify 2 (Black Solid) Gaming Case, E-ATX, Angular Mesh Front, 3 Fans, Fan Hub, Detachable Front Filter, USB-C

Iconic angular mesh design provides filtered airflow with a bold, stealth-inspired aesthetic. Spacious and extensively adaptable dual-layout interior easily accommodates large motherboards up to and including 285 mm E-ATX. Support for radiators up to 360 mm in front, 420 mm up top, or 280 mm in the base in the default Open Layout. Includes 6 HDD/SSD trays, 2 SSD brackets, and 12 universal Multibrackets for mounting up to 10 drives. Outstanding cooling capacity with a total of nine 120/140 mm fan mounts and three preinstalled Dynamic X2 GP-14 fans.

Name: Asus ROG STRIX LC II 360 ARGB Liquid CPU Cooler, 360mm, 7th Gen Asetek Pump, 3 x ARGB PWM Fans & ARGB Pump Cover
Description: ROG Strix LC II 360 ARGB all-in-one liquid CPU cooler with Aura Sync, Intel and AMD support, and three ROG 120 mm addressable RGB radiator fans. Delivers exceptional cooling and minimal noise with a sleek, modern design.

Name: Corsair 2500D Airflow Dual Chamber Gaming Case w/ Glass Window, Micro ATX, No Fans Inc., Fully Mesh Panelling, USB-C, White

It supports up to 11x 120mm fans and includes modern front panel I/O with USB 3.2 Gen-2 Type-C.

It includes EPDM high-density tubing for durability, superior fin density for rapid heat dissipation, and Antec Fusion PWM ARGB fans for powerful cooling and harmonious lighting effects. An ARGB controller is included for customizing LED colors and effects.

Name: WD 1TB My Passport External Hard Drive, 2.5", USB 3.2 Gen1, Hardware Encryption, Backup Software, Black

This high-capacity storage device provides seamless USB connectivity, enabling hassle-free access to your precious files anytime, anywhere. Make the most of the included Acronis® True Image™ for Western Digital software to help securely back up your data, fortified with robust protection against ransomware threats.

Name: Corsair iCUE LINK RX120 RGB 12cm PWM Case Fan, 8 ARGB LEDs, Magnetic Dome Bearing, 2100 RPM, Black, Single Fan Expansion Kit

Name: Corsair iCUE 5000X RGB Gaming Case w/ 4x Tempered Glass Panels, E-ATX, 3 x AirGuide RGB Fans, Lighting Node CORE included, USB-C, White

Name: Hama High Speed HDMI Cable, 3 Metres, Supports 4K

Features a tool-less, quick release ODD/HDD housing system for fast installation with minimal effort. The included base allows for vertical installation, ideal to save space on your desk. This chassis supports both Micro ATX and Mini ITX motherboards.

It includes a removable ruggedised sleeve for drop protection and an IP55 rating to withstand water and dust, making it the perfect companion for on-location photoshoots or adventures.

Name: Corsair iCUE LINK RX120 RGB 12cm PWM Case Fan, 8 ARGB LEDs, Magnetic Dome Bearing, 2100 RPM, White, Single Fan Expansion Kit

Volume-optimized Active EQ maintains balanced performance at any volume, so bass stays consistent when turned down and the music remains clear when turned up.nQuiet and Aware Modes – Choose Quiet Mode for full noise cancelling, or Aware Mode to bring the outside into the around ear headphones and hear your environment and your music at the same time.nPersonalize your audio. Adjustable EQ allows you to set the bass, mid-range, and treble levels to your personal preferences or select one of several preset options.nUp to 24 hours battery life – Enjoy 24 hours of battery life from a single charge. A quick 15-minute charge offers 3 hours when you’re on the go, or plug in the included audio cable to listen for even longer in wired mode.nBinding: ElectronicsRelease Date: 30-09-2021model number: 866724-0200Part Number: 866724-0200Details: The first noise cancelling headphones are back, with world-class quiet, lightweight materials, and proprietary technology for deep, clear sound and adjustable EQ so you can tune your music to your liking. Bose QuietComfort 45 headphones aren’t just an icon reborn – they’re the perfect balance of quiet, comfort, and sound. Plus, everything that made the first around ear headphones an icon is still here. Just refined. Like an updated design with smooth cushions and a clean look. Plush synthetic leather, impact-resistant glass-filled nylon, and cast-metal hinges were all selected for their comfort as well as their durability. Add in minimal clamping force, and you’ll almost forget you’re wearing Bluetooth wireless noise cancelling headphones. Enhanced Acoustic Noise Cancelling™ technology produces the true quiet needed to hear every detail of your music in high fidelity. Or, choose the new Aware Mode to hear your music and your environment together. TriPort acoustic architecture and Bose's innovative Volume-optimized Active EQ add depth and clarity while maintaining balance at any volume. And lightweight materials such as synthetic leather and glass-filled nylon were meticulously selected for comfort and durability. The headphones offer 24 hours of play time*, charge via USB-C®, and feature six microphones for clearer calls. Bluetooth® 5.1 maintains a strong connection, and the Bose Music app guides you through setup, lets you personalize settings, and keeps your headphones’ software up to date.EAN: 0017817835022Package Dimensions: 9.3 x 6.2 x 2.5 inchesLanguages: French, English, German

Name: EOS R5 Mark II Body
Description: The EOS R5 Mark II is a worthy successor to the incredibly versatile EOS R5 bringing with it a host of new features that make this the most powerful EOS 5 series camera ever made.  It starts with a brand-new 45MP sensor that is stacked and back illuminated for blazingly fast read-out speeds that allow for a 30 fps electronic shutter, then builds on that with major focus improvements, increased video capabilities, and so much more.

Name: Canon EOS R50 with RF-S 18-45mm
Description: The Canon EOS R50 camera can capture images and videos with reduced noise, delivering clear, detailed results even in low light. Images look beautiful even when enlarged, with natural bokeh that smartphones can’t offer.nDual Pixel CMOS AF IInEasily keep track of your subject with Dual Pixel CMOS AF II – a highly responsive system that covers up to approximately 100% x 100% of the picture area, breaking the image into up to 651 automatically-selected AF zones during Whole Area AF. This enables impressive autofocus coverage on the EOS R50 camera that helps you get the photo you want right as the moment happens.nAutomatic Subject Detection and TrackingnWhen the subject is found on screen, the EOS R50 camera can automatically select and track the subject, enabling photography that keeps them in focus with ease. Developed using Deep Learning Technology, subjects like people, animals including dogs, cats and birds, and vehicles such as cars and motorcycles — especially in a motorsports environment – are detectable.nContinuous ShootingnCapture those can’t-miss moments with up to 12 frames per second continuous shooting using the Electronic First Curtain shutter mode, and up to 15 frames per second with Electronic Shutter mode. Electronic First Curtain enables shooting with less distortion, even for subjects with significant movement. The Electronic Shutter generates no shutter noise, making it useful when photographing sleeping children, concerts, dance recitals, and other situations where silence is necessary.nAdvanced A+ AssistnExperience the joy of creative photography with an expanded array of auto-compatible scenes. Advanced A+ Assist on the EOS R50 camera enables great imagery even in difficult settings such as night views and backlit scenarios. Overexposure is automatically reduced so you can capture dynamic scenes or bright portraits, and multiple continuous shots are taken to create beautiful night images or macro photography with a deeper depth of field.nVlogging Made Simple and ConvenientnWith video recording features such as 6K oversampled uncropped 4K movie at up to 30 fps, Full-HD High-frame rate movie recording at up to 120 fps, Dual Pixel CMOS AF tracking, and Movie for Close-up Demo Mode, the EOS R50 camera makes vlogging and video content creation simple and convenient.nContinuous Movie Recording That Exceeds 30 MinutesnThe EOS R50 camera can continuously record video for up to 1 hour, allowing you to set up your video and keep your vlog, podcast, or other video project rolling without worrying about it stopping.nMovie for Close-Up Demos ModenEnsure the correct subject is in focus with Movie for Close-up Demos Mode on the EOS R50 camera. This mode quickly switches focus from the on-camera subject to an object that is presented towards the camera’s lens, ideal for movies where showing a product to the viewers is necessary such as in makeup demos, or cooking videos.nVertical Movie Mode and Aspect MarkersnMovie rotation information can be set during or after movie recording, allowing videos to be played in vertical composition when viewing on a smartphone. The Aspect Markers Function displays visual markers for different aspect ratios that may be desired for posting the same file to various social media sites. This display provides consideration for proper composition for the different deliverable files that can be created when editing.nUVC/UAC compatibility allows the EOS R50 camera to be used as a web camera to stream live video in Full HD 30 fps fixed, without additional computer software, to applications such as Zoom™, Microsoft Teams™, Skype™, and similar on-line web conferencing software.nVari-Angle Touchscreen LCDnFeaturing a 3.0-inch, 1.62 million dot Clear View LCD II Vari-angle Touchscreen LCD, the EOS R50 makes it easy to compose and shoot from virtually any angle. With the EOS R50 Touch and Drag AF functionality, you can intuitively and swiftly move the autofocus point on the touch-panel LCD.nPrecise Electronic ViewfindernThe EOS R50 camera is equipped with a high-precision 0.39-inch OLED (Organic Light-Emitting Diode) EVF with approx. 2.36 million dots and a 22mm eyepoint which displays a bright image and extensive shooting information. The EVF supports up to a 120 fps refresh rate and has been designed to provide a bright, sharp and colorful 100% view of the subject at hand. There’s also an Optical Viewfinder (OVF) Simulation setting, which provides a higher dynamic range viewfinder image for outstanding viewing in harsh, contrasty lighting situations.nWired and Wireless CommunicationsnThe EOS R50 camera supports both wired and wireless connections to your smartphone via its USB Type-C port, built-in Wi-Fi®, and Bluetooth® technology, making it easy to upload and share movies and photos to your favorite social networks.nBuilt-in Bluetooth® CapabilitynBluetooth® pairing helps you connect the camera to compatible smart devices using the free Canon Camera Connect app. This low-energy wireless connection helps preserve battery life, while providing remote control of the camera. It also sends continuously updated GPS location data from your phone, letting you geotag what you've captured so you know precisely where you captured the photo.nBuilt-in Wi-Fi CapabilitynEnable wireless functions, such as remote live view, file viewing and transfer, by connecting to Wi-Fi quickly and seamlessly. Using the Canon Camera Connect app, you can also transfer files to your mobile device to browse and share on social media.nUSB-C ConnectionnThe EOS R50 camera can be connected to a computer or smartphone via USB-C. All Canon Camera Connect app features that can be used with Wi-Fi are now available when the camera and smartphone are connected via USB, using a compatible cable for your device.

Name: Canon EOS R5 C Cinema Mirrorless Camera Body
Description: Buy the Canon EOS R5 C Mirrorless Cinema Camera that is for sale for the best price online at Foto Discount World in South Africa.  The Canon EOS R5 C is perfect for all the wedding videographers, drone camera operators, and multimedia journalists who have professional photo still and cinema video production needs, get ready for a new type of shooting experience with the EOS R5 C Mirrorless Cinema Camera from Canon. With a simple switch, the R5 C is a full featured still photo camera with all the settings of the R5 EOS mirrorless camera.

Name: Canon EOS R5, RF 24-105mm f/4L IS USM
Description: Canon EOS R5, RF 24-105mm F/4L IS USMnnTHE EXPECTED DELIVERY DATE MAY VARY DUE TO PRODUCT AVAILABILITYnnnKey Featuresnnn45MP Full-Frame CMOS SensornDIGIC X Image Processorn8K30 Raw and 4K120 10-Bit Internal VideonSensor-Shift 5-Axis Image Stabilizationnn nnnnFor the professional image-maker who needs resolution, speed, and video capabilities, there is the Canon EOS R5. Setting a new standard for versatility, this full-frame mirrorless camera features a newly developed 45MP CMOS sensor, which offers 8K raw video recording, 12 fps continuous shooting with a mechanical shutter, and is the first EOS camera to feature 5-axis sensor-shift image stabilization.nBeyond just resolution, the sensor also pairs with the refined DIGIC X image processor to usher in a new generation of Dual Pixel CMOS AF for quick, smooth, and intelligent focusing performance using 1053 selectable points that cover the entire field of view. This focusing system has also been updated to make use of Deep Learning technology for improved subject tracking as well as precise eye, face, and head-detection for both people and animals.nComplementing the imaging assets, the R5, while sporting a new design, also feels familiar to EOS 5-series users. An especially high-resolution 5.76m-dot electronic viewfinder provides a realistic 120 fps refresh rate while the rear touchscreen LCD monitor sports a vari-angle design to accommodate vlogging needs as well as benefit working from high and low angles. A top status makes for an intuitive workflow and the camera also incorporates dual memory card slots—one CFexpress Type B, one SD UHS-II—along with Bluetooth and Wi-Fi wireless connectivity.nnnnnnnn45MP Full-Frame Sensor and DIGIC X ProcessornnBuilt around a newly developed 45MP full-frame CMOS sensor, the EOS R5 offers both high-resolution stills and video output and the fine-tuned DIGIC X image processor complements this with a wealth of speed. Sensitivity from ISO 100-51200, which can be expanded to ISO 102400, suits working in a variety of lighting conditions while quick continuous shooting up to 12 fps with a mechanical shutter, or silent 20 fps with an electronic shutter, is ideal for working with moving subjects.nnnnnn8K30 Raw and 4K120 Video RecordingnnBenefitting more than just stills, the 45MP full-frame sensor also enables impressively high-resolution DCI and UHD 8K 30 fps raw video recording internally along with 4K recording up to 120 fps in 4:2:2 10-bit with Canon Log. HDR-PQ recording is possible, too, in-camera HDR production and external recording, via the HDMI port supports a clean 4K output at up to 60 fps. Both All-I and IPB compression options are available, along with the ability to use Dual Pixel CMOS AF when shooting at up to 8K raw.nnnnnnDual Pixel CMOS AFnnAn updated Dual Pixel CMOS AF features 1053 selectable focusing points, which cover approximately 100% of the image frame for wide and even coverage. This focusing system offers smooth and fast focusing performance in a similar manner to how a camcorder acquires focus. This system integrates two separate photodiodes within each pixel to provide a broad and dense network of phase-detection gathering elements across a majority of the image sensor to reduce focus hunting for faster, more direct control of focus placement. When working with still imagery, this focusing system works to acquire focus quickly and accurately, making it ideally suited to shooting and tracking moving subjects so that critical focus is attained with each shot. When shooting video, a Movie Servo AF mode offers smooth and natural focusing when changing from different subjects or different distances within the scene, as well as the ability to specify tracking sensitivity, AF speed, and Face Tracking priority. Benefited by the Touch AF system, rack focus is possible simply by touching elements within the scene on the touchscreen in order to change focus in an intuitive manner. Subject tracking in movies is also heightened due to the Dual Pixel CMOS AF system's ability to recognize subjects and maintain focus when working within changing or cluttered scenery.Subject tracking has also been benefitted through the use of Deep Learning technology, which helps to gradually refine the focusing system's ability to quickly and accurately recognize both people and animal subjects. This technology also supports the more refined eye, face, and head detection functions, for both people and animals, that are well-suited for portraiture applications.nnnnnnSensor-Shift Image StabilizernnA first for EOS cameras, the R5 incorporates five-axis sensor-shift image stabilization that compensates for up to an impressive eight stops of camera shake for truly effective compensation of camera shake to suit handheld shooting with slower shutter speeds. This stabilization system also works in concert with lens-based optical image stabilization for both native RF lenses and adapted EF lenses.nnnnnnBody Design and Wireless ConnectivitynnnnHigh-resolution 5.67m-dot 0.5" electronic viewfinder provides a bright and detailed means for eye-level viewing and the quick 120 fps refresh rate offers natural motion rendering for a more realistic viewfinder experience.nRear 3.2" LCD touchscreen features a vari-angle design that benefits front-facing recording, such as for vlogging needs, as well as working from high and low shooting angles.nTop status LCD can be used to quickly review camera and shooting settings.nCFexpress Type B and SD UHS-II memory card slots are featured for flexible storage needs; the CFexpress slot is ideal for 8K video and high-speed, high-resolution burst shooting needs while the SD card slot retains a familiar form factor for wide compatibility.nBoth a 3.5mm headphone and a 3.5mm external microphone port are featured for improved audio monitoring and recording capabilities.nRefined body design incorporates four distinct control dials across the body for intuitive tactile control and a joystick controller is used on the back of the camera for fast and intuitive focus point selection and menu navigation.nDurable, weather-sealed body design is built to handle tough working conditions and inclement weather.nBoth 5 GHz and 2.4 GHz Wi-Fi bands are available for fast file transferring to a mobile device and Bluetooth is also available to provide constant device connection via the Canon Camera Connect app.nnnnnnnnRF 24-105mm f/4L IS USM LensnnIncluded with the camera body is the versatile RF 24-105mm f/4L IS USM lens; a standard zoom covering wide-angle to portrait-length focal lengths. Its f/4 constant maximum aperture maintains consistent performance throughout the zoom range and suits working in a variety of lighting conditions. An Image Stabilizer also suits photographing in low-light by compensating for the effects of camera shake to result in sharper imagery when shooting handheld. Benefitting both stills and video applications, it also has an Ultrasonic Motor that delivers quick, quiet, and precise autofocus performance along with full-time manual focus override.nnnnn

Name: Canon EOS R5 Mirrorless Camera Body
Description: Building on the established legacy of Canon full frame cameras and the successful EOS R and RP mirrorless cameras, the Canon EOS R5 Mirrorless Digital Camera Body brings next-generation processing power, image quality, performance and build quality to the market. It’s the ideal camera for photographers and cinematographers who are looking for cutting-edge technology for anything from weddings, portraits, sports, landscape, high-end cinema, and more.nn  NEW FIRMWARE UPDATEnnnnnCutting-edge quality with an all-new 45MP CMOS sensornAt the heart of the EOS R5 is a newly developed, 45MP full frame CMOS sensor. The highest resolution mirrorless camera available from Canon, the R5 will excel when shooting even the most demanding of subjects. Thanks to this incredibly high resolution, the finest details will be realized, and photographers will have the ultimate flexibility with both enlarging their images, or cropping to realize creative vision expressed in post-processing.nDIGIC X image processornIf the 45MP CMOS sensor is the heart of the R5, the brain is undoubtedly the DIGIC X image processor. Originally introduced in the EOS 1D X Mark III DSLR, the DIGIC X processor allows an unbelievable ISO range of 100-51200. Thanks to this, shooting in less than ideal lighting conditions or with slower lenses is no longer a limitation. Expandable up to 10,400, the R5 will be able to capture detail and retain image quality in nearly any lighting environment thanks to the DIGIC X.nBigger files does not mean slower performancenUnlike previous high resolution digital cameras, the added resolution of the EOS R5 does not come at the expense of speed. Shooting speeds of up to 12 fps with the mechanical shutter, or 20 fps when shooting with the electronic silent shutter, allows photographers to capture split-second details among even the fastest-moving subjects. Whether it’s a snowboarder in the half pipe, or a bride assaulting her new hubby with the wedding cake, subjects will be captured in full detail, with autofocus keeping them tack-sharp throughout the shooting sequence.nIn-Body Image Stabilizer IBISnThe EOS R5 is Canon’s first camera to incorporate a 5-axis in-body image stabilization (IBIS). Thanks to this new system, any lens used on the EOS R5 becomes stabilized, and when used with Canon EF & RF lenses that incorporate optical image stabilization technology, the camera’s built-in system works in conjunction to allow for an industry leading 8-stops of shake correction.nDeep learning AF technologynFace and eye AF technology is not new, but the EOS R5 is bringing the concept to a whole new level. The R5 utilizes a learning technology to locate a person’s head or eye when people detection is set, allowing for easier and more accurate subject tracking while shooting. Additionally, the R5 is incorporating animal detection for the first time in a Canon camera, which will allow the R5 to effectively track the body, face or eyes of cats, dogs or birds, regardless of the animal’s size, posture, or orientation of the face.n8K RAW videonThanks to the 45MP CMOS sensor, combined with the processing powerhouse of the DIGIC X, the R5 has the ability to record 8K movies, uncrossed, at up to 30 fps (29.97 fps). 4K video shooting up to 119.9 fps in 4:2:2 10-bit Canon Log, with Dual Pixel CMOS AF is also available in all 8K and 4K video modes. Internal recording is now available thanks to the use of CFexpress memory cards, eliminating the need for expensive external recorders.nUnparalleled durabilitynIn spite of its lightweight and comfortable design, the EOS R5 is built to last. A rigid magnesium alloy chassis enhances body durability, while shielding the camera from electromagnetic radiation and heat. Internal seals in critical areas like buttons, terminal covers, battery compartment, and card slot cover allow the camera to work flawlessly in a variety of poor weather conditions, and a newly designed shutter, rated up to 500k cycles, provides years of shooting enjoyment.nn

Name: NoFan CS-60 Fanless Computer Case - Open Box
Short description: The CS-60 is a midi-sized computer case ideal for housing a fanless PC system, but it can also be used as a conventional PC case.
Description:
The CS-60 is a midi-sized computer case that is perfectly suited to house a fanless PC system although it can of course be used as a conventional PC case too. The main reason for its appeal as the basis for a fanless PC is its many perforated ventilation holes, as you can see from the photograph. These holes allow the warm air generated by the system to be easily and quickly removed from the case without the use of any fans! The layout of the case is unconventional in that the ATX power supply is installed toward the bottom of the case, which allows the hot air from the power supply to rise through natural convection. The case is designed to accommodate a Micro ATX sized motherboard only.

NoFan CS-60 mATX Computer Case Features
• Ideal mid-size PC case for a fanless/IcePipe PC
• Compatible with Micro ATX motherboards
• Excellent quality and sturdy construction
• Offers convenient front ports: Audio, USB 3.0 and dual USB 2.0
• 5.1 x 3½" plus 3 x 5¼" drive bays
• Capable of supporting up to four SSDs

Name: Cubitek HPTX ICE Computer Case
Short description: Cubitek HPTX ICE features solid construction, expertly crafted with extruded aluminum. The ICE Series combines the lightness of aluminum with the durability and strength of steel.
Description:
Cubitek HPTX ICE Features

Solid - expertly crafted with extrusion aluminum, ICE Series has the lightness of aluminum with the durability and strength of steel.  
Cool - dissipating heat faster than steel built chassis, the ICE Series extrusion aluminum construction keeps your system cool. Additionally, the well-placed fans and efficient interior layout ensures optimal system temperatures.  
Quiet - thicker materials mean less vibration. Capitalizing on the strength of the extrusion aluminum build and anti-vibration design of the side panels, the ICE Series eliminates vibration-induced-noise with its solid form.  
Neat - looking sleek and professional thanks to its brushed extrusion aluminum build, the Ice Series keeps the interior neat and organized with its easy cable management.  

• Anti-vibration PSU pads and air filter  
• Easy access I/O

Name: Seagate Expansion, 1 TB, External Hard Drive HDD, 2.5 Inch, USB 3.0, PC & Notebook, 2 Years Rescue Services Black (Capacity:: 1 TB)
Short description: Sleek and simple portable drive designed for storing photos, movies, music, and more on the go. Features drag-and-drop file saving, USB 3.0 powered connection, and automatic backup. Includes 2 years of rescue services.
Description:
About this item  
Sleek and simple portable drive design for taking photos, movies, music and more on-the-go  
Drag-and-drop file saving  
USB 3.0 powered  
Automatic recognition of Windows and Mac computers for simple setup (reformatting required for use with Time Machine)  
Enjoy peace of mind with the included limited warranty and Rescue Data Recovery Services  

The More Space. The Merrier.  
Computers tend to perform better when their internal drives aren’t filled to the brim. That’s why Expansion portable drive is here to help. Transfer, backup, and give that desktop or laptop the space it needs. Fast USB connectivity and drag-and-drop style make the whole process a no brainer.  

Simply drag and drop photos, songs, videos, docs, and more onto Expansion portable drive. Ready to go right out of the box with automatic recognition for quick and simple setup. High-speed USB 3.0 cable seamlessly plugs into PCs/Macs. No wall adapter needed. Free up computer space by adding on the extra capacity of Expansion portable drive.  

More Features to Love  
Made for on-the-go days, Expansion portable drive is small enough to fit into a bag or purse, all while storing a huge digital library. When the unexpected happens — like water damage or natural disaster — Rescue Services help you defend against data loss and retrieval costs so you can rest easier.

Name: Transcend 2TB Storejet 25M3S rugged 2,5inches USB 3.1 Gen 1 interface Iron Gray, Silver/Green (Capacity: 2 TB, Color: ‎Silver/Green)
Short description: Features lightning-fast transfer speeds with a USB 3.1 Gen 1 interface. The StoreJet 25MC external hard drive offers rugged durability in a compact 2.5-inch design. Available in silver and green with a 2 TB capacity.
Description:
From the manufacturer

Features

Lightning-fast transfer speeds  
The StoreJet 25MC external hard drive is equipped with the USB 3.1 Gen 1 interface with the support of UASP (USB Attached SCSI Protocol), providing lightning-fast transfer rates of up to 5 Gbps.

Excellent anti-shock protection  
The StoreJet 25MC features a three-stage shock protection system that meets US military drop-test standards to fully protect data stored on the drive. The three-stage shock protection system includes a silicone rubber case, an internal shock-absorbing suspension damper, and a reinforced hard casing.  
* Transcend’s SJ25MX series passed Free Drop Test with reference to MIL-STD-810G Method 516.6. Certification performed by Intertek, Report No. 180300037TWN-001, dated 2018.

Two color options  
The StoreJet 25M3 comes in iron gray and military green. Pick your favorite color!

Features

• One touch auto backup  
The StoreJet 25M3 is equipped with a one touch auto-backup button that instantly backs up your data with just one press. The button also enables you to reconnect the hard drive to your PC without the need to unplug and reinsert it.  
Note: Transcend Elite software is required.

Software  
Transcend Elite is advanced data management software that keeps important files organized, protected, and up-to-date. RecoveRx is a data recovery utility that allows you to search deep within a storage device for traces of erased files including digital photos, documents, music, and videos.

Quality  
Transcend’s external hard drives are built to the highest standards and rigorously tested, offering outstanding quality, performance, and reliability. Transcend products both look after your data and complement your good taste.

Name: EVGA SuperNOVA 850 G2 80+ GOLD 850W Fully Modular PC Power Supply
Short description: 850W 80+ Gold certified fully modular PC power supply, model 220-G2-0850-XR. Includes free Power On Self Tester and 10-year warranty.
Description:
EVGA SuperNOVA 850 G2 80+ GOLD 850W, Fully Modular PC Power Supply, Model#220-G2-0850-XR, Includes FREE Power On Self Tester and 10 Year Warranty

Unleash the next generation in power with the EVGA SuperNOVA 850/750 G2 power supplies. Based on EVGA's award-winning G2 power-supply series, these PSUs feature 80 PLUS Gold-rated efficiency and clean, continuous power to every component. The new ECO Thermal Control Fan System offers fan modes to provide zero fan noise during low load operations. This provides improved efficiency for longer operation, less power consumption, reduced energy costs and minimal heat dissipation. Backed by a 10-year warranty and proven Japanese-capacitor design, the EVGA SuperNOVA 850 G2 is not only the right choice for your system today, it's also the best choice for your system tomorrow.

Features:
• Single +12V Rail  
A single +12V rail offers the best power output, rail stability and compatibility with the latest hardware.

• LLC Resonant Circuit Layout  
Full DC to DC, LLC resonant circuit design improves efficiency.

• Fully Modular  
Fully-modular designs allow every single cable to be removed from the power supply for ease of installation and removal. You can also leave off unnecessary cables to reduce case clutter and maximize case airflow.

• Highest-Quality Japanese Nippon Chemi-Con Solid-State Capacitors  
Get the greatest reliability and performance with the best Japanese solid-state capacitors.

• Double Ball-Bearing Fan  
A high-quality dual ball-bearing fan gives the SuperNOVA 850 G2 an excellent thermal and acoustic profile, and its high reliability ensures a long PSU lifetime.

• Gold-Rated Efficiency  
80 Plus certification ensures your power supply isn't wasting power and turning it into excess heat. Under typical load this power supply is 90% more efficient or higher.

Name: Audioengine HD6 Wireless Speaker System (Walnut)
Short description: Audioengine HD6 is a premium powered speaker system offering high-quality wireless audio with a rich, detailed sound. Comes with a 3-year local Singapore warranty.
Description:
Audioengine HD6 Wireless Speaker System (Walnut) - 3 Years Local Singapore Warranty

Audioengine HD6 is a premium powered speakers are a complete home music system with bold stereo sound that fills any room. Connect in seconds and stream your music from any app or device via high-definition Bluetooth.

WIRELESS THAT REALLY WORKS  
HD6 Wireless Speakers are not just another great-sounding Audioengine speaker but a complete, full sized Bluetooth music system that works with all your apps, music, and devices. Blending the best of the past and present, HD6 combines stunning good looks with truly-useful features. Tidal, Spotify, Pandora…all your favorite streaming apps play instantly. No matter how you listen, HD6 Wireless Speakers have you covered.

WHY YOU'LL LOVE THEM  
• Perfect for TV sound  
• Wireless that works with all your devices and apps  
• No network setup, no passwords, no hassle  
• High-end sound wrapped in hand-built wood cabinets  
• Simple setup, no receiver needed  
• Optical audio input  
• Advanced wireless Subwoofer connection  
• Solid metal remote control  

SET UP IN SECONDS. SIMPLE. NO HASSLE. EASY TO USE  
The HD6 Wireless Speakers are versatile Bluetooth speakers packing a big sound that fills any room. Turntable? TV? No problem, we have you covered. No network setup, passwords to enter, or buttons to push. Setting them up is so easy you’ll be rocking in no time. Keep your music fun, easy, and sounding great.

SMALL SPEAKERS BIG SOUND. FILLS ANY ROOM  
Clear, full and powerful sound that fills any room. The HD6 Wireless Speakers are constructed with custom Audioengine components: aramid fiber woofers, silk tweeters, high-fidelity Bluetooth aptX-HD, and built-in power amps wrapped in precision tuned, hand-crafted cabinets. These speakers are designed as a main TV room system but are versatile enough to fit into any space.

GO OLD SCHOOL. ANALOG, BABY!  
Audioengine wireless speakers are special. Their traditional analog amplifiers sound incredible compared to lower-cost digital amps found in other mass-produced brands. A whole new audio experience, guaranteed.

Technical Specifications  
Power output: 150W peak power total (50W RMS, 75W peak per channel)  
Inputs: 3.5mm mini-jack, RCA L/R, digital optical (SPDIF), Bluetooth aptX  
Outputs: Variable line-out w/2.0V RMS max output, 47ohm output impedance  
Input voltages: 115/240V, 50/60Hz manually-switchable  
Amplifier type: Analog dual-class A/B monolithic  
Drivers: 5.5″ aramid fiber woofers, 1″ silk dome tweeters  
SNR: >95dB (typical A-weighted)  
THD+N: <0.05% at all power settings  
Crosstalk: -50dB  
Frequency response: 50Hz-22kHz +/-1.5dB  
Analog input impedance: 48Kohms unbalanced (mini-jack and RCA inputs)  
Protection: Output current limiting, thermal over-temperature, power on/off transient protection, replaceable external main fuse  
Power consumption: Idle: 10W, Mute: 6W, Sleep: 4W  
Internal D/A converter: AKM AK4396  
Input bit depth: 24-bits upsampled  
Bluetooth receiver type: Bluetooth 5.0 audio  
Supported codecs: aptX HD, aptX, AAC, SBC  
Wireless operation range: Up to 100ft (30m) typical  
Input data rate: Determined by Bluetooth  
Wireless latency: ~30 milliseconds (ms)

Name: Behringer MS16 2-Way Personal Monitoring Speakers (Pair)
Short description: High-performance, active 16-watt personal monitor system. Compact stereo speaker system ideally suited for home studios and multimedia applications.
Description:
Behringer MS20 High-Performance, Active 16-Watt Personal Monitor System

COMPACT STEREO SPEAKER SYSTEM IDEALLY SUITED FOR HOME STUDIOS, MULTIMEDIA APPLICATIONS, KEYBOARD AND VOCAL MONITORING, ETC.  
• Powerful 4" woofers and high-resolution tweeters powered by two 8-Watt amplifiers  
• Dedicated Volume, Bass and Treble controls for more flexibility  
• Stereo RCA inputs for sound cards, keyboards, etc. that can be used simultaneously with second stereo source (e.g. CD/MD player) through 1/8" TRS stereo input  
• Separately adjustable 1/4 inch TRS microphone input mixable with stereo inputs for playback and vocal monitoring applications  
• 1/8" TRS headphone connector with auto-mute loudspeaker function  
• Magnetically shielded for placement near computer monitors  
• High-quality components and exceptionally rugged construction ensure long life  

Looking for a fast, affordable way to upgrade your computer sound system? Maybe you'd like a great-sounding alternative to the built-in speakers on your portable synth/keyboard? Or, maybe you'd like to turn your computer into your own personal karaoke system. The Behringer MS16 Two-Way Active Personal Monitor System can tackle these tasks and more, and is the ideal way to upgrade your sound system.

Sound Quality  
Sporting 4.0" woofers and 1.5" high-resolution tweeters, MS16 monitor speakers bring high-quality audio within the reach of anyone with a computer workstation. Whether you're a musician tracking your latest masterpieces, or just someone who listens to your favorite songs at work, MS16 loudspeakers will make them sound much better. They also make excellent add-on speakers for electronic keyboards. Front-mounted volume and individual bass and treble controls make accurate sound adjustments a breeze.

Built-in Mixer  
The MS16 takes audio to an even higher level with its multiple input options. The built-in mixer features 1/8" stereo inputs for connecting CD/MD/MP3 players, dual RCA jacks for tape decks and stereo keyboard modules, and even a 1/4 inch jack for a dynamic microphone or electric guitar. This adds up to a system that lets you sing or play guitar along with a variety of prerecorded tracks. And you can wail away to your heart’s content in total privacy (at least on the guitar or keyboard), thanks to MS16’s powerful headphone jack.

Speaking of Power  
Two high-powered amplifiers feed a total of 16-Watts of super-clean power to the internal speakers, providing an ultra-wide frequency response from 80 Hz to 20 kHz.

• 90 W Peak Super Enhanced Bass and Hi-Fi Stereo - The 50w high powerful bluetooh speaker has the latest state-of-the-art FOUR DRIVERS and TWO PASSIVE BASS RADIATORS to enhanced deep bass and super high Hi-Fi sound. The bluetooh speaker also features DSP chips to pumps out better crisp treble, detailed mids at any volume. Every quarter, we will update to this bluetooh speaker if a new technology becomes available. Keeping this loud bluetooh speaker always ahead of the times and never out of date!  
• 100W Double Stereo Sound & Equalizer - Easily pair two portable speakers, upgrading 100W stereo surround sound immediately to truly enjoy the surround sound of a movie theater. When you listen to music, watch movies or play games, the two powerful portable speakers creating left and right channels immediately brings you extraordinary clarity and detail. The portable speaker has 2 equalizer modes to adjust your audio signal, find the right balance to enjoy deep bass, clear mids and crisp treble

The waterproof bluetooth speaker can be used as a power bank for other devices. The waterproof speaker of IPX6 can resistant rain, dust, snow, and spill for outdoor activities and passive radiators covers prevent accidental bumps and drops. Take the rugged bluetooth speaker with you on travel, camping, beach and Christmas party!

You can also speak to the phone assistant through the outdoor speaker. NFC allows you to pair your smartphone with your outdoor speaker by simply touching it (NFC Only for Android). Come and get a truly unparalleled loud bluetooh speaker that brings sound to life for a fantastic dynamic audio experience!

Description:
The components are a 3" woofer and a coaxial dome tweeter that ensure a wide angle of coverage. The speaker faithfully reproduces announcements and provides a good music background where included. Combined with a subwoofer, the MQ30P allows high quality music distribution with high output levels. An important feature of the MQ30P is that it provides consistent reproduction of all the frequencies involved in voice transmission and therefore, alone or in combination with a subwoofer, makes it possible to attain a high level of vocal intelligibility.

The MQ30P has been designed to adhere closely to the wall or ceiling and thus it has a limited protrusion. The built-in hinged support makes the speaker easy to install and orient in any direction. Like the other Monitor Q products, MQ30P installation is simple and flexible. First, the support is mounted on the wall and the connector is wired; then, when the premises is completely furnished, the installation, orientation, and connection of the mini-speaker are immediate.

Name: Behringer 1C (Pair) (Black) Incl. Wall Mount Bracket
Short description: The 1C-BK is a 2-way monitor speaker that combines accurate sound reproduction with a neo-classic design, ideal for sophisticated audio environments.
Description:
Description 1C-BK

Our 1C-BK 2-way monitor speaker merges stunningly-accurate sound reproduction with neo-classic design, making it perfect for even the most sophisticated environment. Sold in pairs, the 1C-BK is an exceptional choice for a wide range of fixed installations, such as stereo and surround applications, home recording studios, restaurants – as well as audio and video production suites.

Incredible Sound Quality

The 100-Watt 1C-BK derives its incredible great sound from a powerful 5.5" cellulose cone woofer and high-resolution 0.5" tweeter. The internal crossover provides auto-overload tweeter protection, and the high-precision components and design ensure absolute phase linearity. The result: full-power, ultra-linear frequency response ranging from 60 Hz all the way up to 23 kHz.

Designed to Blend with any Décor

These little beauties are available in your choice of black (1C-BK) or white (1C-WH), and come in pairs with color-matched mounting brackets for convenient, easy installation. Place them in bookshelves, on desktops or hang them from the rafters. You’ll find dozens of applications for these great-sounding little speakers.

Sound Value

Stop by your local authorized BEHRINGER dealer and listen to a pair of 1C-BKs today. Compare them to the competition. When you see and hear what they can do, you’ll own BEHRINGER – with money to spare!

Name: Alesis Elevate 3 MKII 3" Powered Desktop Studio Monitors
Short description: Sound beyond expectations. These studio speakers deliver full-range sound with impressive clarity and warmth for all your mixes, masters, and multimedia.
Description:
SOUND BEYOND EXPECTATIONS  
Alesis Elevate 3 studio speakers deliver full-range sound with impressive clarity and warmth to all your mixes, masters and multimedia content. Elevate 3 speakers bring out every detail of the sound, unencumbered and crystal clear. Unlike conventional speakers that use vibration-prone plastic cabinets, the Elevate 3’s dense wood cabinets suppress clarity-robbing resonances, resulting in clearer sound and stronger bass. Elevate 3 studio speakers contain powerful, three-inch woofers and crisp-sounding one-inch silk-dome tweeters that deliver full lows, clean highs and a precise stereo image. The internal amplifier is custom-designed and equalized to work perfectly with the Elevate 3’s drivers, for impressive impact and output capability. For ease of operation, the Elevate 3’s on/off/volume knob is conveniently located on the front panel of the right speaker. Packaged in stereo-matched sets, Elevate 3 studio speakers give you everything you need, all in one box.

TIME-TESTED TECHNOLOGY  
Alesis has been creating studio monitors for nearly a quarter century. In that time, we’ve learned a thing or two about optimizing sound and sonic clarity. Built using technology adopted from our award-winning Monitor One and M1Active professional studio monitors, Elevate 3 studio speakers are the perfect way to upgrade your computer or mobile device experience. Elevate 3 speakers leverage Alesis’ experience in designing studio loudspeakers by employing custom-designed components that reproduce sound accurately and naturally, regardless of the frequency content or volume.

FLEXIBLE I/O  
On the rear panel is a pair of rugged RCA jacks, perfect for connecting mixers, interfaces, and other audio gear. A 1/8-inch headphones jack lets you defeat the speakers’ sound for private listening at any time. Connecting the speakers is easy, using just a standard 1/8-inch cable (included). Elevate 3 studio speakers are accurate and smooth, but if you need a little more low-end punch, a convenient bass-boost switch does the trick. If you need even more power and low-end extension, Elevate 3 features a subwoofer output compatible with virtually any outboard powered subwoofer. Trust your sound to the clarity, precise design and premium performance of Alesis Elevate 3 studio speakers.

FEATURES  
• Perfect for home studios, video-editing, gaming and mobile devices  
• Separate high- and low-frequency drivers with crossover  
• 3-inch low-frequency driver in ported enclosure delivers rich, tight bass  
• 1-inch silk dome tweeter provides smooth, clear highs  
• 10W per channel output power; 20W total  
• High-density wood cabinets suppress unwanted resonances  
• Elliptical tweeter waveguide optimizes dispersion and stereo imaging  
• Carefully formed baffle radiuses reduce edge diffraction  
• Dedicated subwoofer output for use with virtually any powered subwoofer

CONTENTS  
• Elevate 3 MKII Speakers (Stereo Pair)  
• RCA-to-1/8” (3.5mm) Audio Cable  
• 1/8” (3.5mm) Interconnection Cable  
• Power Cable  
• Quickstart Guide  
• Safety & Warranty Manual

Name: Jabra Speak2 40 UC Wired Conference Speakerphone (2740-209)
Short description: 2 Years local warranty. Speakerphone for unified communication equipped with four digital MEMS microphones.
Description:
Jabra Speak2 40 UC Wired Conference Speakerphone (2740-209) - 2 Years Local Warranty

Speakerphone for Unified Communication

Equipped with four digital MEMS microphones, a built-in speaker, and a customizable button, the Jabra Speak2 40 Speakerphone is an ultra-portable solution for all of your conferencing needs. The unit is best suited for room sizes 14.76 by 14.76'. Full duplex audio with beamforming, noise-cancelling microphones ensure all participants are heard. Its plug-and-play configuration makes for easy setup with your Windows, ChromeOS, or macOS computer.

Full Duplex Audio with Embedded Voice Technology

The Speak2 40's built-in speaker and four microphones are engineered for full duplex audio, allowing all participants to speak and be heard simultaneously. This helps bridge the gap between in-person and virtual participants and facilitates collaboration. Voice Level Normalization technology equalizes all voices to the same volume level and Acoustic Echo Cancellation reduces noise interference.

Wide Compatibility

The speakerphone is also compatible with Microsoft Teams, Google Meet, and Zoom. The USB-A and USB-C connectors on the integrated 31.5" cable plug into your Windows, macOS, or ChromeOS computer.

Onboard Controls

Turn the speakerphone on and off, end or answer a call, adjust the volume, and even mute yourself with the onboard touch controls. A customizable smart button can be used to play/pause music when in speaker mode, or perform actions of your choice.

Durable and Portable Design

Compact enough to slip into a bag, the speakerphone can easily be taken on the go. The unit is IP64 rated for protection from both dust and water. An included carry pouch provides additional security when not in use.

Short description: From the manufacturer: Huawei Mate 50, Mate 50 Pro smartphone. Features glamorous symmetry aesthetics and refined design.
Description:
From the manufacturer huawei mate50; mate50; mate50 pro; smartphone; phone; mobilephone; telephone

Your Glamorous Mate  
Symmetry Aesthetics, Refined Clous de Paris Pattern, IP68 Water and Dust Resistance

Performs Like a Champ  
4460 mAh Battery, SuperHold, SuperRender,⁠ SuperStorage

Personal, Productive, and Private  
Smart Service Widgets, Convenient SuperHub, Enhanced Privacy and Security

An Instant Classic  
Arm yourself with the smartphone that radiates charm in every way, with its iconic symmetrical form, and intricate pyramidal Clous de Paris pattern, which draws you in to the sophisticated camera module.

Clear as Crystal  
Come for the tech, but stay for the view! The 6.7-inch screen and individually calibrated colours show you a true-to-life world. And 1440 Hz PWM dimming which gives your eyes the breather they deserve.

Water Challenge? Accepted  
HUAWEI Mate 50 is built to handle whatever life sprays its way, with IP68-rated splash, water, and dust resistance.

Night Makes Right  
The 50 MP Ultra Aperture Camera takes in 24% more light,6 thanks to the ultra-large F1.4 aperture and RYYB sensor, working seamlessly with the XD Fusion Pro image engine to keep brightness and contrasts pristine. Super night mode takes you deep under cover of darkness, capturing details that do justice to any neon-lit nightscape.

Welcome to the Portrait Studio  
Capture stunning portraits that put personality on full display. The larger aperture works in concert with a cutting-edge submillimetre segmentation algorithm to produce pro-level blurring and breathtaking bokeh effects. The smaller aperture allows you to put more under focus, making it ideal for group shots.

XMAGE Style, Imaging Reimagined  
Original: Records colours and textures as they appear in front of you. What you see is what you get.  
Vivid: Creates striking contrasts between bright and dark areas, for unforgettable first impressions.  
Bright: Shows images in their full splendour, with balanced light and clear contrasts.

Bright: Shows images in their full splendor, with balanced light and clear contrasts.

Name: OnePlus Nord CE 2 IV2201 TM-EU 128GB 8GB Gray Mirror TM-EU
Short description: 65W SUPERVOOC delivers fast charging, powering the 4500mAh battery to a full day's use in 15 minutes. Certified by TÜV Rheinland for safety and reliability.
Description:
About this item

65W SUPERVOOC – Accelerated charge velocity shall rocket the 4500mAh battery to a day’s power in 15 minutes. Certified by TÜV Rheinland, one shall “Charge & Play” with absolute peace of mind.

6.43 inch, 90Hz FHD+ AMOLED Display – Shielded by Corning Gorilla Glass 5, scroll, swipe, and enjoy all your entertainment effortlessly on this HDR10+ certified, OnePlus-worthy display.

Mediatek Dimensity 900 – Powered by a 5G enabled, octa-core monster of a chipset that’s tad more powerful than previous CE, consider this the “Best in class” daily driver for entertainment with its “dragon-slaying” power efficiency, thermal control and support for Wi-Fi 6.

Mediatek Dimensity 900 – Powered by a 5G enabled, octa-core monster of a chipset that’s tad more powerful than previous CE, consider this the “Best in class” daily driver for entertainment with its “dragon-slaying” power efficiency, thermal control and support for Wi-Fi 6.

All Flexible – The OnePlus Nord CE 2 is equipped with triple card slots, meaning you have the flexibility to go dual SIM, with an additional micro SD that allows for up to 1TB extendable storage. Also, this phone has a 3.5mm headphone jack.

Designed by OnePlus – Coming in at 7.8mm thick, weighing 173g, this is THE slimmest OnePlus phone yet, since the 6T.

A little more flashy than you’d expect ce21

Who needs Rembrandt? Use Portrait mode to paint your own photographic masterpiece with better edge detection and adjustable background blur. And if you want to make your shots a little dreamier, try our new Bokeh Flare filter.

How lit are your videos? Take breathtaking backlit shots with improved AI background lighting and color optimization.

Plug in and win 7878  
Nord CE 2 supports fast simultaneous charge-and-play functionality to give you the power you need to keep owning your competition.

A little more oomph than you’d expect 888  
This chip is wicked smart

Oxygen with a little refresh  
One-handed use. Dark mode. An improved always-on display. These are just a few of the awesome features from OxygenOS 11 that you can customize to make Nord CE 2 look and feel the way you want

Name: LOGITECH G PRO Wireless Gaming Mouse
Short description: Whether you're an esports heavyweight or a casual online gamer, this wireless optical gaming mouse helps you stay ahead with precision and performance.
Description:
Gaming mouse  
Whether you're an esports heavyweight or a casual online gamer, the Logitech G PRO RGB Wireless Optical Gaming Mouse will help you stay ahead of the pack. It's got a lightning fast 1 ms report rate, and its HERO sensor delivers up to 25,600 DPI tracking. So you'll always get fluid control and smooth clicks.  

Wireless connection  
When you're exploring alien lands or figuring out a fiendish puzzle, the last thing you need is a wire keeping you rooted to the spot. The Logitech G PRO‘s LIGHTSPEED wireless connection means you can play with complete freedom.  

Lightweight design  
The G PRO is a joy to game with - it's lightweight and designed to feel comfortable in your hand, no matter which you play with. The removable left and right buttons means you can adapt it to be used with either hand.

Name: HP G200 Wired Optical Gaming Mouse (USB 3.0, Black)

Its Anti-slip Design ensures smooth gaming so that you can maintain an upper hand while battling it out with your opponents.
