Name: Pro Fit® Left-Handed Ergo Wireless Mouse
Short description: Made especially for left-handers, this ergonomist-approved wireless mouse features a 41º angle designed for comfortable left-hand use.
Description: Made especially for left-handers, the ergonomist-approved Pro Fit® Left-Handed Ergo Wireless Mouse is the right mouse for your left hand. Features include a 41º neutral grip, plug-and-play USB connectivity, six-button control, triple DPI settings (800, 1,200, 1,600), 128-bit AES encryption, KensingtonWorks™ customization, cross-platform compatibility, and a three-year warranty.

Name: RAPOO VT950 Optical Gaming Mouse
Short description: Wired and 2.4 GHz wireless modes allow switching between connections for free movement without sacrificing accuracy and control. Play anywhere with ease.
Description: Wired and 2.4 GHz wireless modes. Switch between wired and wireless modes to enjoy free movement without sacrificing accuracy and control. Play wherever and enjoy your game. Reliable 2.4 GHz wireless technology provides stable wireless connection with up to 10 meters range. Ergonomic design with 11 programmable buttons. Designed to fit your palm, this mouse prevents unnecessary strain on your hand to enable comfortable grip and pleasant use even during your longest games. Confidence is good, control is better: Your VT350 offers you 11 individually customizable buttons to which you can assign a wide range of functions and macros. Adjustable real-time CPI button. You can adjust 7 CPI values from 50-16000 CPI through CPI+/- buttons, which is up to 16000 CPI. You can also +/- CPI recurrently with an interval of 50 CPI to meet the accuracy of different screens. Accurate navigation. Professional gaming optical engine with 100 inches/s tracking speed, Max. acceleration of 20G and up to 1000 Hz USB report rate, ensures accurate tracking, anytime, anywhere. Customizable OLED display, breathing light LED with 16 million colors. Customizable OLED display screen shows your APM, CPI and game statistics in real time, you can even set it as the words or images you like, which make it so cool and professional matching with the breathing light. Adjustable counter weight system. Adjust VT950 to your own comfortable balance & weight through 1 removable weight (10g). Eco-friendly rechargeable battery. Thanks to the built-in eco-friendly lithium battery, you can enjoy long battery life with a full charge. It eliminates the need for often replacing batteries.

Name: Logitech G502 HERO High Performance Gaming Mouse EER2
Short description: Logitech G502 HERO High Performance Gaming Mouse with 16,000 DPI features an advanced optical sensor for maximum tracking accuracy.
Description:
Logitech G502 HERO High Performance Gaming Mouse 16,000 DPI

A REBORN HERO

G502 HERO features an advanced optical sensor for maximum tracking accuracy, customizable RGB lighting, custom game profiles, from 100 up to 16,000 DPI, and repositionable weights.

HERO 16K SENSOR

HERO is our most accurate gaming sensor ever with next-gen precision and a ground-up architecture. With the fastest frame rate processing yet, HERO is capable of 400+ IPS across the 100 - 16,000 DPI range with zero smoothing, filtering or acceleration. HERO achieves competition-level precision and the most consistent responsiveness ever. Be sure to customize and tune your DPI settings using Logitech G HUB.

CONTROLS AT YOUR FINGERTIPS

11 PROGRAMMABLE BUTTONS

• Use Logitech G HUB to program your favorite commands and macros to each of the 11 buttons. Build, crouch, melee, heal … put your power moves at your fingertips. Save ready-to-play profiles directly to the mouse to take your settings with you anywhere.

TUNABLE WEIGHT

• Fine tune mouse feel and glide to your advantage. Five 3.6 g weights come with G502 HERO and are configurable in a variety of front, rear, left, right and center weighted configurations. Experiment with the alignment and balance to find the sweet spot to optimize your gaming performance.

LIGHTSYNC RGB

• LIGHTSYNC technology is next generation RGB that can be driven by games, audio, or your screen to deliver the most immersive RGB experience ever. Select from a full spectrum of approximately 16.8 million colors and synchronize lighting animations and effects with your other Logitech G devices. Customize it all quickly and easily using Logitech G HUB.

GAME READY DETAILS

• In addition to the core performance and personalization features, many details were thoughtfully engineered and designed. Look for primary buttons with mechanical switches, braided cable with hook and loop cable tie, rubberized side grips, magnetic weight-cavity door, and more.

Same day dispatch

Name: Logitech Lift Vertical Ergonomic Mouse Graphite Black (910-006479)
Short description: Designed for small to medium right hands, this vertical ergonomic mouse offers comfort and precision. Includes a 1-year local warranty.
Description:
Logitech Lift Vertical Ergonomic Mouse Graphite Black (910-006479) - 1 Year Local Warranty

Designed for small to medium right hands, the Logitech Lift Vertical Ergonomic Wireless Mouse features a unique vertical shape, complete with a soft textured grip and a snug thumb rest. The 57° angle helps promote a natural posture in the forearm, allowing for day-long comfort and productivity. At your fingertips are four easy-to-reach customizable buttons, quiet clicks, and a SmartWheel for smooth, seamless scrolling. Connect wirelessly via the included Logi Bolt USB receiver or Bluetooth Low Energy technology, whether you're using a Windows, macOS, Chrome OS, or Linux system. Powered by a single AA battery, the Lift mouse can potentially run for up to two years.

The plastic parts of the Lift mouse include up to 70% post-consumer recycled plastic.

Sustainable Design
Plastic parts in Lift Vertical Ergonomic Wireless Mouse include 70% certified post consumer recycled plastic. It is certified carbon neutral.

Name: HP Inc 435 Multi-Device Wireless Mouse (3B4Q5AA)
Short description: Work seamlessly with a versatile and customizable wireless mouse designed for business use. Includes a 1-year local warranty.
Description:
HP 435 Multi-Device Wireless Mouse for Business (3B4Q5AA) - 1 Year Local Warranty

Work seamlessly with a versatile and customizable mouse that is responsibly made. Enhance your experience by connecting with up to two devices and moving content across operating systems. The HP Inc 435 Multi-Device Wireless Mouse is a multi-device, wireless computer mouse that can be used with multiple devices that support Bluetooth connectivity. It has a compact, ergonomic design and is compatible with Windows, MacOS, and Android operating systems. The mouse has a precision optical sensor that provides accurate cursor control and a comfortable scroll wheel. It has a sleek and modern design, making it a stylish addition to your computer setup. Easy to use and does not require any software or drivers to be installed. Simply connect the mouse to your device via Bluetooth and you're ready to go. Additionally, the mouse has 3 levels of DPI (dots per inch) sensitivity, allowing you to adjust the cursor speed to suit your preference. This makes it ideal for both everyday use and more intensive tasks, such as gaming or graphic design. Overall, the HP Inc 435 Multi-Device Wireless Mouse is a versatile and reliable choice for anyone looking for a high-quality wireless mouse that works seamlessly with multiple devices.

• Color: Jack black  
• Buttons: 5  
• Wireless technology: Multi Surface Tracking  
• Battery life: Up to 24 months  
• Battery: 1 AA battery (included)  
• Sensor resolution: Up to 4000 dpi  
• Compatibility: Compatible with PCs with available USB-A port and Bluetooth® connectivity  
• Compatible operating systems: Windows 11; Windows 10; macOS  
• Minimum system requirements: USB Type-A Port + Bluetooth®  
• Dimensions (W X D X H): 4.54 x 2.92 x 1.59 in  
• Weight: 0.174 lb  

When Choosing A Business Mouse, Here Are Some Factors To Consider:  
Ergonomics: Make sure the mouse fits comfortably in your hand and supports a natural hand position to reduce the risk of repetitive strain injuries.  
Connectivity: Decide whether you want a wired or wireless mouse. Wireless mice offer greater flexibility and convenience, but may require regular battery changes.  
Compatibility: Consider the operating system and devices you will be using the mouse with to ensure it is compatible.  
Features: Consider the features you require, such as extra buttons for quick access to commonly used functions, adjustable DPI for precise cursor control, and a scroll wheel for easy navigation.  
Brand reputation and customer support: Choose a reputable brand that offers good customer support in case you experience any issues with your mouse.

Name: Noctua NH-L9i-17xx Low-Profile CPU Cooler
Short description: The NH-L9i-17xx is the latest LGA1700-specific revision of Noctua’s award-winning low-profile CPU cooler.
Description:
Noctua NH-L9i-17xx Low-Profile CPU Cooler In stock. The NH-L9i-17xx is the latest, LGA1700-specific revision of Noctua’s award-winning NH-L9i low-profile CPU cooler for Intel-LGA17xx based HTPCs and Small Form Factor (SFF) systems. At a height of only 37 mm, the NH-L9i is ideal for extremely slim cases and, due to its small footprint, it provides 100% RAM and PCIe compatibility as well as easy access to near-socket connectors even on tightly packed mini-ITX motherboards. The custom-designed SecuFirm2™ mounting system for the LGA1700 (LGA17xx family) socket makes installation a breeze and, thanks to the highly optimised NF-A9x14 92 mm fan that supports fully automatic speed control via PWM, the NH-L9i-17xx runs remarkably quietly. Topped off with Noctua’s renowned NT-H1 thermal compound, the NH-L9i-17xx combines everything users have come to expect from Noctua’s larger coolers into a super-compact, premium-quality package for ITX and HTPC builds with Intel LGA17xx family CPUs.

Product Details

Notes and warnings  
The NH-L9i is a highly compact, quiet low-profile cooler designed for use in small form factor cases and HTPC environments. While it provides first-rate performance in its class, it is not suitable for overclocking and or CPUs that create high heat loads. Please consult Noctua's CPU compatibility list to find out whether the NH-L9i is recommended for your CPU.

Name: Thermalright MUX-120 Quiet CPU Cooler for Socket 1156
Short description: The MUX-120 quiet CPU cooler features a backplate and revised mounting bracket for sturdy, easy installation.
Description:
The new MUX-120 quiet CPU cooler comes with a backplate and a revised mounting bracket to provide a sturdy and easy installation. This new Thermalright cooler comes with a Thermalright X-silent 120mm low noise fan and extra fan clips should you choose to add another fan to your MUX-120 for extra cooling. The MUX-120 design is similar to the Ultra 120-Extreme, but it weighs less yet cools with the high performance level found in all Thermalright heatsinks. Thermalright was careful to design the MUX-120 so as not to interfere with the memory slots or the VGA card as common with many of it's competitor's CPU coolers.

Image shows the new quiet Thermalright 120 MUX CPU Cooler.

Thermalright MUX-120 CPU Cooler. Quiet and powerful cooling due to multiple heat pipes and large aluminum fin area. Support all Intel Socket 1156.

• Proprietary bent winglet design to minimize airflow resistance  
• Four high quality 6mm heatpipes, strategically positioned to pick up the heat from the CPU  
• 48 pieces of aluminum fins, can be covered entirely by a 120mm fan to absorb all in-coming air flow  
• Includes one TR Ultra low noise X-Silent 120mm Fan (1200RPM 23dBA)  
• Includes Chill Factor II thermal paste  
• Includes the new improved 1156 Mounting Hardware (Rev. 2)  
• Light weight and easy installation  

Image shows the Thermalright MUX-120 CPU Cooler fan. Thermalright 120mm fan with sleeved wires.

Short description: Increase compatibility of the FC5, FC9, and FC10 chassis with these longer CPU heatpipes designed to replace the original ones. In stock.

Name: Noctua NH-D15S Ultra Quiet CPU Cooler
Short description: In stock. Tailored for superior RAM and PCIe compatibility, this asymmetrical single-fan version of Noctua’s award-winning cooler delivers quiet, efficient cooling.
Description:
Noctua NH-D15S CPU Cooler In stock. Tailored to provide superior RAM and PCIe compatibility, the NH-D15S is an asymmetrical single fan version of Noctua’s award-winning flagship model, the NH-D15. Thanks to its asymmetrical design, the NH-D15S clears the top PCIe slot on most µATX and ATX motherboards. At the same time, the single fan setup and recessed lower fins guarantee 100% RAM compatibility with memory modules of up to 65 mm height. Users who have sufficient room can also upgrade the cooler with either a 120 mm or round 140 mm fan on the front fin stack for further improved performance in dual fan mode. Topped off with the trusted, pro-grade SecuFirm2™ multi-socket mounting system, Noctua’s proven NT-H1 thermal compound and full 6 years manufacturer’s warranty, the NH-D15S forms a complete premium quality solution that combines dual tower efficiency with excellent compatibility and flexible upgrade options.

Name: Noctua NH-U12S TR4-SP3 Quiet CPU Cooler
Short description: Continuing the legacy of Noctua’s classic NH-U series, which has received over a thousand awards and recommendations.
Description:
Noctua NH-U12S TR4-SP3 CPU Cooler In stock. Continuing the legacy of Noctua’s classic NH-U-series, which has received more than a thousand awards and recommendations from international hardware websites and magazines, the NH-U12S has become a benchmark for slim, highly compatible 120mm single tower coolers. The TR4-SP3 version is a tailored custom model for AMD’s sTRX4/TR4/SP3 platform (Ryzen Threadripper / Epyc) and features a larger contact surface as well as the latest SecuFirm2™ mounting system for socket sTRX4/TR4/SP3. Topped off with the renowned quiet NF-F12 PWM 120mm fan, Noctua’s proven NT-H1 thermal compound and a full 6-year manufacturer’s warranty, the NH-U12S TR4-SP3 forms a complete premium-quality solution that combines outstanding performance, superb acoustics and excellent compatibility for high-end sTRX4/TR4/SP3 systems.

Noctua NH-U12S TR4-SP3 Features:  
• Award-winning NH-U12S cooler  
Tens of thousands of enthusiast users all over the world swear by the NH-U12S’s quality and performance. Recommended by more than 200 international hardware websites and magazines, it is renowned as being one of the best 120mm coolers on the market.  
• Tailored custom version for sTRX4/TR4/SP3 (Ryzen Threadripper / Epyc)  
At 70x56mm, the copper contact surface of the TR4-SP3 version is more than double the size of the standard model. Tailored to fit the enormous integrated heat-spreaders (IHS) of AMD’s sTRX4/TR4/SP3-based processors, this customized design allows for an optimal heat flow from the CPU over the base to the heatpipes and on to the cooling fins.  
• 120mm size for excellent performance and compatibility  
With five heatpipes and the powerful NF-F12 120mm fan, the NH-U12S achieves outstanding cooling performance while maintaining excellent compatibility: At 158mm height and 125mm width, it is short enough to fit most modern tower cases and stays clear of the top PCIe slot on most motherboards.  
• NF-F12 120mm Focused Flow™ fan  
Recommended by more than 150 hardware publications and thousands of enthusiasts world-wide, the Noctua's premium quality NF-F12 Focused Flow™ 120mm fan is renowned to combine superb static pressure, excellent heatsink performance and surprising quietness of operation.  
• PWM support and Low-Noise Adaptors  
The NF-F12 120mm fan supplied with the NH-U12S supports PWM for convenient automatic speed control through the motherboard. In addition, the maximum fan speed can be reduced from 1500 to 1200 rpm using the supplied Low-Noise Adaptor for even quieter operation.  
• Anti-vibration pads and fan-clips for second NF-F12 (optional)  
For users who want to achieve even better performance by adding a second, optional NF-F12 fan to create a push/pull setup, the NH-U12S includes fan clips and an extra set of custom-designed anti-vibration pads that allow to off-set the rear fan by 5mm to improve acoustics in dual-fan mode.  
• SecuFirm2™ mounting system for sTRX4/TR4/SP3  
Noctua’s SecuFirm2™ mounting systems have become synonymous with quality, safety and ease of use. The TR4-SP3 variant has been completely custom-designed for the new socket and is particularly easy to install: Put on the heatsink, fix the four spring-loaded screws and you’re done!  
• Offset mounting options for better PCIe clearance  
In order to assure optimal compatibility with SLI and CrossFire multi-GPU setups, the SecuFirm2™ mounting for sTRX4/TR4/SP3 makes it possible to offset the cooler by 3 or 6mm towards the upper edge of the motherboard, thereby increasing clearance of the top PCIe slot.  
• NT-H1 thermal compound  
Noctua's much-acclaimed NT-H1 is a well proven pro-grade TIM solution that provides minimum thermal resistance, excellent ease-of-use and outstanding reliability, which makes it suitable for use in professional server and workstation environments.  
• 6-year manufacturer’s warranty  
Noctua products are renowned for their impeccable quality and outstanding longevity. Like all Noctua fans, the supplied NF-F12 features an MTTF rating of more than 150,000 hours and the entire NH-U12S package comes with a full 6-year manufacturer's warranty.

Name: Noctua NH-U9DX i4 Ultra Quiet Xeon CPU Cooler
Short description: Noctua's DX line of coolers is a preferred choice for high-performance, quiet cooling solutions for Intel Xeon CPUs. The NH-U9DX i4 offers efficient cooling with minimal noise.
Description:
Noctua NH-U9DX i4 CPU Cooler In stock. Noctua's DX line of coolers has become a default choice in high performance quiet cooling solutions for Intel Xeon CPUs. The latest i4 revision supports LGA2011 (both Square ILM and Narrow ILM), LGA2066, LGA1356 and LGA1366 based Xeon platforms and the 9cm model NH-U9DX i4 comes equipped with two of Noctua’s award-winning NF-B9 premium fans with PWM for automatic speed control. Standing 125mm tall, the NH-U9DX i4 combines outstanding quiet cooling efficiency with full 4U compatibility. Fitted with the professional SecuFirm2™ mounting system and bundled with Noctua's industrial-grade NT-H1 thermal compound, the NH-U9DX i4 forms a complete premium quality package for quietly cooling Xeon based workstations and servers.

Noctua NH-U9DX i4 Features  
• Award-Winning NH-U Series  
The NH-U9DX i4 is based on the latest version of Noctua’s award-winning NH-U9 coolers. First introduced in 2005, the NH-U series has become a standard choice for premium quality quiet CPU coolers and won more than 400 awards and recommendations from leading international hardware websites and magazines.

• 4U Compatibility  
Sporting four heatpipes, a surface area of more than 3800cm² and two premium grade 92mm fans, the NH-U9DX i4 provides a significant upgrade in quiet cooling performance compared to common 2U solutions. At the same time, its 125mm height makes it fully compatible with standard 4U cases.

• 2x NF-B9 92mm Premium Fan  
The award-winning NF-B9 92mm premium fan features Noctua’s renowned SSO bearing as well as advanced aerodynamic optimizations such as Bevelled Blade Tips and Vortex-Control Notches. In order to achieve its superb quiet cooling capability, the NH-U9DX i4 comes equipped with two NF-B9 fans in a push/pull setup.

• PWM support and Low-Noise Adaptor  
The NF-B9 92mm fans supplied with the NH-U9DX i4 support PWM for convenient automatic speed control through the mainboard. In addition, the maximum fan speed can be reduced from 1600 to 1300 rpm using the supplied Low-Noise Adaptors for even quieter operation.

• SecuFirm2™ Mounting System  
Noctua’s SecuFirm2™ mounting systems have become synonymous with quality, safety and ease of use. Supporting Intel’s LGA2066, LGA2011 (both Square and Narrow ILM), LGA1356 and LGA1366 Xeon platforms, the SecuFirm2™ mounting included with the NH-U12DX i4 guarantees perfect contact pressure and maximum convenience on all sockets.

• NT-H1 Thermal Compound  
Having received more than 100 awards and recommendations from hardware journalists around the world, Noctua’s NT-H1 is a proven professional grade TIM solution that provides minimum thermal resistance, excellent ease of use and outstanding reliability.

• 6 Years Warranty  
Noctua products are renowned for their impeccable quality and outstanding longevity. Like all Noctua fans, the supplied NF-B9 models feature an MTBF rating of more than 150,000 hours and the entire NH-U9DX i4 package comes with a full 6 years manufacturer’s warranty.

The DX models (NH-U12DX i4, NH-U9DX i4, NH-U12DX 1366, NH-U9DX 1366) can only be used on mainboards that have a backplate with screw threads for CPU cooler installation (such as the Intel reference backplate for Xeon 5500). The cooler is thus incompatible with Xeon 3500 and Core i7 mainboards that don’t have such a backplate. Please choose our normal retail models with LGA1366 support (or NM-I3 kit) for these mainboards.  

There are two different types of ILM (Independent Loading Mechanism) for Intel’s LGA2011 based Xeon CPUs: Square ILM with 80x80mm hole spacing and Narrow ILM with 56x94mm hole spacing. The mounting system of the NH-U12DX i4/NH-U9DX i4 is fully compatible with both types.

Name: Noctua NH-U9S Ultra Quiet CPU Cooler
Short description: Continuing the renowned legacy of Noctua’s award-winning NH-U9 series, this premium-quality, quiet CPU cooler features a classic 9 cm design.
Description:
Noctua NH-U9S In stock. Continuing the renowned legacy of Noctua’s award-winning NH-U9 series, the NH-U9S is a premium quality quiet CPU cooler in classic 9cm size. Its asymmetrical design with 5 heatpipes not only provides even better cooling performance than the previous generation but also improves compatibility: Thanks to its 95x95mm footprint, the NH-U9S clears the RAM and PCIe slots on all Intel and most AMD based mainboards, including µATX and ITX. Combined with its 125mm height, this makes the NH-U9S a highly versatile solution with excellent case, RAM and PCIe compatibility. The included NF-A9 premium fan supports automatic speed control via PWM for outstanding quietness of operation and a second, optional NF-A9 fan can be added for further improved performance in dual fan mode. Topped off with the trusted, pro-grade SecuFirm2™ multi-socket mounting system, Noctua’s proven NT-H1 thermal compound and full 6 years manufacturer’s warranty, the NH-U9S is a deluxe choice through and through.

Noctua NH-U9S CPU Cooler Features  
• Award-Winning NH-U Series  
Award-Winning NH-U Series  
The NH-U9S stems from Noctua’s award-winning NH-U9 series. First introduced in 2005, the NH-U series has become a standard choice for premium quality quiet CPU coolers and won more than 800 awards and recommendations from leading international hardware websites and magazines.

• S version with better compatibility  
S version with better compatibility  
Like its bigger brothers NH-U12S and NH-U14S, the NH-U9S features a revised, slimmer layout: Whereas the NH-U9B SE2 was 120mm deep with its two stock fans, the NH-U9S is asymmetrically built and measures only 95mm with its single, more efficient NF-A9 fan, thus providing better performance and compatibility at the same time.

• 100% RAM Compatibility  
100% RAM Compatibility  
With its 95x95mm footprint, the NH-U9S does not overhang the RAM slots on current Intel and most AMD mainboards. This gives the user full access to the memory modules and guarantees 100% compatibility with tall heatspreaders or optional memory fans.*

• 100% compatibility with PCIe cards on mini-ITX  
100% compatibility with PCIe cards on mini-ITX  
Many Intel LGA115x based mini-ITX mainboards have the PCIe slot sitting right next to the 95x95mm socket zone. While larger coolers that exceed this zone are likely to block the PCIe slot, the 95x95xmm sized NH-U9S provides full compatibility with PCIe cards, be it on ATX, microATX or ITX.

• NF-A9 premium fan  
NF-A9 premium fan  
The highly optimised NF-A9 premium fan features Noctua’s proprietary AAO frame as well as sophisticated aerodynamic design measures such as Flow Acceleration Channels, which allows it to further improve the renowned efficiency of Noctua’s previous 92mm models and contributes to the NH-U9S’ superior cooling performance.

• PWM support and Low-Noise Adaptor  
PWM support and Low-Noise Adaptor  
The NF-A9 92mm fan supplied with the NH-U9S supports PWM for convenient automatic speed control through the mainboard. In addition, the maximum fan speed can be reduced from 2000 to 1550 rpm using the supplied Low-Noise Adaptor for even quieter operation.

• Dual Fan Ready  
Dual Fan Ready  
The NH-U9S includes an extra set of fan mounting clips for users who want to achieve even better cooling performance by adding a second, optional NF-A9 PWM fan in order to create a push/pull setup. Using the y-cable supplied with the NF-A9 PWM retail fan, both fans can be connected to one CPU fan header.

• SecuFirm2 Mounting  
SecuFirm2™ Mounting System  
Noctua's SecuFirm2™ mounting systems have become synonymous with quality, safety and ease of use. Supporting Intel LGA115x (LGA1150, LGA1151, LGA1155, LGA1156), LGA2066, LGA2011 (LGA2011-0 & LGA2011-3) and AMD (AM2+, AM3, AM3+, FM1, FM2, FM2+), the SecuFirm2™ mounting included with the NH-U9S guarantees perfect contact pressure and maximum convenience on all current sockets.

• Compatibility with past and future sockets  
Compatibility with past and future sockets  
Complying with the open SecuFirm™ standard, the NH-U9S can be made compatible with the older LGA1366 and LGA775 sockets using the optional NM-I3 mounting kit, which is provided by Noctua free of charge. If technically possible, Noctua will also provide upgrade kits for future sockets.

• NT-H1 Thermal Compound  
NT-H1 Thermal Compound  
Having received more than 100 awards and recommendations from hardware journalists around the world, Noctua’s NT-H1 is a proven professional grade TIM solution that provides minimum thermal resistance, excellent ease of use and outstanding reliability.

• 6 Years Warranty  
6 Years Warranty  
Noctua products are renowned for their impeccable quality and outstanding longevity. Like all Noctua fans, the supplied NF-A9 features an MTBF rating of more than 150,000 hours and the entire NH-U9S package comes with a full 6 years manufacturer’s warranty.

Some AMD mainboards violate the 96x114mm keep-out zone specified by AMD, so the NH-U9S can only be used with RAM modules of up to 30mm height on these boards. Please consult our compatibility list for details.

Name: Noctua NH-U12DX i4 Ultra Quiet Xeon CPU Cooler
Short description: Noctua's DX line of coolers is a popular choice for high-performance, quiet cooling solutions for Intel Xeon CPUs. The NH-U12DX i4 offers reliable and efficient cooling.
Description:
Noctua NH-U12DX i4 CPU Cooler In stock. Noctua's DX line of coolers has become a default choice in high performance quiet cooling solutions for Intel Xeon CPUs. The latest i4 revision supports LGA2011 (both Square ILM and Narrow ILM), LGA2066, LGA1356 and LGA1366 based Xeon platforms and the 12cm model NH-U12DX i4 comes equipped with Noctua's award-winning NF-F12 Focused Flow™ fan with PWM for automatic speed control. Due to its slim design, the NH-U12DX i4 now provides easy access to the memory slots and better compatibility with tall modules. Fitted with the professional SecuFirm2™ mounting system and bundled with Noctua's industrial-grade NT-H1 thermal compound, the NH-U12DX i4 forms a complete premium quality package for quietly cooling Xeon based workstations and servers.

Noctua NH-U12DX i4 Features  
• Award-Winning NH-U12 Series  
Award-Winning NH-U12 Series The NH-U12DX i4 is based on the latest version of Noctua's award-winning NH-U12 coolers. First introduced in 2005, the NH-U series has become a standard choice for premium quality quiet CPU coolers and won more than 400 awards and recommendations from leading international hardware websites and magazines.  

• Easier access to RAM  
Easier access to RAM Thanks to its slim design with only 45mm fin depth, the NH-U12DX i4 ensures easy access to the RAM slots. When installed parallel to the slots, it will not overhang the memory on LGA1356, LGA1366 and LGA2011 Square ILM even with two fans installed, thus providing full compatibility with tall RAM heatsinks.  

• NF-F12 120mm Focused Flow Fan  
NF-F12 120mm Focused Flow™ Fan Recommended by more than 150 hardware publications and thousands of enthusiasts world-wide, the Noctua's premium quality NF-F12 Focused Flow™ 120mm fan is renowned to combine superb static pressure, excellent heatsink performance and surprising quietness of operation.  

• PWM & Low-Noise Adaptor  
PWM Support and Low-Noise Adaptor The NF-F12 120mm fan supplied with the NH-U12DX i4 supports PWM for convenient automatic speed control through the mainboard. In addition, the maximum fan speed can be reduced from 1500 to 1200 rpm using the supplied Low-Noise Adaptor for even quieter operation.  

• Dual Fan Ready  
Anti-Vibration Pads and Fan-Clips for Second NF-F12 (optional) For users who want to achieve even better performance by adding a second, optional NF-F12 fan to create a push/pull setup, the NH-U12DX i4 includes fan clips and an extra set of custom-designed anti-vibration pads that allow to off-set the rear fan by 5mm to improve acoustics in dual-fan mode.  

• SecuFirm2 Mounting  
SecuFirm2™ Mounting System Noctua's SecuFirm2™ mounting systems have become synonymous with quality, safety and ease of use. Supporting Intel's LGA2066, LGA2011 (both Square and Narrow ILM), LGA1356 and LGA1366 Xeon platforms, the SecuFirm2™ mounting included with the NH-U12DX i4 guarantees perfect contact pressure and maximum convenience on all sockets.  

• NT-H1 Thermal Compound  
NT-H1 Thermal Compound Having received more than 100 awards and recommendations from hardware journalists around the world, Noctua's NT-H1 is a proven professional grade TIM solution that provides minimum thermal resistance, excellent ease of use and outstanding reliability.  

• 6 Years Warranty  
6 Years Warranty Noctua products are renowned for their impeccable quality and outstanding longevity. Like all Noctua fans, the supplied NF-F12 features an MTBF rating of more than 150,000 hours and the entire NH-U12S package comes with a full 6 years manufacturer's warranty.

Name: Noctua NM-AM4-UxS Mounting Kit
Short description: Continuing Noctua’s tradition of providing premium SecuFirm2™ mountings free of charge, the NM-AM4-UxS mounting kit ensures secure and reliable installation.
Description:
Noctua NM-AM4-UxS Mounting Kit

Continuing Noctua’s tradition of supplying customers with its premium-class SecuFirm2™ mountings free of charge, the NM-AM4-UxS kit allows Noctua users to upgrade NH-U14S, NH-U12S and NH-U9S coolers to AMD’s AM4 socket (Ryzen). It is a dedicated solution for the NH-U14S, NH-U12S and NH-U9S models and has been designed to combine outstanding reliability, optimal contact pressure and easy, straightforward installation. Bringing the trusted SecuFirm2™ quality to AMD’s AM4 platform, the NM-AM4-UxS is an enthusiast-grade mounting kit that meets the highest demands in safety, performance and ease of use.

Noctua NM-AM4-UxS Features:

• Trusted SecuFirm2™ quality  
Over the years, SecuFirm2™ has become synonymous with impeccable long-term stability and flawless craftsmanship. Enthusiast users and industry clients alike trust the time-tested quality of Noctua's professional mounting systems.

• Perfect contact pressure  
SecuFirm2™ mounting systems use high-grade coil springs to achieve perfect contact pressure. No guesswork regarding how far to tighten the mounting screws, no risk of damaging the socket with excessive pressure!

• Integrated fastening brackets  
Noctua’s SecuFirm2™ systems feature fully integrated fastening brackets with pre-fixed pressure screws and springs, which greatly facilitates the installation process. No fiddling with loose screws and springs!

• Tailor-made for AM4  
In order to cut costs, many manufacturers use cross-platform parts for both Intel and AMD, which can cause compatibility issues. Noctua’s SecuFirm2™ mounting system for AM4 has been tailor-made for this socket in order to ensure optimal compatibility.

• Cooler can be installed turned by 90°  
Coming with two different sets of mounting bars, the SecuFirm2™ system allows the users to choose the orientation of the cooler according to their preferences in order to ensure best compatibility and optimal alignment with the airflow path inside the case.

NM-AM4-UxS Kit Specification  
Socket Compatibility AMD AM4  
Cooler Compatibility NH-U14S NH-U12S NH-U9S  

Owners of Noctua NH-U14S, NH-U12S and NH-U9S CPU coolers can obtain the NM-AM4-UxS Mounting-Kit free of charge via this form. A proof of purchase (electronic version, photo or scan of the invoice) of both a Noctua CPU cooler and either a socket AM4 mainboard or socket AM4 CPU are required.*

The NM-AM4-UxS kit is compatible with the NH-U14S, NH-U12S and NH-U9S only (please choose the NM-AM4 kit for other models).

Name: Corsair H150 RGB CPU Liquid Cooler (Black)
Short description: The CORSAIR H150 RGB all-in-one liquid CPU cooler delivers strong, dependable cooling and stunning lighting effects.
Description:
Corsair H150 RGB CPU Liquid Cooler (Black)

Features

The CORSAIR H150 RGB all-in-one liquid CPU cooler delivers strong, dependable cooling and stunning lighting, with three CORSAIR SP120 RGB ELITE PWM fans, a 360mm radiator, and 37 RGB LEDs.

COOL CPU, COOLER LIGHTING

All-in-one CPU cooling that illuminates your PC with dramatic color, thanks to 120mm CORSAIR SP RGB ELITE PWM fans generating great airflow and vibrant RGB lighting.

FLEXIBLE MOTHERBOARD DIGITAL +5V ARGB SUPPORT

Conveniently control your lighting through compatible motherboards.

Concentrated Cooling with AirGuider

SP120 RGB ELITE PWM fans can ramp up to 1,500 RPM, and channel concentrated airflow to where it’s needed with AirGuide technology.

HIGH-PERFORMANCE COLD PLATE AND PUMP

Equipped with a thermally optimized copper cold plate and low-noise pump design for quiet cooling.

EASY TO INSTALL

Includes a modular, tool-free mounting bracket for quick and easy installation on all modern CPU sockets, including LGA 1200, 115X, 2066, and AM4.

Three Radiator Sizes

H55 RGB fits in standard 120mm fan mount locations for optimal compatibility, while H100 RGB and H150 RGB offer 240mm and 360mm sizes, respectively, for increased cooling performance.

Name: Scythe Big Shuriken 3 Quiet CPU Cooler
Short description: The third generation of the Big Shuriken CPU cooler features several important improvements, including a new asymmetrical design for better compatibility and enhanced cooling performance.
Description:
Scythe Big Shuriken 3 Out of stock. The third generation of the Big Shuriken CPU cooler comes with several important improvements, such as the new, asymmetrical heatsink design for unrestricted memory compatibility and the newly developed Kaze Flex 120 Slim PWM fan with 17 mm thickness. Users have the possibility to replace the pre-installed fan by using the supplied dedicated screw-set against an aftermarket fan with 25 mm thickness, if ever needed. Thanks to its six high quality, nickel-plated copper Heatpipes and the large cooling surface, Big Shuriken 3 is built to deliver superb cooling performance and outstanding compatibility to latest ITX and HTPC systems at a total height of only 69 mm.

Features  
• Asymmetrical Design for Outstanding Compatibility  
Big Shuriken 3 has been completely re-designed with the goal to significantly improve the compatibility. This has been achieved by shifting the base-plate to the sides in contrast to regular designs with centered base-plates. In order to avoid collisions with the I/O shields of motherboards, the entire cooling fin stack has been revamped. Thanks to this new asymmetrical heatsink design, Big Shuriken 3 is able to deliver unrestricted RAM compatibility and distinguishes itself as the perfect cooling solution for high-end HTPC and ITX systems.

• Kaze Flex 120 Slim PWM Fan  
In order to keep the Big Shuriken 3 as low as possible, the newly developed Slim fan from the Kaze Flex series with a height of 17 mm has been used. In spite of its reduced thickness, an average life-span of 100,000 hours is achieved thanks to the self-contained fluid dynamic bearing (FDB). Kaze Flex 120 Slim PWM inherits also the rubber decouplers for reduction of vibration transfer as well as the PWM fan control ability.

• Versatile Fan Mounting  
For the cases, where more performance is required and enough headroom for extra height is available, users are able to equip the Big Shuriken 3 with a regular aftermarket 120 mm case fan with 25 mm thickness. The required set of screws is part of the scope of delivery and allows a fast installation process out of the box.

• H.P.M.S. III Mounting System  
Big Shuriken 3 comes with the secure and user-friendly third generation Hyper Precision Mounting System, which centers around a preassembled mounting bar with spring-loaded screws to guarantee perfect contact pressure. In combination with an updated backplate and rubber / plastic spacers, the system is able to offer a convenient installation process and compatibility to all current sockets including socket AM4 from AMD™ and the socket LGA 2066 from Intel™.

Name: AMD Ryzen 7 7700X 4.5 GHz Eight-Core AM5 Processor (AMD-100-100000591WOF)

Description:
AMD Ryzen 7 7700X 4.5 GHz Eight-Core AM5 Processor (AMD-100-100000591WOF) - Local Warranty

Take your computing to the next level with the Ryzen 7 7700X 4.5 GHz Eight-Core AM5 Processor, which features eight cores and 16 threads to help quickly load and multitask demanding applications. Designed for socket AM5 motherboards using the powerful Zen 4 architecture, this enthusiast-grade Ryzen processor delivers significantly improved performance compared to its predecessor while maintaining high energy efficiency.

With a base clock speed of 4.5 GHz and a max boost clock speed of 5.4 GHz in addition to 32MB of L3 Cache, the Ryzen 7 7700X is built to deliver the power needed to smoothly handle tasks ranging from content creation to immersive gaming. You can boost performance further by overclocking this unlocked processor.

Other features include support for PCIe Gen 5 technology to take full advantage of high-bandwidth graphics cards and storage drives. The Ryzen 9 7950X3D also supports up to 128GB of 5200 MHz DDR5 ECC memory with compatible motherboards, which may be overclocked using AMD EXPO profiles for higher gaming performance.

This processor has a 120W TDP (Thermal Design Power) and does not include a cooling solution. This processor also includes integrated Radeon graphics.

• Precision Boost 2  
AMD Ryzen processors monitor the system's energy consumption, temperatures, and other factors to automatically raise clock speeds, allowing applications to perform faster.

• Precision Boost Overdrive  
Precision Boost Overdrive technology takes advantage of your compatible motherboard's design to boost clock speeds higher and for longer periods of time. It also allows you to overclock the processor at the touch of a button.

• AMD EXPO Technology  
The AMD Extended Profiles for Overclocking (AMD EXPO Technology) provides users with advanced profile settings for memory overclocking with supported modules.

• AMD Ryzen Master Utility Personalized Performance  
The AMD Ryzen Master Utility provides you with multiple custom profiles to store CPU, GPU, and memory configurations. Use it to configure performance parameters for the active cores and adjust memory times. You can also optimize general performance or fine tune your favorite applications.

• System Monitoring  
Monitor your system in real-time using the AMD Ryzen Master Utility, which features a histogram of per-core clock rates and temperature, including average and peak readings.

Name: AMD Ryzen Threadripper PRO 7975WX 4 GHz 32-Core sTR5 Processor (AMD-100-100000453WOF)
Short description: Cut through intensive workloads with a 4 GHz 32-core processor designed for high-performance workstations. Includes local warranty.
Description:
AMD Ryzen Threadripper PRO 7975WX 4 GHz 32-Core sTR5 Processor (AMD-100-100000453WOF) - Local Warranty

Cut through intensive workloads by equipping your workstation with the AMD Ryzen Threadripper PRO 7975WX 4 GHz 32-Core sTR5 Processor. Built using the 5nm Zen 4 architecture with the sTR5 socket, this 32-core / 64 thread processor is designed to deliver accelerated performance for professionals such as artists, architects, engineers, and data scientists. With a 4.0 GHz base clock speed, a 5.3 GHz boost frequency, and 128MB of L3 cache, this CPU significantly reduces rendering times for 8K videos, high-resolution photos, and 3D models. You can overclock this processor for greater performance.

The Ryzen Threadripper PRO 7975WX supports up to 128 PCI Express 5.0 lanes for high-speed throughput to compatible devices. It also supports eight-channel DDR5 ECC memory with up to 5200 MT/s transfer speeds that help efficiently run and multitask demanding applications.

Please note that a thermal solution is NOT included. A separately purchased dedicated graphics card is required. This processor is backed by a 3-year warranty.

• AMD Memory Guard  
AMD Ryzen Threadripper PRO processors include full, real-time system memory encryption to help defend against physical attacks should your computer be lost or stolen.

• AMD Secure Processor  
The dedicated security processor validates code before it is executed to help ensure data and application integrity. It helps protect your system & data from unauthorized software and applications running on your device.

• AMD Shadow Stack  
This robust security approach helps to protect against control-flow attacks by checking the normal program stack against a hardware-stored copy and enabling Microsoft Hardware Enforced Stack Protection in Windows 11.

• AMD Platform Secure Boot  
Platform secure boot helps defend against threats to firmware. It is designed to provide protection in response to growing firmware-level remote attacks being seen across the industry. AMD Secure Boot extends the AMD silicon root of trust to help protect the system by establishing an unbroken chain of trust from the AMD silicon root of trust to the BIOS. The UEFI secure boot helps continue the chain of trust from the system BIOS to the OS Bootloader. This feature helps defend against remote attackers seeking to embed malware into firmware.

• Microsoft Pluton Security Processor  
Microsoft Pluton delivers built-in, next-generation security including Trusted Platform Module 2.0 for scenarios like Windows Hello and BitLocker. Designed for today's ever-changing security landscape, Pluton supports Zero Trust and helps ensure system integrity from the moment the device starts, with nonstop protection of user credentials, identities, personal data, and encryption keys. Pluton is always up to date to help protect against current and emerging threats.

• AMD PRO Manageability  
A robust manageability feature set simplifies deployment, imaging, and management of an ever-growing and changing fleet. Whether devices are being managed in network or through the cloud with endpoint management tools, at any point in the lifecycle from deployment to retirement, AMD PRO manageability provides a unified set of tools to manage systems across the entire organization.

• AMD EXPO  
The AMD Extended Profiles for Overclocking (AMD EXPO Technology) was developed to allow for user-friendly memory overclocking support of all types of memory, giving users an easy path to accelerated power to achieve accelerated memory in their system.

Revolutionize Your Tech: Explore AMD AI Data Center Business Computing and Gaming Solution

Short description: Cut through intensive workloads with a 4 GHz 32-core sTR5 processor, backed by a local warranty for reliable performance in demanding tasks.
Description:
AMD Ryzen Threadripper 7970X 4 GHz 32-Core sTR5 Processor (AMD-100-100001351WOF) - Local Warranty

Cut through intensive workloads by equipping your workstation with the AMD Ryzen Threadripper 7970X 4 GHz 32-Core sTR5 Processor. Built using the 5nm Zen 4 architecture with the sTR5 socket, this 32-core / 64 thread processor is designed to deliver accelerated performance for professional content creators and enthusiasts. With a 4 GHz base clock speed, a 5.3 GHz boost frequency, and 128MB of L3 cache, this CPU significantly reduces rendering times for 8K videos, high-resolution photos, and 3D models. You can overclock this processor for greater performance.

The Ryzen Threadripper 7970X supports up to 48 PCI Express 5.0 lanes for high-speed throughput to compatible devices. It also supports quad-channel DDR5 ECC memory with up to 5200 MT/s transfer speeds that help efficiently run and multitask demanding applications.

Please note that a thermal solution is NOT included. A separately purchased dedicated graphics card is required. This processor is backed by a 3-year warranty.

AMD EXPO  
The AMD Extended Profiles for Overclocking (AMD EXPO Technology) was developed to allow for user-friendly memory overclocking support of all types of memory, giving users an easy path to accelerated power to achieve accelerated memory in their system.

Revolutionize Your Tech: Explore AMD AI Data Center Business Computing and Gaming Solution

Name: SanDisk 480GB Extreme Portable SSD - SDSSDE30-480G-G25
Short description: Fast NVMe solid-state performance in a portable, durable design with 480GB storage capacity.
Description:
SanDisk 480GB Extreme Portable SSD - SDSSDE30-480G-G25

SanDisk 480GB Extreme Portable SSD - SSDSSDE30-480G-G25

Fast NVMe solid state performance in a portable, high-capacity drive  
Drop protection, IP65 water and dust resistance, X-ray and shock proofing  
Help keep private content private with the included hardware encryption  

Your life’s an adventure. The SanDisk Extreme Portable SSD fits your mobile lifestyle and accelerates every move. Tested and compatible with iPhone 15 Plus/Pro/Max so you can free up space on your smartphone.

Powerful yet Portable  
Get fast NVMe™ solid state performance featuring 1050 MB/s read and 1000 MB/s write speeds in a portable, high-capacity drive that’s perfect for creating amazing content or capturing incredible footage.

Tested to Be Relentlessly Reliable  
We devote hundreds of hours of rigorous testing to help make sure your drive is worthy of your best work — and so you know your precious files are in good hands.

Back Up and Live Fearlessly  
Stay unfazed during power failures, virus attacks, and even natural disasters, because you have an extra copy of what matters most, stored on a drive designed for reliability.

Tough Enough to Take with You  
Up to three-meter drop protection and IP65 water and dust resistance mean this durable drive can take a beating.

It Goes Where You Go  
Use the handy carabiner loop to attach the drive to your belt loop or backpack for extra security when you’re out in the world.

Put a Lock on Your Files  
Help keep private content private with the included password protection featuring 256‐bit AES hardware encryption.

Professional-Grade Storage  
From SanDisk, the brand professional photographers worldwide trust to handle their best shots and footage.

SanDisk Memory Zone App for Easy File Management  
Available from the Google Play™ store, the SanDisk Memory Zone app lets you unlock, access and back up your phone's files in one location. It can also automatically move files from your device to your SSD to free up space.

Name: Custom - Saffiano Leather Strap
Short description: Get started on your personalized Saffiano leather strap. Customize options such as strap size and stitching color.
Description: Get started here on your personalised Saffiano leather strap. If you're here to customise simple options such as the sizing of your strap, stitching colour and style, kindly select the "Made to Measure" option. We have also denoted what are the Default choice in each dropdown menu for your ease of use. If you're an advance user and want the ability to customise every single aspect of your strap, kindly select the "Bespoke" option. If you do not need any customisation and want to buy a strap from our regular collection, click here. Please note current turnaround times for customised strap is 8-10 working days.

Name: Tactical Sailcloth - Black (Blue Stitches)
Short description: This tactical sailcloth strap is made from quick-drying patterned canvas. It features blue stitching to match your watch dial.
Description:
Our tactical sail cloth strap is made from quick drying patterned canvas. The stitching on this particular strap is blue to match the dial of your watch. Pairs exceptionally well on your pilot watch, diver and chronographs.

Features  
• Quick drying sail cloth material on both upper and inner lining. Most sailcloth straps on the market comes with an inner leather lining which brings the waterproof ability of the strap into question. Our tactical sailcloth strap is fully waterproof  
• Padded strap with right balance of durability and flexibility  
• Premium buckle hardware construction with brushed and polished surface on different facets  

Specifications  
Length of strap 75 mm (measured to buckle end) // 115 mm (watch end)  
Buckle material 316L Stainless Steel  
Strap thickness Approximately 2.5 mm  
Fit Suitable for wrist sizes 6 to 7.8 inches  

Installation  
A spring-bar tool is required for the installation of the strap.  
Please note that fatter spring bars (i.e. Seiko stock spring bars) will not fit this strap. If you require regular spring bars please kindly indicate in the notes during checkout and we will mail you a set for free.

Name: Lenovo Ideapad Gaming3 16IAH7 with 16in WUXGA (1920x1200) 165Hz Display, Intel Core I7-12650H, 16GB RAM,512GB SSD, NVIDIA RTX 3060 6GB GDDR6,Windows 11,English - Arabic Keyboard Onyx Grey
Short description: Built for the next generation of gaming, 12th Gen Intel Core processors deliver superior performance and flexibility.
Description:
From the manufacturer. Built for the next generation of gaming 12th Gen Intel Core processors give you superior gaming performance while delivering the flexibility to seamlessly multitask. Innovative new architecture matches the right core to the right workload, so background tasks won’t interrupt your game. Giving you the freedom to chat, browse, stream, edit, record, and play without skipping a beat.

The ultimate play GeForce RTX 30 Series GPUs deliver the ultimate performance for gamers and creators. They’re powered by Ampere—NVIDIA’s 2nd Gen RTX architecture—with new RT Cores, Tensor Cores, and streaming multiprocessors for the most realistic ray-traced graphics and cutting-edge AI features.

Play 100+ high-quality games with Game Pass included Play over 100 high-quality games with your new IdeaPad Gaming laptop and three months of Xbox Game Pass-including EA Play. With new games added all the time, there’s always something new to play. Download and play in full fidelity or play console games from the cloud with connected controller. See xbox.com/subscriptionterms.

Quick, quiet, & cool Cool quickly and quietly with the IdeaPad Gaming 3i Gen 7 laptop. Enjoy cooling improvements with features like keyboard air intake across the board. More effective ventilation rates improve on the previous generation’s performance by 20%, with 10% increased fan airflow for some cool and quiet gaming.

New sleek and streamlined design Onyx Grey and Glacier White colorways compliment a laptop designed to be slim, sleek, and sexy. The signature Lenovo gaming keyboard has media controls and a number pad, with optional 4-zone RGB backlighting. Streamline your cables with a rear dashboard—keeping things clean. Throw in a webcam privacy shutter for extra safety and security, and you’ve got one slick gaming machine.

Name: Lenovo ThinkPad E14 Gen 5 i5-1335U/16GB/512GB SSD (21JK0067SG)
Short description: 3 years local warranty no longer available. New or similar items available.
Description:
Lenovo ThinkPad E14 Gen 5 i5-1335U/16GB/512GB SSD (21JK0067SG) - 3 Years Local Warranty No Longer Available. New or Similar items below: Lenovo ThinkPad E14 Gen 6 U5-125U/8GB/512GB SSD (21M7003MSG) Lenovo ThinkPad E14 Gen 6 U5-125U/16GB/512GB SSD (21M7003JSG) Lenovo ThinkPad E14 Gen 6 U7-155U/8GB/512GB SSD (21M7003LSG) Lenovo ThinkPad E14 Gen 6 U7-155U/16GB/512GB SSD (21M7003KSG)

Designed for easy travel, the 14" ThinkPad E14 Gen 5 Laptop from Lenovo helps you stay productive from almost anywhere. Featuring intel processor with a total of up to 32GB of DDR4 memory and up to 512GB M.2 PCIe SSD, this laptop delivers the performance to take on everyday productivity tasks. Powered by integrated Radeon Graphics, the 1920 x 1200 resolution display provides smooth visuals and more vertical viewing space than traditional Full HD screens. With Wi-Fi 6 support and a Gigabit Ethernet port, you can connect to compatible networks for smooth video chat experiences using the Full HD webcam, dual mic array, and Dolby Atmos enhanced 2W stereo speaker system. Both the 10 Gb/s USB-C 3.2 Gen 2 port and the 5 Gb/s USB-C 3.2 Gen 1 port support external displays and power delivery. A built-in fingerprint reader allows you to securely log into your computer. Windows 11 Pro is preinstalled.

Comfortable Experience  
The ThinkPad E14 Gen 5 laptop includes a large, comfortable keyboard with keys that have optimal travel and spacing, helping to prevent accidental input. The 14" IPS display has hardware-based Low Blue Light certification for clear, comfortable viewing.

Extensive Connectivity  
In addition to the USB-C 3.2 Gen 2 port, the ThinkPad E14 Gen 5 includes one USB-C and two USB-A 3.2 Gen 1 ports to quickly transfer data with compatible peripherals. Connect external displays to the HDMI 1.4b port for presentations and an extended viewing space. Plugging a headset into the 3.5mm audio jack provides you with listening privacy.

Built Tough  
Meeting the MIL-STD 810H military standards for reliability and durability, this laptop is designed to operate in environments that range from Arctic wilderness to desert dust storms.

Windows 11 Pro  
Microsoft simplified the design and user experience with Windows 11. It has a modern, clean design with a new Start Menu position. Snap Layouts, Groups, and Desktops allow you to multitask with ease. Microsoft has also integrated some of their apps, such as Microsoft Teams. The redesigned Microsoft Store makes it easier to look for supported apps. The Pro version of Windows 11 includes all the features that Windows 11 Home offers plus many designed specifically for business users, including Hyper-V virtualization, BitLocker disk encryption, and remote desktop access.

Detailed Specification  
ThinkPad E14 Gen5:  
• INTEL CORE I5-1340P PROCESSOR 1.9GHZ (12MB L3 CACHE, UP TO 4.6GHZ,12C, 16T)  
• 8GB Soldered DDR4-3200 + 8GB SO-DIMM DDR4-3200 / 512GB SSD M.2 2242 G4 TLC OPAL  
• Fingerprint Reader  
• BK 3Cell 47Wh Internal / 65W USB-C LC 90% 3Pin BK UK  
• Intel AX211 2x2ax 6E+BT WW / Backlit KYB English  
• Windows 11 Professional / English

Name: Lenovo ThinkPad L14 Gen 4 i7-1355U/8GB/512GB SSD (21H1005RSG)
Short description: 3 years local warranty no longer available. New or similar items available.
Description:
Lenovo ThinkPad L14 Gen 4 i7-1355U/8GB/512GB SSD (21H1005RSG) - 3 Years Local Warranty No Longer Available. New or Similar items below: Lenovo ThinkPad L14 Gen 5 U7-155U/8GB/512GB SSD (21L1004FSG) Lenovo ThinkPad L14 Gen 5 U7-155U/16GB/512GB SSD (21L1004GSG)

Easily complete your business-level tasks whether you are in the office or working from home with the Lenovo 14" ThinkPad L14 Gen 4 Notebook. Offering robust connectivity and ample power, you can run a wide range of business-level software and even enjoy some of your favorite streaming media, giving you the best of both worlds.

Thunderbolt 4  
Turn your ThinkPad into a fully operational workstation with one Thunderbolt 4 port. Featuring the reversible USB Type-C connector, you can transfer data with speeds up to 40 Gb/s as well as power external devices, making this ideal for storage arrays. Built-in DisplayPort technology enables you to also send a video signal to an external display so you can extend your screen real estate. You also get daisy chaining capabilities, allowing you to link several devices together for a clean and convenient workstation setup.

Connectivity  
Connect a wide range of peripherals to your ThinkPad with two USB-A 3.2 Gen 1 ports, delivering data transfer speeds up to 5 Gb/s, suitable for managing data on external storage devices. Conduct presentations and support external displays with the HDMI port. Listen to your conference calls or streaming media privately with the 3.5mm combo audio jack. A USB-C 3.2 Gen 2 port gives you up to 10 Gb/s data transfer speeds, suitable for high-powered devices.

Enhanced Security  
A Kensington Nano Security Slot enables you to use various cable locking mechanisms so you can secure your ThinkPad to permanent fixtures for added security. An integrated fingerprint reader protects your system from potential threats, keeping your personal data safe and sound from unauthorized users. You also get TPM 2.0 and tamper detection technology that work together and notify you if someone accesses your internal hardware without your authorization.

Featuring Intel vPro and powered by the 13th Gen Intel Core processors, these PCs are built for what IT needs with the power, responsiveness, and battery life that business multitaskers want.

Detailed Specification  
ThinkPad L14 Gen 4 RPL: 14" WUXGA (1920x1200) IPS 300nits Anti-glare, 45% NTSC  
Intel Core i7-1355U, 10C (2P + 8E) / 12T, P-core up to 5.0GHz, E-core up to 3.7GHz, 12MB  
Integrated Intel Iris Xe Graphics Functions as UHD Graphics  
8GB SO-DIMM DDR4-3200 / 512GB SSD M.2 2242 PCIe 4.0x4 NVMe Opal 2.0  
HD 720p with Privacy Shutter / Fingerprint Reader (Integrated with Power button)  
Integrated Li-Polymer 47Wh battery, supports Rapid Charge (charge up to 80% in 1hr)  
Intel Wi-Fi 6E AX211, 11ax 2x2 + BT5.1 / Backlit KYB English  
Windows 11 Pro, English / NO Recovery Media

Powerful Performance – Take on everything from professional-quality editing to action-packed gaming with ease. The Apple M1 chip with an 8-core CPU delivers up to 3.5x faster performance than the previous generation while using way less power.

Name: ACER A515-57G-70GT- CI7(1260P) -RTX 2050 4G-15.6"FHD- 8GRAM-512GB SSD- Gray
Short description: Finding a gaming laptop that is budget-friendly and offers stable performance can be challenging, but this model delivers both with a powerful processor, dedicated graphics, and ample memory and storage.
Description:
The notion of finding a gaming laptop that's both budget-friendly and offers stable performance might seem like a challenge these days. However, fear not, as we've got the perfect solution for you: the Acer A515-57G-70GT. And what truly sets it apart? Picture this: an impressive 12th gen i7 (1260p) processor and an RTX 2050 working together, forming a dynamic duo for your gaming endeavors. The icing on the cake? An IPS panel with 275 nits of brightness and 70% sRGB coverage – a delightful surprise at this price point. And that's not all; with a battery life that can keep you untethered for up to 8 hours and the added convenience of a fingerprint sensor for work and gaming security. And a backlit for more elegant design, this laptop covers all bases. So, what's the verdict? The Acer A515-57G-70GT is not just a gaming laptop; it's a game-changer that ticks all the right boxes without going out of budget.

Name: Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Carbon Gen 11 i7-1365U/16GB/1TB SSD (21HM008GSG )
Short description: 3 years local warranty no longer available. New or similar items available.
Description:
Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Carbon Gen 11 i7-1365U/16GB/1TB SSD (21HM008GSG) - 3 Years Local Warranty No Longer Available. New or Similar items below: Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Carbon Gen 12 U7-155U/32GB/1TB SSD (21KC0083SG) Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Carbon Gen 12 U7-165U/64GB/1TB SSD (21KC009RSG)

Efficiently complete your business tasks with the robust and powerful Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Carbon Gen 11 Notebook. Sporting a lightweight and compact design, the ThinkPad X1 Carbon Gen 11 increases performance and enhances productivity whether you are in the office or on the road.

Connectivity  
Connect a wide range of peripherals to your ThinkPad with the high-powered dual Thunderbolt 4 ports, which boast up to 40 Gb/s data transfer speeds as well as Power Delivery and DisplayPort technology so you can connect storage arrays, displays, and more. Two USB-A 3.2 Gen 1 ports give you up to 5 Gb/s data transfer speeds, suitable for thumb drives, mice, keyboards, and more. A single HDMI port allows you to expand your screen real estate for multi-monitor support or conduct a presentation with ease.

WUXGA Display  
The 14" 1920 x 1200 In-Plane Switching (IPS) display gives you vivid colorization with 400 nits brightness and 100% sRGB color gamut space.

Enhanced Audio  
Designed for both work and play, the ThinkPad includes several integrated speakers consisting of two 2W woofers and two 0.8W tweeters for crisp sound. A 3.5mm combo audio jack allows you to listen to your media privately.

Integrated webcam  
Integrated webcam and quad-microphone array enables you to take part in various video calls with friends, family, and coworkers. The camera boasts high 1080p resolution for clear visuals while the quad-microphones ensure others can hear you. Additionally, a privacy shutter can be engaged to prevent others from potentially spying on you for additional peace of mind.

Integrated Security  
Keep your data safe and secure with a variety of built-in functions such as the fingerprint reader found in the power button for a biometric sign-in solution. TPM 2.0 technology prevents startup if the system detects unauthorized access. You can connect a variety of mechanical cable locks with the single Kensington Nano Security Slot.

Windows 11 Pro  
Microsoft simplified the design and user experience with Windows 11. It has a modern, clean design with a new Start Menu position. Snap Layouts, Groups, and Desktops allow you to multitask with ease. Microsoft has also integrated some of their apps, such as Microsoft Teams. The redesigned Microsoft Store makes it easier to look for supported apps. The Pro version of Windows 11 includes all the features that Windows 11 Home offers plus many designed specifically for business users, including Hyper-V virtualization, BitLocker disk encryption, and remote desktop access.

Detailed Specification  
ThinkPad X1 Carbon Gen11:  
14" WUXGA (1920x1200) IPS 400nits Anti-glare, 100% sRGB, Low Power  
Intel Core i7-1365U, 10C (2P + 8E) / 12T, P-core 1.8 / 5.2GHz, E-core 1.3 / 3.9GHz, 12MB  
Graphic: Integrated Intel Iris Xe Graphics  
16GB Soldered LPDDR5-6400 / 1TB SSD M.2 2280 PCIe® 4.0x4 Performance NVMe Opal 2.0  
FHD 1080p + IR Hybrid with Privacy Shutter / Fingerprint Reader Integrated  
Li-Polymer 57Wh battery, supports Rapid Charge (charge up to 80% in 1hr) with 65W AC adapter  
Intel Wi-Fi 6E AX211, 11ax 2x2 + BT5.1 / Backlit KYB English  
Windows 11 Pro, English / NO Recovery Media

Name: Lenovo ThinkPad P16 Gen 2 i7-13700HX/32GB/512GB SSD/RTX 2000 (21FA0016SG)
Short description: Easily complete business-level tasks in the office with a powerful Intel i7 processor, 32 GB RAM, and 512 GB SSD. Includes a 3-year local warranty.
Description:
Lenovo ThinkPad P16s Gen 2 i7-1360P/32GB/512GB SSD (21HK001GSG) - 3 Years Local Warranty

Easily complete your business-level tasks whether you are in the office or working from home with the Lenovo 16" ThinkPad P16 Gen 2 Workstation Notebook. Offering robust connectivity and ample power, you can run a wide range of business-level software and even enjoy some of your favorite streaming media, giving you the best of both worlds.

Thunderbolt 4  
Turn your ThinkPad into a fully operational workstation with dual Thunderbolt 4 ports. Featuring the reversible USB Type-C form factor, you can transfer data with speeds up to 40 Gb/s as well as power external devices, making this ideal for storage arrays. Built-in DisplayPort technology enables you to also send a video signal to an external display so you can extend your screen real estate. You also get daisy chaining capabilities, allowing you to link several devices together for a clean and convenient workstation setup.

Connectivity  
Connect a wide range of peripherals to your ThinkPad with two USB-A 3.2 Gen 1 ports, delivering data transfer speeds up to 5 Gb/s, suitable for managing data on external storage devices. Conduct presentations and support external displays with the HDMI port. Listen to your conference calls or streaming media privately with the 3.5mm combo audio jack.

Enhanced Security  
A Kensington Nano Security Slot enables you to use various cable locking mechanisms so you can secure your ThinkPad to permanent fixtures for added security. An integrated fingerprint reader protects your system from potential threats, keeping your personal data safe and sound from unauthorized users. You also get TPM 2.0 and tamper detection technology that work together and notify you if someone accesses your internal hardware without your authorization.

Featuring Intel vPro and powered by the 13th Gen Intel Core processors, these PCs are built for what IT needs with the power, responsiveness, and battery life that business multitaskers want.

Detailed Specification:

Name: LENOVO THINKPAD T14S, 14"FHD TOUCH, RYZEN 7 PRO 6850U, 16GB, 512GB SSD, W11PRO, BLACK
Short description: Lightweight and slim, this powerful laptop offers true mobility and the freedom to work from anywhere.
Description:
The lightweight with real power & mobility  
Being so light and slim, the powerful ThinkPad T14s Gen 3 (14" AMD) gives you the freedom to work from anywhere. It's built on high-performance AMD processors (Ryzen 7 PRO) and AMD Radeon graphics. With its vast amounts of next-gen memory and storage, this business laptop breezes through any task. What's more, its weight starts at 1.22 kg / 2.71 lbs so you can take it everywhere.

Easy on the eyes, even better on the ears  
The ThinkPad T14s Gen 3 has many display options, including Dolby Vision and certified Eyesafe low blue-light technology. Each display boasts an expansive 16:10 aspect ratio, giving you more vertical screen to work with. This laptop also has a superb Dolby Audio speaker system with Dolby Voice AI noise-suppressing technology, plus an FHD + IR webcam option.

Designed for the modern professional  
The ThinkPad T14s Gen 3 has all you need to get more done, remotely. It can run all day on a single charge and when the battery does run low, it can be rapidly recharged. There's an array of ports, including HDMI and USB-C, plus the option of blazing-fast Wi-Fi 6E connectivity. It also has a backlit keyboard with TrackPoint and TrackPad for easier typing.

Smarter security, by far  
To help safeguard your data, this business laptop has an integrated Power-On touch fingerprint reader and enhanced Microsoft chip-to-cloud security technology. It also has ThinkShield, a comprehensive portfolio of end-to-end protection, including advanced data encryption. And with the PrivacyGuard display, you can keep prying eyes away from your screen.

Built with the planet in mind  
Even with all its productivity- and creativity-enhancing features, this ThinkPad was designed with the planet in mind. It's made with recycled post-consumer content (PCC), including plastic and natural materials, in various components, including the speaker enclosure, battery compartment, and adapter. It also comes with recycled and/or sustainably forested packaging and recycled PCC cardboard cushioning.

Proven reliability & durability  
We use the US Department of Defense's MIL-STD 810H standards to create a balance of reliability and durability for our ThinkPad laptops. Measured against 12 stringent standards and more than 200 quality checks, they're able to run in the harshest of conditions, from the Arctic wilderness to desert dust storms. Our tests also include temperature, pressure, humidity, vibration, and more.

Name: ASUS Laptop E410MA-BV244T (Peacock Blue) Dual Core Intel Celeron N4020 Processor 1.1GHz, 4GB DDR4, Intel UHD Graphics 600, 256GB SSD, 14-inch FHD, Windows 10, Eng-Arb-KB (Style: Single)
Short description: Fresh, bold design with a unique ASUS lid motif and color-blocked Enter key. Compact 1.3 kg chassis for ultimate mobility.
Description:
From the manufacturer  
E410 E410  
Fresh, bold design with unique ASUS lid motif and color-blocked Enter key  
Compact 1.3 kg-light chassis for ultimate mobility  
Innovative NumberPad for convenient numerical input  
Up to 12 hours battery for all-day usage  
180° lay-flat hinge makes it easy to share content  
NanoEdge display for immersive viewing  
Fanless design keeps noise levels down  

Introducing the ASUS E410  
Move with style  
Life’s all about finding the right balance, and ASUS E410 delivers just that. Lightweight and compact, it sports a stylish new look that fits right in with your dynamic lifestyle. Designed for daily computing and productivity tasks, and ASUS E410 gives you everything you need for work or play.  

See the difference  
ASUS E410 has a youthful vibe that sets it apart. The lid’s detailed with modern slashes that are accompanied by a unique motif made up of a deconstructed ASUS badge. The bold look continues inside, where a bright yellow Enter key takes center stage. It’s something never seen before in laptop design.  

Get it done, anywhere  
With the compact and lightweight ASUS E410, productivity’s always within reach. It slips easily into your backpack or small bag so you can get schoolwork done or create content wherever you are.  

Go for your goals  
Featuring Windows 10 Home, with a Intel processor and with a 256 GB PCIe SSD, ASUS E410 is well-equipped to help you achieve your goals. And the fanless design keeps noise levels down, so you won’t be distracted when working on a spreadsheet or watching a movie.  

Innovative NumberPad  
The new ASUS NumberPad makes number-crunching a whole lot easier. Everything you need from a physical keypad is printed on the touchpad, simply tap the icon to turn it on.  

Keep on going  
ASUS E410 lets you leave your heavy power adaptor at home. Its 12-hour, day-long battery life gives you the flexibility to work or play anywhere.  

Easy idea sharing  
A cleverly designed 180° lay-flat hinge makes it easy to share content or collaborate with friends. And the innovative thin-bezel NanoEdge display provides more usable onscreen space for immersive viewing. It also enables a larger screen to fit into a smaller chassis, giving you a laptop with a more compact footprint.

Name: ASUS 2022 Newest TUF Dash 15.6" FHD 144Hz Gaming Laptop – Intel Core i7 12650H (10 Cores) - DDR5 - RTX 3070 MUX– Thunderbolt 4, WiFi 6, Win11, Black, w/HDMI (16GB DDR5 | 512GB PCIe SSD) (Color: ‎16GB DDR5 | 512GB PCIe SSD)
Short description: The ASUS TUF Dash 15 offers a premium gaming experience with a 15.6" FHD 144Hz display, Intel Core i7 12650H 10-core processor, 16GB DDR5 RAM, and 512GB PCIe SSD. It features an RTX 3070 with MUX, Thunderbolt 4, WiFi 6, HDMI, and runs Windows 11 in a sleek black design.
Description:
Overview: ASUS TUF Dash 15 Gaming Laptop gives you a premium, yet budget friendly gaming experience on Windows 11. The TUF Dash 15 packs a 10-core Intel Core i7-12650H CPU and NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3070 GPU into a super thin gaming laptop. Enjoy a fast 144Hz refresh rate, wrapped in a light 4.41 lbs chassis. The future is thin and light.

Display: 15.6” FHD 144Hz IPS Display. The 144Hz Full HD 1920×1080 display features adaptive sync to minimize screen tearing, while playing your favorite games.

Processor: 12th Generation Intel Core i7-12650H 10 Cores 16 threads are ready to handle the latest AAA games.

Operating System: Windows 11 Operating System Family, friends, passions, music, creations, games Windows 11 is the one place for it all. With a fresh new feel and tools that make it easier to be efficient, it has what you need for whatever s next.

• dual-channel, DDR5 4800Mhz system memory

Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 3070 8GB GDDR6 Graphics - Enjoy all your favorite games in stunning detail

Wireless Connectivity, Bluetooth Wireless/Wired connectivity (Wi-Fi 6), BT 5.0

Backlit Keyboard: Work or game in low light settings with ease.

Weighs 4.41 lbs and Measures 0.78” Thin: TUF Dash 15 is a true featherweight for its class, weighing in at just 4.41 lbs and only 0.78” thin. This extremely lightweight chassis means the TUF Dash is exceptionally portable, fitting in even small bags and carrying cases.

Robust Connectivity with Thunderbolt 4: TUF Dash 15 is ripe with connectivity. With a dedicated USB Type-C with Thunderbolt 4 support, one USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-C port, two USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A ports, and an RJ45 LAN port, the machine has excellent options even for high speed external devices.

Ports:  
• 2x USB 3.2 Type A Port  
• 1x HDMI 2.0 Output  
• 1x Headphone Jack  
• 1x USB Type C Charging Port  
• 1x USB 3.2 Type C Port  
• 1x Ethernet Port

Battery: 90 Wh 4-cell Li-on polymer battery life Power Supply Maximum Wattage 200 watts

Additional Information:  
Dimensions (WxHxD): 13.94 x 9.88 x 0.78 inches  
Approximate Weight: 4.41 pounds.

Name: Apple MacBook Air 13 M2 8-Core 8GB/256GB MLY13
Short description: Prepare for takeoff with the M2 chip, the next generation of Apple silicon, delivering enhanced speed and performance.
Description:
Apple Macbook Air M2 MLY13 Features

Performance  
Prepare for takeoff. The M2 chip starts the next generation of Apple silicon, with even more of the speed and power efficiency of M1. So you can get more done faster with a more powerful 8‑core CPU. Create captivating images and animations with up to a 10-core GPU. Work with more streams of 4K and 8K ProRes video with the high‑performance media engine. And keep working — or playing — all day and into the night with up to 18 hours of battery life.

More speed for all your apps.  
All your go-to apps run lightning fast in macOS — including Microsoft 365 and many of your favorite iOS apps. And with over 10,000 apps and plug-ins optimized for Apple silicon, your creative future is wide open.

All together now.  
Make and receive iPhone calls on your Mac. Use your iPad as a second display. Unlock your Mac with your Apple Watch. It’s like they were all made for each other. Because they were.

Speedy. Substantial. Storage.  
With up to a 2 TB superfast SSD, MacBook Air lets you bring your photos, movies, music, and documents with you — and open them in a flash.

Create to your heart’s content.  
Thanks to the high-performance media engine on the M2 chip, you can play and edit even more streams of 4K and 8K ProRes video — including 4K ProRes video shot on iPhone 13 Pro.

Keep it secret. Keep it safe.  
Apple silicon and macOS bring advanced built-in security to help defend against malware and viruses. And Mac is designed to give you the freedom to choose what you share and how you share it.

Liquid Retina display  
To be clear, it’s gorgeous. The breathtaking 13.6-inch Liquid Retina display is the biggest — and brightest — ever on MacBook Air, with support for 1 billion colors. Text is supercrisp, and photos and movies more brilliant and vivid, with rich contrast and sharp detail.

Short description: Windows 11 offers a fresh new feel and tools designed for family, friends, passions, music, creations, and games—all in one place.

Windows 11 Operating System  
Family friends passions music creations games? Windows 11 is the one place for it all. With a fresh new feel and tools that make it easier to be efficient it has what you need for whatever’s next.  

• 16 FHD 165Hz Display

AMD Radeon RX7700S V8G for an ultrafast GPU to fuel your games.  

• 16GB of next generation DDR5 4800Mhz system memory  
Boasting a 16GB capacity normally reserved for high-end workstations blazing fast 4800MHz DDR5 memory.  

• 512GB Solid State Drive (PCI-e)  
Save files fast and store more data and games. With massive amounts of storage and advanced communication power PCIe SSDs are great for major gaming applications multiple servers daily backups and more.

TUF Gaming A16 is a true lightweight weighing in at just 4.85lbs and only 0.87 thin.

• Crystal Clear Audio  
Dual speakers with Dolby Atmos support provide excellent stereo sound for your favorite content. For voice communications AI Noise Cancelation keep comms clear for both you and your teammates even in noisy environments.

The Acer Spin 1 is a portable 11.6” touch convertible laptop with a beautiful HD display that delivers maximum security and streamlined performance. It smoothly converts between four modes—laptop, display, tent or tablet—by simply “spinning” the 360° hinge into position. Ultra slim and super light, this boundless device is fast and fun—and the battery has enough juice to power you though every computing journey. With Windows 10, you’ll experience fast start-ups, a familiar yet expanded Start menu, and great new ways to get stuff done. And with automatic updates enabled, you get all the latest features and security hassle-free. Works exclusively with apps from the Microsoft Store. Work, play, share, and draw all in one device!

Short description: Designed to do it all on the Intel Evo platform with an 11th generation Intel Core i5 processor. Features a 13.3-inch FHD OLED touchscreen, 8GB RAM, 512GB SSD, and runs Windows 11 Home. Slim and lightweight at 13.9 mm thin.
