Name: HPE Aruba 6100 48 Port Gigabit Managed Network Switch with SFP+ (JL676A)
Short description: Designed for branch offices, mid-market enterprises, and small to medium businesses, this 48-port gigabit managed network switch includes SFP+ ports for high-speed connectivity.
Description:
HPE Aruba 6100 48 Port Gigabit Managed Network Switch with SFP+ (JL676A)  
Designed as the ideal fit for branch offices, mid-market enterprises, and small-to-medium businesses, the Aruba 6100 48-Port Gigabit Managed Network Switch helps to expand your network capacity with 48 Gigabit Ethernet ports, supporting access points, computers, and other devices. Powered by a 1016 MHz Cortex A9 dual-core processor with 4 GB of memory, this rack-mountable entry level Layer 2 switch also delivers smooth data transfers with a 176 Gb/s switching capacity and 98.6 Mpps forwarding rate. Four SFP+ slots are also included, supporting 10G fiber uplinks. A 65W power supply is pre-installed. The ArubaOS-CX modular, database-driven operating system helps to simplify a wide range of critical and complex network tasks.

AOS-CX  
The Aruba CX 6100 Switch Series is based on AOS-CX, a modern, database-driven operating system that is built on a modular Linux architecture. This operating system provides the following unique capabilities:  
• Easy access to all network configuration state information.  
• REST APIs for fine-grained programmability of network tasks.  
• A micro-services architecture that enables full integration with other workflow systems and services.  
• All software processes communicate with the database rather than each other, ensuring near real-time state and resiliency.

Aruba ASICs  
Aruba's programmable ASICs are purpose-built to allow for a tighter integration of switch hardware and software within campus and data center architectures to optimize performance and capacity. Based on the Aruba ASIC architecture, the CX 6100 switch series offers features such as low latency, increased packet buffering, and adaptive power consumption.

Aruba Central Management  
Flexible cloud-based or on-premises management for unified network operations of wired, WLAN, SD-WAN, and public cloud infrastructure. Designed to simplify day zero through day two operations with streamlined workflows. Switch management capabilities include configuration, onboarding, monitoring, troubleshooting, and reporting.

Aruba NetEdit  
With Aruba NetEdit, IT teams can orchestrate multiple switch configuration changes for smooth end-to-end service rollouts. Aruba NetEdit introduces automation that allows for rapid network-wide changes and ensures policy conformance post network updates. Intelligent capabilities include search, edit, validation (including conformance checking), deployment, and audit features. Capabilities include centralized configuration with validation, simultaneous viewing and editing of multiple configurations, customized validation tests, automated large-scale configuration deployment, and network health and topology visibility via Aruba NAE integration.

Simplify Adds, Moves & Changes  
Reduce manual IT operation tasks around initial deployment or ongoing configuration changes to accommodate adds, moves, and changes with colorless ports using local user roles and local-MAC-Authentication (LMA). Instead of statically pre-configuring access ports to VLANs and maintaining the switch port to VLAN mapping, colorless ports can automatically apply the role/policy required.

Maximum wireless signal rates are the physical rates derived from IEEE Standard 802.11 specifications. Actual wireless data throughput and wireless coverage are not guaranteed and will vary as a result of 1) environmental factors, including building materials, physical objects, and obstacles, 2) network conditions, including local interference, volume and density of traffic, product location, network complexity, and network overhead, and 3) client limitations, including rated performance, location, connection, quality, and client condition. Name: HPE Aruba 6100 24 Port 370W PoE+ Gigabit Managed Network Switch with SFP+ (JL677A)
Short description: Designed for branch offices and mid-market environments, this managed network switch features 24 ports, 370W PoE+, Gigabit speed, and SFP+ connectivity. It comes with a lifetime warranty.
Description:
HPE Aruba 6100 24 Port 370W PoE+ Gigabit Managed Network Switch with SFP+ (JL677A) - Lifetime Warranty

Designed as the ideal fit for branch offices, mid-market enterprises, and small-to-medium businesses, the Aruba 6100 24-Port PoE+ Compliant Gigabit Managed Network Switch helps to expand your network capacity with 24 Gigabit Ethernet ports, each capable of operating PoE+ compatible devices such as IP cameras, access points, and VoIP phones with a 370W power budget.

Powered by a 1016 MHz Cortex A9 dual-core processor with 4GB of memory, this rack-mountable entry level Layer 2 switch also delivers smooth data transfers with a 128 Gb/s switching capacity and 95.2 Mpps forwarding rate. Four SFP+ slots are also included, supporting 10G fiber uplinks. A 500W power supply is pre-installed.

The ArubaOS-CX modular, database-driven operating system helps to simplify a wide range of critical and complex network tasks.

AOS-CX  
The Aruba CX 6100 Switch Series is based on AOS-CX, a modern, database-driven operating system that is built on a modular Linux architecture. This operating system provides the following unique capabilities:  
• Easy access to all network configuration state information.  
• REST APIs for fine-grained programmability of network tasks.  
• A micro-services architecture that enables full integration with other workflow systems and services.  
• All software processes communicate with the database rather than each other, ensuring near real-time state and resiliency.

Aruba ASICs  
Aruba's programmable ASICs are purpose-built to allow for a tighter integration of switch hardware and software within campus and data center architectures to optimize performance and capacity. Based on the Aruba ASIC architecture, the CX 6100 switch series offers features such as low latency, increased packet buffering, and adaptive power consumption.

Aruba Central Management  
Flexible cloud-based or on-premises management for unified network operations of wired, WLAN, SD-WAN, and public cloud infrastructure. Designed to simplify day zero through day two operations with streamlined workflows. Switch management capabilities include configuration, onboarding, monitoring, troubleshooting, and reporting.

Aruba NetEdit  
With Aruba NetEdit, IT teams can orchestrate multiple switch configuration changes for smooth end-to-end service rollouts. Aruba NetEdit introduces automation that allows for rapid network-wide changes and ensures policy conformance post network updates. Intelligent capabilities include search, edit, validation (including conformance checking), deployment, and audit features. Capabilities include centralized configuration with validation, simultaneous viewing and editing of multiple configurations, customized validation tests, automated large-scale configuration deployment, and network health and topology visibility via Aruba NAE integration.

Simplify Adds, Moves & Changes  
Reduce manual IT operation tasks around initial deployment or ongoing configuration changes to accommodate adds, moves, and changes with colorless ports using local user roles and local-MAC-Authentication (LMA). Instead of statically pre-configuring access ports to VLANs and maintaining the switch port to VLAN mapping, colorless ports can automatically apply the role/policy required.

Name: Cisco Catalyst 9120AX Series Access Points (C9120AXI-S)
Short description: Expand your business's wireless coverage with 802.11AX technology, supporting smooth 8K video streaming and reliable connectivity. Includes local warranty.
Description:
Cisco Catalyst 9120AX Series 802.11AX Access Points (C9120AXI-S) - Local Warranty

Expand your business's wireless coverage to support smooth 8K video streaming and fast file transfers with the Cisco Catalyst 9120AX Series Access Points. Designed to cut through dense environments, this ceiling or desktop mountable indoor Wi-Fi 6 (802.11ax) access point supports a total throughput of up to 1.488 GB/s over the 2.4 GHz and 5 GHz bands with compatible devices. Connect the access point to a PoE compatible device to transfer through the Gigabit Ethernet port to transfer data and power over a single cable. Your wireless connections are secured with WPA3 encryption. Support for the Cisco DNA software allows you to monitor and troubleshoot your network with real-time analytics.

Secure Infrastructure  
Trustworthy systems built with Cisco Trust Anchor Technologies provide a highly secure foundation for Cisco products. With the Cisco Catalyst 9100 Access Points, these technologies enable assurance of hardware and software authenticity for supply chain trust and strong defense against man-in-the-middle attacks that compromise software and firmware. Trust Anchor capabilities include image signing, secure boot, and the Cisco Trust Anchor module.

Cisco DNA Software Support  
Cisco DNA Software allows you to truly understand your network with real-time analytics, quickly detect and contain security threats, and easily provide networkwide consistency through automation and virtualization. The Cisco Catalyst 9105 Series Access Points support SD-Access, Cisco's enterprise architecture. The software offers features such as Cisco Spaces, Cisco Identity Services Engine, and Cisco DNA Analytics and Assurance.

Name: Mikrotik Cloud Router Switch CRS328-24P-4S+RM 24-Port Gigabit Ethernet Switch with 4 10Gbps SFP+ Ports
Short description: The CRS328-24P-4S+RM is a 28-port switch with 24 Gigabit Ethernet ports offering various power output options, including Passive PoE and low voltage PoE, plus 4 10 Gbps SFP+ ports.
Description: CRS328-24P-4S+RM is a 28 independent port switch, it has 24 Gigabit Ethernet ports, which offer different power output options: Passive PoE, low voltage PoE, 802.3af/at (Type 1 “PoE” / Type 2 “PoE+”) with auto-sensing. PoE-Out is passed over mode B pins (4,5+)(7,8-). The four SFP+ ports provide up to 10 Gbps connectivity options via either optical fiber or Ethernet modules (not included). CRS328-24P-4S+RM comes in a 1U rackmount case with 100-240 V AC 500 W power supply built-in. The device consumes up to 44 W leaving guaranteed 450 W (3x150 W per every 8 Ethernet ports) to power your PoE devices. Each port can provide up to 30 W of power with any power output option you choose. The device has a “Dual boot” feature that allows you to choose between two operating systems - RouterOS or SwOS. If you prefer to have a simplified operating system with only switch specific features, use SwOS. If you would like the ability to use routing and other Layer 3 features in your CRS, use RouterOS. You can select the desired operating system from RouterOS, from SwOS or from the RouterBOOT loader settings. All the feature set comes with disruptive price, providing best price/performance on the market.

Name: HPE Networking Instant On 1830 8 Port Gigabit Managed Network Switch (JL810A)
Short description: Aruba Instant On 1830 8-Port Gigabit Managed Network Switch (JL810A) offers reliable performance with lifetime warranty.
Description:
HPE Networking Instant On 1830 8 Port Gigabit Managed Network Switch (JL810A) - Lifetime Warranty Aruba | SourceIT

The Aruba Instant On 1830 JL810A 8-Port Gigabit Managed Network Switch helps to quickly grow your small business's network capacity to keep up with the growing list of wired devices such as computers, storage drives, printers, and more. This desktop-mounted, entry-level managed switch includes eight Gigabit Ethernet ports and supports a host of Layer 2 features without any additional licensing fees. As an added convenience, you can power the JL810A by connecting it to a PoE-compatible device to transfer data and power over a single cable, or you can use the included power adapter.

Use the Aruba Instant On mobile app, cloud-based web portal, or local web interface to quickly configure, manage, and monitor the Aruba Instant On 1830 network switch.

Performance  
The Aruba Instant On 1830 switch featuring an 800 MHz ARM Cortex-A9 processor with 512 MB of memory, 215 MB of flash storage, and a 1.5 MB packet buffer. It's designed to deliver smooth data transfers with a 16 Gb/s switching capacity and 11.9 Mpps forwarding rate.

Easy Management  
The Aruba Instant On mobile app allows you to remotely configure, monitor, and manage your network switch without needing any additional hardware such as cloud keys or a VPN. You can also update firmware on your Instant On devices directly from the cloud, no matter where you are or what time it is.

Power-over-Ethernet Upstream  
When no outlets are available for the external adapter, you can transfer power to this switch by connecting Port 1 to an IEEE 802.3af PoE-compatible device to transfer up to 13W.

Multi-Site Remote Management  
The cloud-hosted web interface and mobile app make it easy to remotely manage multiple sites and multiple networks with distributed and multi-tenant deployments. Each site is logically separated and has its own configuration, statistics, guest portal, and admin read/write privileges. Instant On also allows you to create three admin accounts per site, offering the option to lock accounts from accidental deletion.

Link Aggregation  
This switch supports up to 16 groups of eight network ports, which may be configured to form high-bandwidth connections to compatible devices.

Management  
Cloud-Based Management  
Use the cloud-hosted web interface and mobile app to manage your networks and devices from almost anywhere.

Local Web GUI Management  
The built-in web-based interface makes it easy for non-technical users to directly manage the Instant On 1830 switch. The interface supports up to five HTTP and HTTPS sessions.

Simple Network Time Protocol  
The Simple Network Time Protocol (SNTP) automatically synchronizes the switch's date and time for accurate system event tracking and various schedules set by the administrator.

Security  
Trusted Platform Module  
The integrated Trusted Platform Module (TPM) provides secure, hardware-based generation and storage for cryptographic keys that are used for connections to the Instant On cloud portal.

Automatic Denial-of-Service Protection  
The Instant On 1830 manages high-volume traffic and prevents denial-of-service (DoS) attacks against the network.

Global Storm Control  
Protects against conditions where incoming packets flood the LAN, causing network performance degradation for unicast traffic with an unknown destination, and for broadcast and multicast traffic.

Name: HPE Aruba AP-535 4x4 MU-MIMO 802.11ax Wireless Dual-Band Access Point (JZ336A)

Description:
HPE Aruba AP-535 4x4 MU-MIMO 802.11ax Wireless Dual-Band Access Point (JZ336A) - Lifetime Limited Warranty

Quickly outfit your business with fast and reliable wireless connectivity by integrating the Aruba AP-535 Dual-Band Wireless Access Point into your network. Designed primarily for large office spaces, this Wi-Fi 6 (802.11ax) access point supports up to 1024 clients per radio and features four powerful internal antennas, which deliver up to 2974 Mb/s transfer speeds over the 2.4 GHz and 5 GHz bands. OFDMA and 4x4 MU-MIMO technologies help to maintain strong, efficient connections with compatible devices. Additionally, your wireless connections are secured with WPA3 encryption.

Connecting the AP-535 to your PoE compatible network switch or router through either of its two 2.5G Ethernet ports allows you to transfer data and power over a single cable. You can use the second port for data passthrough or combine both ports link aggregation to transfer up to 5 Gb/s with compatible devices.

• Wi-Fi 6 OFDMA with MU-MIMO & ClientMatch  
Handles multiple clients on each channel, regardless of device or traffic type, using AI to eliminate sticky client issues.

• Air Slice for SLA-Grade Performance  
Provides service level agreement-grade performance for latency-sensitive, high-bandwidth, and IoT services.

• WPA3 and Enhanced Open Security  
Increases enterprise-level security without increasing complexity, and ensures stronger guest access protections.

• IoT-ready Bluetooth 5 and Zigbee Support  
Simplifies deploying and managing IoT location services, asset-tracking services, security solutions, and IoT sensors.

• Flexible Management Options  
Options to deploy in distributed or campus modes using a cloud-hosted or on-prem management and orchestration engine.

• Green Energy Efficiency  
Offers green AP mode with AI-powered energy savings of up to 70%.

Name: HPE Aruba 6200 48 Port 740W PoE+ Gigabit Managed Network Switch with SFP+ (JL728A)
Short description: Enjoy ease and flexibility as you expand your business with this 48-port, 740W PoE+ gigabit managed network switch featuring SFP+ connectivity. Includes a lifetime warranty.
Description:
HPE Aruba 6200 48 Port 740W PoE+ Gigabit Managed Network Switch with SFP+ (JL728A) - Lifetime Warranty

Enjoy east and flexibility as you expand your business's network capacity with the Aruba 6200F 48-Port PoE+ Compliant Gigabit Managed Network Switch. The 48 Gigabit Ethernet ports each provide up to 30W of power with a total budget of 740W, allowing you operate security cameras, access points, VoIP phones, and other compatible devices. There are also four SFP+ slots for 10G fiber uplinks and stacking. Eight member VSF stacking support allows you to grow your network to up to 384 ports by adding more switches. With a 176 Gb/s switching capacity and 130.9 Mpps forwarding rate, the 6200F is designed to deliver smooth and fast data transfers. Additionally, its hot-swappable modular design allows you to customize and expand the switch to fit your needs while features such as the Aruba Network Analytics Engine and support for the Aruba CX Mobile App help to simplify management. This system is pre-configured with a 200W power supply and internal fans.

Automation and Analytics

• Aruba Network Analytics Engine  
The Aruba CX 6200 Switch Series delivers unparalleled visibility with built-in analytics for real-time monitoring and troubleshooting to help fix problems faster. The Aruba Network Analytics Engine (NAE) automatically interrogates and analyzes events that can impact network health.

• Advanced Telemetry and Automation  
Advanced telemetry and automation provide the ability to easily identify and troubleshoot network, system, application, and security related issues easily through the use of Python agents and REST APIs.

• Time Series Database  
The Time Series Database (TSDB) stores configuration and operational state data, making it available to quickly resolve network issues.

• Aruba NetEdit  
Aruba NetEdit introduces automation that allows for rapid network-wide changes, and ensures policy conformance post network updates. Intelligent capabilities include search, edit, validation (including conformance checking), deployment, and audit features.

• Aruba CX Mobile App  
The Aruba CX Mobile App simplifies connecting, stacking, and managing Aruba CX 6200 switches. Switch information can be imported into Aruba NetEdit for simplified configuration management and to continuously validate the conformance of configurations anywhere in the network.

Performance and Power

• Distributed Architecture  
The Aruba CX 6200 Switch Series uses a fully distributed architecture with Aruba Gen7 ASICs that delivers very low latency, increased packet buffering, and adaptive power consumption. All switching and routing are wire-speed to meet the demands of bandwidth-intensive applications.

• Aruba Virtual Switching Framework  
The Aruba Virtual Switching Framework (VSF) allows you to quickly grow your network using high-performance front-plane stacking. Create eight member stacks using built-in SFP+ ports with flexibility to create stacks that span longer distances using long-range transceivers.

Smarter Segmentation

• Aruba Dynamic Segmentation  
The Aruba CX 6200 Switch Series supports Aruba Dynamic Segmentation that automatically applies and enforces user, device, and application-aware policies on Aruba wired and wireless infrastructures.

• Firewall Features  
Automated device profiling, role-based access control, and Layer 7 firewall features deliver enhanced visibility and performance for a better overall experience for both IT and end-users alike.

• Switch-to-Switch Tunnels  
Switch-to-switch tunnels with VXLAN for low-latency and high-performance use cases.

Load Balancing: Limit the number of users on each access point and remove devices with weak reception to keep your Wi-Fi running at peak performance.  
Scheduling: Automatically reboot the access point and turn on or off the Wi-Fi at the time you set.  

Maximum wireless signal rates are the physical rates derived from IEEE Standard 802.11 specifications. Actual wireless data throughput and wireless coverage are not guaranteed and will vary as a result of 1) environmental factors, including building materials, physical objects, and obstacles, 2) network conditions, including local interference, volume and density of traffic, product location, network complexity, and network overhead, and 3) client limitations, including rated performance, location, connection, quality, and client condition. Zero-Touch Provisioning requires the use of Omada Cloud-Based Controller.

Name: DLINK Layer 3 Stackable 10GbE Managed Switch (DXS-3600-16S/EEI)
Short description: D-Link DXS-3600 Series Layer 3 stackable 10GbE managed switch with lifetime warranty.
Description:
DLINK Layer 3 Stackable 10GbE Managed Switch (DXS-3600-16S/EEI) - Lifetime Warranty Aruba | SourceIT

D-Link’s DXS-3600 Series Layer 3 Stackable 10GbE Managed Switch consists of new compact, high-performance switches that feature wire speed 10-Gigabit Ethernet switching, routing, and very low latency. The 1U height and selectable front-to-back or back-to-front air flow make the DXS-3600 Series suitable for enterprise and campus aggregation network environments. The DXS-3600 Series switches have 24 or 8 fixed 10GbE SFP+ ports and can accommodate more ports with the addition of an expansion module. The expansion modules not only provide extra 10G SFP+ ports, but also increase the flexibility of 120G stacking, 40G uplinks, or low-cost 10GBASE-T connections for different applications.

Convenient Deployment  
The DXS-3600 Series switches provide your network with high-performance 10-Gigabit Ethernet switching capacities up to 960 Gbps and forwarding rates up to 714 Mpps. The switches feature hot-swappable power supplies and fan trays, which enable the switches to have redundant, high-availability architecture. The modular power design allows customers to use AC or DC power sources according to where the switch is deployed. When inserting two power modules, the two power modules share the load and help to extend the lifetime of the other. The DXS-3600 Series also features a modular fan design; three fans can back up each other, providing 2+1 redundancy for the system. If a fan fails or the temperature rises, the smart fans will increase their speed automatically.

Flexible Software  
The DXS-3600 Series can be deployed using one of two different software images. The Standard Image (SI) features a wide range of Layer 2, VLAN, multicasting, Quality of Service (QoS), security, data center, and static routing functions. The Enhanced Image (EI) features comprehensive IPv4/v6 routing including RIP, VRRP, OSPF, BGP, and L3 multicasting features IGMP, MLD, PIM-DM, SM, SDM, SSM, and DVMRP. The Enhanced Image (EI) also supports L2/L3 MPLS VPN that enables the DXS-3600 Series switches to also be deployed as the core router of an enterprise environment or as an aggregation switch in an MPLS environment.

Data Center Features  
Data Center Bridging (DCB) is an essential set of enhancements to Ethernet for networking in data center environments. The DXS-3600 Series switches support several core components of Data Center Bridging (DCB) such as IEEE 802.1Qbb, IEEE 802.1Qaz, and IEEE 802.1Qau.  
• IEEE 802.1Qbb (Priority-based Flow Control) provides flow control to ensure there is no data loss during network congestion.  
• IEEE 802.1Qaz (Enhanced Transmission Selection) manages the allocation of bandwidth amongst different traffic classes.  
• IEEE 802.1Qau (Congestion Notification) provides congestion management for data flows within network domains to avoid congestion.  

The DXS-3600 Series switches also support cut-through switching, which reduces latency when transmitting data in a network.

Energy Efficient  
The DXS-3600 Series switches allow users to manage airflow by using different power and fan module sets. Selectable front-to-back or back-to-front airflow optimizes air circulation to provide more effective cooling throughout rack systems in data centers where the switches are used when compared to side-to-side airflow. The switches also feature built-in smart fans; internal heat sensors monitor and detect temperature changes, and react accordingly by utilizing different fan speeds for different temperatures. At lower temperatures, the fans will run slower, reducing the switch’s power consumption and noise.

Streamline Your Enterprise: Dlink for Business End to End Business Networking Solutions

Name: HPE Aruba 6200 24 Port 370W PoE+ Gigabit Managed Network Switch with SFP+ (JL725A)
Short description: Lifetime warranty. Offers ease and flexibility for expanding your business network with 24 ports, 370W PoE+, Gigabit speed, and SFP+ connectivity.
Description:
HPE Aruba 6200 24 Port 370W PoE+ Gigabit Managed Network Switch with SFP+ (JL725A) - Lifetime Warranty

Enjoy ease and flexibility as you expand your business's network capacity with the Aruba 6200F 24-Port PoE+ Compliant Gigabit Managed Network Switch. The 24 Gigabit Ethernet ports each provide up to 30W of power with a total budget of 370W, allowing you operate security cameras, access points, VoIP phones, and other compatible devices. There are also four SFP+ slots for 10G fiber uplinks and stacking. Eight member VSF stacking support allows you to grow your network to up to 384 ports by adding more switches. With a 128 Gb/s switching capacity and 95.2 Mpps forwarding rate, the 6200F is designed to deliver smooth and fast data transfers. Additionally, its hot-swappable modular design allows you to customize and expand the switch to fit your needs while features such as the Aruba Network Analytics Engine and support for the Aruba CX Mobile App help to simplify management. This system is pre-configured with a 200W power supply and internal fans.

Automation and Analytics

• Aruba Network Analytics Engine  
The Aruba CX 6200 Switch Series delivers unparalleled visibility with built-in analytics for real-time monitoring and troubleshooting to help fix problems faster. The Aruba Network Analytics Engine (NAE) automatically interrogates and analyzes events that can impact network health.

• Advanced Telemetry and Automation  
Advanced telemetry and automation provide the ability to easily identify and troubleshoot network, system, application, and security related issues easily through the use of Python agents and REST APIs.

• Time Series Database  
The Time Series Database (TSDB) stores configuration and operational state data, making it available to quickly resolve network issues.

• Aruba NetEdit  
Aruba NetEdit introduces automation that allows for rapid network-wide changes, and ensures policy conformance post network updates. Intelligent capabilities include search, edit, validation (including conformance checking), deployment, and audit features.

• Aruba CX Mobile App  
The Aruba CX Mobile App simplifies connecting, stacking, and managing Aruba CX 6200 switches. Switch information can be imported into Aruba NetEdit for simplified configuration management and to continuously validate the conformance of configurations anywhere in the network.

Performance and Power

• Distributed Architecture  
The Aruba CX 6200 Switch Series uses a fully distributed architecture with Aruba Gen7 ASICs that delivers very low latency, increased packet buffering, and adaptive power consumption. All switching and routing are wire-speed to meet the demands of bandwidth-intensive applications.

• Aruba Virtual Switching Framework  
The Aruba Virtual Switching Framework (VSF) allows you to quickly grow your network using high performance front-plane stacking. Create eight member stacks using built-in SFP+ ports with flexibility to create stacks that span longer distances using long-range transceivers.

Smarter Segmentation

• Aruba Dynamic Segmentation  
The Aruba CX 6200 Switch Series supports Aruba Dynamic Segmentation that automatically applies and enforces user, device, and application-aware policies on Aruba wired and wireless infrastructures.

• Firewall Features  
Automated device profiling, role-based access control, and Layer 7 firewall features deliver enhanced visibility and performance for a better overall experience for both IT and end-users alike.

• Switch-to-Switch Tunnels  
Switch-to-switch tunnels with VXLAN for low-latency and high-performance use cases.

Name: HPE Networking Instant On 1430 8-Port Unmanaged Switch (R8R45A)
Short description: Streamline Ethernet traffic for small business applications with an 8-port unmanaged switch featuring a lifetime warranty.
Description:
HPE Networking Instant On 1430 8-Port Unmanaged Switch (R8R45A) - Lifetime Warranty Aruba | SourceIT

Streamline Ethernet traffic for small business applications with the Instant On 1430 8-Port Unmanaged Switch from Aruba. This sports eight RJ45 Gigabit Ethernet ports. Providing a 16 Gbps switching capacity and up to 11.90 Mpps of throughput, the Instant On 1430 utilizes 128 kb of EEPROM memory and a 2 Mb packet buffer. A desktop form factor allows for easy deployment to a tabletop; wall and under-table mounting are also supported using the base surface mounting holes.

Unmanaged Ethernet Connectivity for Small Businesses  
Boasting 8 RJ45 Gigabit Ethernet ports, the Aruba Instant On 1430 provides unmanaged Layer 2 switching for small business applications. Breeze through deployment and setup thanks to 24x7 phone support for the first 90 days and chat support for the entire limited lifetime warranty period. Community support is also included for the life of the product.

Plug-and-Play Operation  
The Aruba Instant On 1430 Switch Series models are easy to use with zero configuration and no required ongoing administration. Simplified cabling automatically adjusts for straight-through or crossover cables on all 10/100/1000 ports using Auto MDI/MDI-X. Plus, a desktop form factor allows for easy deployment to a tabletop; wall and under-table mounting are also supported using the base surface mounting holes.

Energy Efficiency and Traffic Optimization  
The Aruba Instant On 1430 Switch Series supports Energy Efficient Ethernet (EEE) and is compliant with 802.3az standard requirements to save energy during periods of low data activity. A fanless design allows for silent operation in office settings or acoustically sensitive environments and requires less power to operate. Quality of Service ensures the priority of time-sensitive packets (like VoIP and video) over other traffic based on DSCP or IEEE 802.1p classification. Jumbo frame support provides up to 9216 bytes frame size to improve the performance of large data transfers. Flow control provides a flow-throttling mechanism propagated through the network to prevent packet loss at a congested node.

Short description: HPE Networking Instant On 1830 8-Port Gigabit PoE Managed Network Switch (JL811A) with lifetime warranty.
Description:
HPE Networking Instant On 1830 8 Port Gigabit Managed Network Switch (JL810A) - Lifetime Warranty Aruba | SourceIT

The Aruba Instant On 1830 JL811A 8-Port Gigabit PoE+ Compliant Managed Network Switch helps to quickly grow your small business's network capacity to keep up with the growing list of power over Ethernet devices such as IP security cameras, access points, and VoIP phones. This entry-level managed rackmount switch includes eight Gigabit Ethernet ports, four of which are PoE+ compliant with a 65W power budget. It also supports a host of Layer 2 features without any additional licensing fees. Use the Aruba Instant On mobile app, cloud-based web portal, or local web interface to quickly configure, manage, and monitor the Aruba Instant On 1830 network switch.

Performance  
The Aruba Instant On 1830 switch featuring an 800 MHz ARM Cortex-A9 processor with 512 MB of memory, 215 MB of flash storage, and a 1.5 MB packet buffer. It's designed to deliver smooth data transfers with a 16 Gb/s switching capacity and 11.9 Mpps forwarding rate.

Easy Management  
The Aruba Instant On mobile app allows you to remotely configure, monitor, and manage your network switch without needing any additional hardware such as cloud keys or a VPN. You can also update firmware on your Instant On devices directly from the cloud, no matter where you are or what time it is.

Power-over-Ethernet  
This switch includes four PoE+ compliant ports with a 65W power budget. Features such as automatic power configuration and scheduling allow you to efficiently operate your connected devices.

Multi-Site Remote Management  
The cloud-hosted web interface and mobile app make it easy to remotely manage multiple sites and multiple networks with distributed and multi-tenant deployments. Each site is logically separated and has its own configuration, statistics, guest portal, and admin read/write privileges. Instant On also allows you to create three admin accounts per site, offering the option to lock accounts from accidental deletion.

Link Aggregation  
This switch supports up to 16 groups of eight network ports, which may be configured to form high-bandwidth connections to compatible devices.

Management  
• Cloud-Based Management  
Use the cloud-hosted web interface and mobile app to manage your networks and devices from almost anywhere.  
• Local Web GUI Management  
The built-in web-based interface makes it easy for non-technical users to directly manage the Instant On 1830 switch. The interface supports up to five HTTP and HTTPS sessions.  
• Simple Network Time Protocol  
The Simple Network Time Protocol (SNTP) automatically synchronizes the switch's date and time for accurate system event tracking and various schedules set by the administrator.

Security  
• Trusted Platform Module  
The integrated Trusted Platform Module (TPM) provides secure, hardware-based generation and storage for cryptographic keys that are used for connections to the Instant On cloud portal.  
• Automatic Denial-of-Service Protection  
The Instant On 1830 manages high-volume traffic and prevents denial-of-service (DoS) attacks against the network.  
• Global Storm Control  
Protects against conditions where incoming packets flood the LAN, causing network performance degradation for unicast traffic with an unknown destination, and for broadcast and multicast traffic.

Breeze through deployment and setup thanks to 24x7 phone support for the first 90 days and chat support for the entire limited lifetime warranty period. Community support is also included for the life of the product.

Plug-and-Play Operation

The Aruba Instant On 1430 Switch Series models are easy to use with zero configuration and no required ongoing administration. Simplified cabling automatically adjusts for straight-through or crossover cables on all 10/100/1000 ports using Auto MDI/MDI-X. Plus, a rack mountable design allows for easy installation to server racks using the included brackets; this switch also supports tabletop, under-table, and wall mounting. Please note, the switch should not be mounted upside-down.

Energy Efficiency and Traffic Optimization

The Aruba Instant On 1430 Switch Series supports Energy Efficient Ethernet (EEE) and is compliant with 802.3az standard requirements to save energy during periods of low data activity. A fanless design allows for silent operation in office settings or acoustically sensitive environments and requires less power to operate. Quality of Service ensures the priority of time-sensitive packets (like VoIP and video) over other traffic based on DSCP or IEEE 802.1p classification. Jumbo frame support provides up to 9216 bytes frame size to improve the performance of large data transfers. Flow control provides a flow-throttling mechanism propagated through the network to prevent packet loss at a congested node.

Class 4 PoE Support

Get up to 30W of Class 4 PoE power delivery per port for compatible devices including access points, surveillance cameras, and VoIP phones. A power budget of 124W ensures support for a range of devices.

Name: HPE Networking Instant On 1930 8 Port PoE+ Gigabit Managed Switch with SFP (JL681A)
Short description: Expand your small office network capacity with this 8-port Gigabit managed switch featuring PoE+ and SFP support. Includes a lifetime warranty.
Description:
HPE Networking Instant On 1930 8 Port Gigabit Managed Switch with SFP (JL680A) - Lifetime Warranty Aruba | SourceIT

Expand your small office's network capacity by using the Instant On 1930 8-Port Gigabit Managed Switch with SFP from Aruba to connect computers, network attached storage, and other high-bandwidth devices. This rack-mountable smart managed switch features eight Gigabit Ethernet ports with a 20 Gb/s switching capacity and a 14.88 Mpps forwarding capacity powered by an 800 MHz ARM Cortex-A9 processor, 512 MB RAM, and 256 MB of flash storage with a 1.5 MB packet buffer. There are also two SFP ports available that support fiber line uplinks and other connections that carry data across greater distances than copper lines. With its fanless design, the Instant On 1930 is built to quietly blend into almost any environment. Additionally, the switch includes a suite of security controls that allow greater control over network access, configured using the web-based application or downloadable mobile app.

High-Speed Ports
• This managed switch includes eight Gigabit Ethernet ports and two SFP fiber ports.

Fast Data Processing
• The Aruba Instant On 1930 managed switch is powered by an 800 MHz ARM Cortex-A9 processor with 512 MB of RAM, and 256 MB flash storage with a 1.5 MB packet buffer.
• It features a 20 Gb/s switching capacity and a 14.88 Mpps forwarding capacity.

Network Management
• Cloud-hosted web interface management for entire network.
• Firmware update notifications with schedulable updates.
• Default DHCP client mode allows for plug-and-play operation when connecting the switch directly to the network.
• Port mirroring automatically sends traffic on a port or VLAN to a network analyzer for monitoring.
• Event logging and alerts provide detailed information for problem identification and troubleshooting.
• Administrators can add, modify, delete and transfer management accounts and passwords for secure access.
• Users can set a locator LED on a specific switch to turn on, blink, or turn off, making them easy to spot for troubleshooting.

Quality of Service (QoS)
• Traffic prioritization provides time-sensitive packets such as VoIP and video with priority over other traffic based on DSCP or IEEE 802.1p classification.
• IEEE 802.1p/Q VLAN tagging delivers data to devices based on the priority and type of traffic.
• Class of Service features include setting the IEEE 802.1p/DSCP priority to queue mapping with support for strict priority queuing or weighted round robin queuing, across four queues, configurable on individual switch ports.
• Advanced classifier based QoS classifies traffic using multiple match criteria based on Layer 2, 3, and 4 information.

Network Security
• A Trusted Platform Module (TPM) enables secure, hardware-based generation and storage of cryptographic keys used for secure connections to the Instant On cloud portal.
• This switch support for up to 256 VLANs with a VLAN ID range of 2-4093.
• The Instant On 1930 allows network user authentication on a per port basis through RADIUS assigned VLAN, dynamic VLAN creation, guest VLAN, or an unauthenticated VLAN.
• Automatic denial-of-service protection monitors network traffic for malicious attacks and works to block them.
• Packet storm protection protects against unknown unicast, broadcast, and multicast storms with user-defined thresholds.
• This switch includes RADIUS authentication with primary and backup server configurations in addition to accounting features for collecting attribute and statistical information from the switch.
• Administrators are provided with secure management access in a specified VLAN.
• The switch minimizes network disruptions by automatically detecting and disabling ports that experience link flap events.

Configurable Features
• Static IPv4 routing for up to 32 static routes.
• Auto-voice VLAN automatically recognizes IP phones and assigns the voice traffic to a dedicated VLAN.
• A PoE scheduler allows you to define the hours of PoE power being supplied to a group of switch ports, with the ability to select individual days of a week and set reoccurrence on a weekly basis with a start and end date.
• Create Access Control Lists (ACLs) to filter network traffic according to specified rules, with support for 50 inbound IPv4 and MAC ACLs with up to 480 ACEs.
• The Instant On 1930 can be managed and deployed as an IPv6 host.
• Set per-port traffic rate limits based on percentages or packets per second.
• Dynamic ARP attack protection blocks ARP broadcasts from unauthorized hosts that may be trying to eavesdrop or steal of network data.
• DHCP snooping provides network security by filtering untrusted DHCP messages.
• Ports in a port isolation group are restricted from forwarding Layer 2 traffic between ports in that group for enhanced data privacy and security.
• SCP (Secure Copy Protocol) and TFTP protocols allow for secure file transfers.
• Create independent primary and secondary software images for backup while upgrading the network.
• User account management tools allow you to check password strength and more to enhance security.
• Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) encrypts all HTTP traffic and secures access to the local browser-based management of the switch.

The Aruba Instant On 1960 24G 2XGT 24-Port Gigabit PoE++ Compliant Managed Network Switch is an advanced, smart-managed, fixed configuration Gigabit stackable switch designed for small and growing businesses that is easy to deploy. Equipped with 24 60W PoE++ Gigabit Ethernet ports with a 370W budget, this switch is designed to scale as your business grows, making adding more employees, devices, and applications simple. Two 10G RJ45 uplink ports are also available alongside two 10G SFP+ fiber slots. With a 128 Gb/s switching capacity and 95 Mpps forwarding rate, the Aruba Instant On 1960 switch is made to handle today's bandwidth-heavy applications like voice and video conferencing, enabling consistent connectivity to improve user experience and application performance. These switches come with flexible management option: local web GUI or Instant On mobile app and cloud-based web portal. A 2-post rack mount kit is included.

High-Level 10GbE Networking  
The Aruba Instant On 1960 switch includes four 10GbE connections to connect to servers, network storage devices, or to other switches.

Power-over-Ethernet  
Up to 30W PoE power delivery is available for Class 4 PoE devices like access points, surveillance cameras and VoIP phones, and up to 60W PoE power delivery is available for Class 6 PoE devices like pan-tilt zoom cameras and video-enabled IP phones.

Simplify Network Deployment and Management  
The Aruba Instant On 1960 Switch series offers a complete portfolio of choices for increased small business flexibility. They can be deployed using two management modes - Instant On cloud-management (access via mobile app and/or web portal) and the local web GUI.

Ease of Use with Cloud-Managed Stacking  
The Aruba Instant On mobile app and cloud-based web portal make cloud-managed stacking easy - just follow the recommendations to stack up to four Aruba Instant On 1960 switches and manage them as a single entity.

Robust Security  
The Aruba Instant On 1960 Switch Series lets you use VLANs and Access Control Lists to set bounds on what data can be seen by which users. Leverage 802.1X with a RADIUS server to ensure only known and authorized users can access your network. Automatic denial-of-service (DOS) monitors and protects the network against malicious attacks.

Name: Ruckus Network R650 High Performance Wi-Fi 6 4x4:4 Indoor Access Point (9U1-R650-WW00)
Short description: High-performance Wi-Fi 6 4x4:4 indoor access point designed to meet Wi-Fi capacity requirements in office buildings and classrooms. Includes local warranty.
Description:
Ruckus Network R650 High Performance Wi-Fi 6 4x4:4 Indoor Access Point (9U1-R650-WW00) - Local Warranty

Wi-Fi capacity requirements in office buildings, classrooms, and retail venues are rapidly raising due to increase in Wi-Fi connected devices, non-Wi-Fi IoT devices and bandwidth-hungry applications. The R650 access point (AP) with the latest Wi-Fi 6 (802.11 ax) technology delivers increased capacity, improved coverage and performance in dense environments. The R650 is our mid-range dual-band, dual-concurrent AP that supports six spatial streams (4x4:4 in 5GHz, 2x2:2 in 2.4GHz). The R650 supports peak data rates of up to 2974 Mbps and efficiently manages up to 512 clients connections. Furthermore, 2.5 GbE Ethernet ensures the backhaul will not be a bottleneck for full use of available Wi-Fi capacity. The R650 has built-in IoT radios with onboard Bluetooth® Low Energy and Zigbee capabilities. In addition, the R650 is a converged access point that allows customers to seamlessly integrate any new wireless technologies with the pluggable IoT module.

• Stunning Wi-Fi Performance - Mitigate interference and extend coverage with patented BeamFlex+™ adaptive antenna technology utilizing several directional antenna patterns  
• Serve More Devices - Connect more devices simultaneously with six MU-MIMO spatial streams and concurrent dual-band 2.4/5GHz radios while enhancing device performance  
• Converged Access Point - Allow customers to eliminate siloed networks and unify WiFi and non-WiFi wireless technologies into one single network by using built-in Bluetooth® Low Energy and Zigbee, and also expanding to any future wireless technologies  
• Automate Optimal Throughput - ChannelFly dynamic channel technology uses machine learning to automatically find the least congested channels. You always get the highest throughput the band can support  
• Multiple Management Options - Manage the R650 from the cloud, with on-premises physical/virtual appliances, or without a controller  
• Better Mesh Networking - Reduce expensive cabling, and complex mesh configurations by checking a box with SmartMesh wireless meshing technology to dynamically create self-forming, self-healing mesh networks  
• More than Wi-Fi - Support services beyond Wi-Fi with RUCKUS IoT Suite, Cloudpath security and onboarding software, SPoT Wi-Fi locationing engine, and SCI network analytics

Description:
Product description  
The TL-SF1024D Fast Ethernet Switch provides you with a high-performance, low-cost, easy-to-use, seamless and standard upgrade to improve old network to 1000 Mbps network. All 24 ports support auto MDI/MDIX, no need to worry about the cable type, simply plug and play. What This Product Does  
The 24-Port 10/100 Mbps Switch TL-SF1024D provides you with a high-performance, low-cost, easy-to-use, seamless and standard upgrade to improve old network to 100 Mbps network. All 24 ports support auto MDI/MDIX, no need to worry about the cable type, simply plug and play. Moreover, with the innovative energy-efficient technology, the TL-SF1024D can save up to 75%* of the power consumption and 80% of the packaging material can be recycled, making it an eco-friendly solution for your business network.  

TP-LINK Green Technology  
This new generation The 24-Port 10/100 Mbps Switch TL-SF1024D features the latest innovative energy-efficient technologies that can greatly expand your network capacity with much less power. It automatically adjusts power consumption according to the link status and cable length to limit the carbon footprint of your network. It also complies with the EU'S RoHS, prohibiting the use of certain hazardous materials. Besides, 80% of the packaging material can be recycled.

As an expert in seamless connectivity, Huawei ensures that the S110-8P2ST is more than just a network switch; it's a gateway to enhanced productivity. PoE+ support eliminates the need for additional power cables, offering a clutter-free and cost-effective solution for deploying access points, IP cameras, and VoIP phones.

Furthermore, the switch's energy-efficient design, featuring Energy Efficient Ethernet (EEE), allows your business to enjoy a high-performance network while also adhering to green standards, thus reducing operational costs.

With the Huawei S110-8P2ST, reliability is never in question. The device is designed with a suite of features aimed at minimizing network interruptions. Intelligent storm control mechanisms and loop prevention ensure that your network remains stable and resilient, allowing you to focus on growing your business without worrying about network downtime.

Additionally, the intuitive management interface simplifies setup and administration, making network management accessible to all proficiency levels.

The adaptability of the S110-8P2ST is one of its defining characteristics. The inclusion of a GE SFP port allows for flexible fiber connectivity, providing the scalability needed to adapt to changing network demands. This feature ensures that your network infrastructure can grow in tandem with your business, offering the bandwidth and range required for modern, data-intensive applications.

In today's digital landscape, security stands paramount, and the S110-8P2ST addresses this with robust security features engineered to protect your network. From preventing unauthorized access to shielding against network threats, the S110-8P2ST stands guard, securing your digital assets so that you can conduct business with confidence and peace of mind.

For those seeking a switch that strikes the perfect balance between high performance and cost-effectiveness, look no further than the Huawei S110-8P2ST. We warmly invite you to explore the finer details of this exceptional switch and how it can streamline and secure your business operations.

Engage with us to learn more about the transformative impact the Huawei S110-8P2ST can have on your network infrastructure. Embrace the future of networking today.

Name: Ruckus Network R550 Mid-Tier Wi-Fi 6 2x2:2 Indoor Access Point (9U1-R550-WW00)
Short description: Mid-tier Wi-Fi 6 2x2:2 indoor access point designed to meet Wi-Fi capacity requirements in classrooms, office spaces, and medium-density environments. Includes local warranty.
Description:
Ruckus Network R550 Mid-Tier Wi-Fi 6 2x2:2 Indoor Access Point (9U1-R550-WW00) - Local Warranty

Wi-Fi capacity requirements in classrooms, office spaces, and medium-size venues are rising due to the increase in the number of Wi-Fi connected devices. An increase in bandwidth requirements for applications and an ever-growing assortment of IoT devices puts further strain on already stretched Wi-Fi networks. The R550 access point (AP) with the latest Wi-Fi 6 (802.11 ax) technology delivers the ideal combination of increased capacity, improved coverage and affordability in dense environments. The R550 is our mid-range dual-band, dual-concurrent AP that supports four spatial streams (2x2:2 in 2.4GHz/5GHz). The R550 supports peak data rates of up to 1774 Mbps and efficiently manages up to 512 clients connections.

• Stunning Wi-Fi Performance - Mitigate interference and extend coverage with patented BeamFlex+™ adaptive antenna technology utilizing several directional antenna patterns  
• Serve more devices - Connect more devices simultaneously with four MU-MIMO spatial streams and concurrent dual-band 2.4/5GHz radios while enhancing device performance  
• Converged access point - Allow customers to eliminate siloed networks and unify Wi-Fi and IoT technologies into one single network by using built-in Bluetooth® Low Energy and Zigbee, and also expand to any future wireless technologies  
• Automate Optimal Throughput - ChannelFly dynamic channel technology uses machine learning to automatically find the least congested channels. You always get the highest throughput the band can support  
• Better Mesh Networking - Reduce expensive cabling, and complex mesh configurations by checking a box with SmartMesh wireless meshing technology to dynamically create self-forming, self-healing mesh networks  
• More than Wi-Fi - Support services beyond Wi-Fi with RUCKUS IoT Suite, Cloudpath security and onboarding software, SPoT Wi-Fi locationing engine, and RUCKUS analytics  

Specifications for RUCKUS R550 Indoor Access Point

Name: Dell E2422H 23.8" Monitor (210-BBUB)
Short description: Stay comfortable and productive with this 23.8" 16:9 IPS monitor featuring a 1920 x 1080 resolution. Includes a 3-year local warranty.
Description:
Dell E2422H 23.8" Monitor (210-BBUB) - 3 Years Local Warranty

Stay comfortable and productive with the Dell E2422H 23.8" 16:9 IPS Monitor. This 1920 x 1080 resolution monitor boasts a space-saving base and slim bezel design that helps provide a clear view as you watch videos, edit photos, and work on documents. The bezels also make the monitor ideal for multi-monitor setups to enhance your multitasking efficiency, and Dell Display Manager (DDM) software allows for quick multi-monitor configurations. Additionally, Dell ComfortView helps to reduce eyestrain during extended use, with flicker-free and blue light reducing technologies.

A Clear View  
This monitor features slim bezels, supporting a 1920 x 1080 Full HD resolution at 60 Hz with a 1000:1 static contrast ratio, a 250 nits brightness, and 8 ms (GtG, 5 ms in Overdrive mode) response time to deliver smooth, detailed images. The 178° horizontal and vertical viewing angles allow you to see the screen clearly from almost any position.

Vivid Color  
The 23.8" In-Plane Switching (IPS) panel supports up to 16.7 million colors covering 72% of the CIE 1931 and 83% of the CIE 1976 spectrums for beautiful photos, videos, and documents.

Connectivity  
The Dell E2422H includes a DisplayPort input alongside a VGA port to connect with compatible devices.

Clear the Clutter  
This monitor's convenient, compact base optimizes your desktop by providing room for your keyboard, mouse, and other equipment. At the same time, its integrated cable management system helps to reduce desktop clutter. Adjust the screen's tilt to suit your comfort. You can also mount this monitor onto a wall, swivel arm, or multi-monitor stand using the 100 x 100 mm VESA mounting holes.

Dell Display Manager  
• Use Easy Arrange to tile multiple applications across one or more screens with 38 pre-set window partitions and the ability to personalize up to five windows, giving you improved multitasking abilities.  
• The auto-restore feature remembers where you left off, so applications will go back to where you left them, even after you've unplugged the monitor.  
• Shortcut keys can save you time by letting you quickly configure your display management settings.  
• Asset management reports allow IT managers to quickly capture and track monitor information as well as configure multiple monitors at once through a single setup.

Name: Dell UltraSharp U2520D 25" 16:9 QHD USB Type-C IPS Monitor (210-AVKQ)
Short description: Enhance your creativity and productivity with this 25" 16:9 QHD USB Type-C IPS monitor. It features vibrant colors, sharp details, and a 3-year local warranty.
Description:
Dell UltraSharp U2520D 25" 16:9 QHD USB Type-C IPS Monitor (210-AVKQ) - 3 Years Local Warranty

Enhance your creativity and productivity with the UltraSharp U2520D 25" 16:9 QHD USB Type-C IPS Monitor from Dell. This 25" monitor features an In-Plane Switching (IPS) panel that supports 2560 x 1440 QHD resolution at 60 Hz with 16.7 million colors covering 99% sRGB spectrum and 95% of the DCI-P3 gamut, delivering rich and lifelike photos, videos, and documents. Other features include 350 nits brightness, a 1000:1 static contrast ratio, and an 8 ms (GtG) (5 ms with Overdrive) response time.

Connectivity options include DisplayPort 1.4, HDMI 2.0, and USB Type-C DisplayPort 1.4 inputs. The rear USB Type-C port also supports up to 90W Power Delivery, which keeps your connected laptop charged while it is in use. A DisplayPort-out connector is available for daisy chaining multiple displays. A hub with three USB 3.1 Gen 1 Type-A ports and a USB Type-C downlink port is built into the monitor to quickly connect compatible peripherals such as flash drives to your computer.

The UltraSharp U2520D's wide 178° horizontal and vertical viewing angles allow you to see the screen from almost any position. In addition to being able to rotate the screen 90° to view documents in portrait mode, you can adjust the screen's height, tilt, and swivel to fully optimize comfort. Alternatively, you can use the VESA mounting holes to connect the display to a wall, compatible swivel arm, or a multi-monitor stand for greater versatility and efficient multitasking.

Exceptional Color  
Featuring an IPS panel that supports 95% of the DCI-P3 color gamut with 350 nits brightness, a 1000:1 contrast ratio, and VESA DisplayHDR 400 compatibility, the UltraSharp U2520D is factory calibrated to deliver vivid, lifelike color.

Room to Work  
Designed for productivity, the display supports 2560 X 1440 resolution at 60 Hz and has a DisplayPort-out connector to daisy chain additional monitors.

Fully Connected  
In addition to the DisplayPort 1.4 and HDMI 2.0 inputs, the rear USB Type-C port supports DisplayPort 1.4 devices and up to 90W Power Delivery, allowing you to connect and use compatible laptops through a single included cable. There is also a hub with three USB 3.1 Gen 1 Type-A ports and a USB Type-C downstream port built into the monitor.

Versatile Viewing  
Pivot, tilt, swivel, and adjust the height of the screen to maximize comfort while you work. The monitor can be rotated 90° to view documents in portrait mode. Its VESA mounting holes allow you to connect the display to a compatible swivel arm or multi-monitor stand for added versatility.

Dell Display Manager  
The Dell Display Manager allows you to quickly arrange and view applications side-by-side across multiple connected screens for multitasking efficiency. Its auto restore function allows you to continue using applications from where you left them, even after a screen is unplugged. The application can also be used by IT managers to capture and track monitor information in addition to configuring multiple monitors simultaneously through a single setup.

Dell Technologies Client Peripherals  
The complete IT package for maximum productivity

Name: MSI G2412V 16:9 FHD 100HZ IPS FREESYNC GAMING MONITOR, 23.8", BLACK
Short description: Visualize your victory with this esports gaming monitor featuring a 23.8" 1920x1080 IPS panel, 100 Hz refresh rate, and 1 ms response time. It supports FreeSync for smooth gameplay and delivers vibrant colors and sharp visuals.
Description:
Visualize your victory with the MSI G2412V Esports gaming monitor. Equipped with a 1920x1080, 100 Hz refresh rate, 1 ms response time IPS panel, the G2412V will give you the competitive edge you need to take down your opponents. Built with AMD FreeSync Premium technology, the G2412V can match the display's refresh rate with your GPU for ultra-smooth gameplay. Make sure you can hit your mark with all the latest technologies built-in the MSI Esports Gaming monitors for competitive play.

Enhance Your Viewing Experience  
IPS grade panel that produces no image distortion and minimum color shifts when viewed from different angles. Additionally, the IPS grade panel will clear images and instantly optimize screen color and brightness to ensure that you enjoy every scene at its best.

100Hz Refresh Rate + 1ms Response Time  
Equipped with a 100 Hz refresh rate and 1 ms response time IPS panel which has the benefit in fast moving game genres such as first person shooters, fighters, racing sims, real-time strategy, and sports. These type of games require fast and precise movements, which a refresh rate and fast response time monitor will put you ahead of your competition.

True Color  
The MSI Esports Gaming Monitor has more gamut coverage compared to general monitors. Gameplay colors and details will look more realistic and refined, to push immersion to its limits.

Tear Free  
Gaming shouldn't be a choice between choppy gameplay or broken frames. With MSI gaming monitors, it doesn't have to be. Get fluid, artifact-free performance at virtually any framerate with AMD FreeSync technology.

Night Vision  
Whether your entire screen is dark, or just a few portions have heavy shadows. Let the world's first smart black tuner brighten your day by bringing out the fine details in dark areas.

From Edge to Edge  
With a super narrow bezel, enjoy the best immersion possible in the latest games with a multi-monitor 180 degree setup. Enjoy better continuity between screens while playing games, working, or general computing.

Anti-Flicker Technology  
Generic monitor displays normally have a flicker-rate of about 200-times per second, which is unnoticeable to the naked eye, but can cause fatigue over time. Certificated by TUV Rheinland, MSI Anti-Flicker technology provides a very comfortable viewing experience by reducing the amount of flicker.

178 Degrees of Wide Viewing Angle  
By having a large viewing angle, MSI gaming monitors has more leeway for placing your monitor in your setup without giving up the optimal viewing experience. Colors and details will stay sharp at more angles compared to other monitors with less viewing angles.

Blue Light Reduction  
Certificated by TUV Rheinland, MSI monitors are optimized to produce less amount of blue light displayed by the monitor, so that you can game for longer periods of time without eye-fatigue.

Short description: Light as a feather, each earbud weighs only 4.6g, making them easy to wear without discomfort. Features one-step pairing for quick connection.
Description:
Product Description

Light as a feather  
A single earbuds weighs only 4.6g. Easy to wear, it will not bring weight to your ears.

One-step pairing  
From the second use, after opening the charging case, the headset and the phone are automatically paired.  
Note: If only one earbud is connected to the phone, please try to put the headset back in the charging case and then take it out again.

Earbuds in multiple sizes  
You can choose the right earbuds according to the size of your ear holes. It will not easy to fall when you exercise. When you wear it for a long time, you will not feel fatigue.

Smart Touch  
The earbuds is equipped with a touch sensor, which makes it more convenient for you to adjust music.

Superior Battery Life  
Playtime for up to 6 hours from single charge and total 48 hours with charging case. Therefore, when you are calling, listening music and watching movie, you could charge your earbuds whenever and wherever you want.

Waterproof  
Sweat and water resistant wireless earbuds. It is a good workout earbuds for you. After you exercise, you can enjoy the music while taking a shower.

• Smart Touch & Waterproof: Simple and convenient control system. Tap once to play/pause music and answer the call, double tap to skip forward/backward, long press to adjust the volume, long press for 2s to refuse to answer. We use nanotechnology to effectively prevent earbuds from being damaged by sweat and rain. It is suitable for sports. You can enjoy wonderful music while exercising and showering.

Short description: Audio-Technica's ATH-ANC9 QuietPoint headphones use proprietary active noise-canceling technology to provide a comfortable listening environment in noisy areas.

Delivering noise cancellation up to a remarkable 95%, the ATH-ANC9 QuietPoint headphones feature Audio-Technica's Tri-Level Cancellation. Name: BEATSSTUDIO BUDS + WIRELESS NOISECANCELING EARBUDS, SILVER
Short description: Beats Studio Buds+ deliver powerful, balanced sound with Active Noise Cancelling (ANC) and Transparency mode. Enjoy high-quality calls and enhanced compatibility with Apple and Android devices.
Description:
Beats Studio Buds + feature powerful, balanced sound, Active Noise Cancelling (ANC), and Transparency mode. Enjoy high-quality calls, enhanced Apple & Android compatibility, up to 36 hours of listening time with charging case and four ear tip options to ensure a comfortable all-day fit.

Sound Quality - Powerful, Balanced Sound  
Beats Studio Buds + deliver rich, immersive sound whether you're listening to music or taking calls. Each bud is equipped with a custom two-layer transducer that flexes to deliver cleaner bass and ultra-low distortion. Three new acoustic vents improve audio precision and gently relieve pressure for a more comfortable all-day fit.

Listening Modes - Active Noise Cancelling  
At the touch of a button, two dynamic listening modes let you choose whether to keep the world out or let it in. Active Noise Cancelling adapts to your personal fit, neutralizing unwanted external noise. With 3x larger microphones, new venting, and a powerful processor, Beats Studio Buds + have up to 1.6x more Active Noise Cancelling power.

Transparency Mode  
Transparency mode blends your listening experience with the world around you. External-facing microphones capture ambient sound to mix in with your music when you need to be aware of your surroundings. Beats Studio Buds + has up to 2x improved Transparency.

Spatial Audio - Surrounds You in Sound  
Beats Studio Buds + support spatial audio for immersive music - delivering a surround sound experience - that you can take anywhere. It's like being surrounded by 64 speakers at once.

Fit - All-Day Comfort  
With four ear tip options (XS, S, M & L) to fit a wider range of ears, Beats Studio Buds + create a comfortable acoustic seal for the best listening experience, securing your earbuds in place.

Battery - More Music, Less Charging  
With up to 36 hours of total listening time from the sleek, pocket-sized charging case, Beats Studio Buds + are ready to go whenever you are. When battery is low, Fast Fuel gives up to 1 hour of playback with a 5-minute charge.

Call Quality - Crystal Clear Calls  
3x larger microphones, powerful ANC, and a voice-targeting algorithm precisely filter background noise for crisp, clear call performance.

Controls - At Your Fingertips  
Simple, customizable on-ear controls allow you to manage music, toggle listening modes, take calls and activate voice assistant using the 'b' button.

Enhanced Apple & Android Compatibility - Easy to Use, Hard to Lose  
Beats Studio Buds + a robust set of native Apple and Android features including: one-touch pairing, automatic switching, 'always on' voice assistance, and 'Find My.'

Native Apple Features:  
• One-touch pairing instantly connects with every device in your iCloud account  
• "Hey Siri" hands-free voice assistant  
• Use the Find My app on your iOS device to locate your lost earbuds on a map based on the last known connected location  
• Receive software updates and new features automatically

Native Android Features:

Name: RTUSIA Small Bluetooth Headphones Wrap Around Head - Sports Wireless Headset with Built in Microphone and Crystal-Clear Sound, Foldable and Carried in The Purse, and 12-Hour Battery Life, Black
Short description: Brand: RTUSIA Color: Black Features: Designed for those who dislike earbuds, it rests outside the ear instead of inside the ear canal. Ergonomic design for comfort. Foldable and portable, with a built-in microphone and crystal-clear sound. Offers up to 12 hours of battery life.

Would not getting ears ore like with earbuds.

• Perfect headphones for running. Run and share trail with other people/bikes. You want to hear them approaching from the back. Name: Bose QuietComfort 45 Wireless Noise Canceling Headphone
Short description: Noise-canceling wireless headphones offering the perfect balance of quiet, comfort, and sound. Tiny microphones measure, compare, and react to outside noise for an immersive listening experience.
Description:
Noise cancelling wireless headphones – The perfect balance of quiet, comfort, and sound. Bose uses tiny mics to measure, compare, and react to outside noise, cancelling it with opposite signals.  
• High-fidelity audio – The TriPort acoustic architecture offers depth and fullness. Volume-optimized Active EQ maintains balanced performance at any volume, so bass stays consistent when turned down and the music remains clear when turned up.  
• Quiet and Aware Modes – Choose Quiet Mode for full noise cancelling, or Aware Mode to bring the outside into the around ear headphones and hear your environment and your music at the same time.  
• Over ear headphones – These comfortable wireless headphones are suitable for all-day wear. Crafted with plush synthetic leather and impact-resistant nylon, and designed with minimal clamping force, they’re as luxurious as they are durable.  
• Up to 24 hours battery life – Enjoy 24 hours of battery life from a single charge. A quick 15-minute charge offers 3 hours when you’re on the go, or plug in the included audio cable to listen for even longer in wired mode.  
• Around ear headphones charge via USB-C – Headphones charge via the included USB-C cable.  
• Bluetooth wireless noise cancelling headphones – These headphones are optimized for a strong, reliable Bluetooth connection within 30 feet of the paired device.  
• Bose Music app – The app walks you through guided setup of your over ear headphones, making it easy to get started. Plus, access adjustable noise cancellation settings, manage your Bluetooth connections, enable shortcuts, and more.

Name: n ATH-SPORT90BT
Short description: Enjoy pure freedom and wireless audio playback with in-ear headphones featuring 8 hours of battery life and 4 GB of built-in USB storage.
Description: Enjoy pure freedom and deviceless audio playback with the ATH-SPORT90BT in-ear headphones. Designed with 8 hours of battery life and 4 GB of built-in USB storage, you can pound the pavements or work through your reps without carrying your smartphone. Featuring high-sensitivity 6 mm drivers, these sports earphones deliver rich sound and crystal-clear audio, providing perfect music playback while you workout.

Name: New Bose QuietComfort Wireless Noise Cancelling Headphones.
Short description: Go beyond the beat and take control of the sound that puts you on top of the world. Experience powerful wireless noise cancelling headphones designed for exceptional comfort and immersive audio.
Description: Go beyond the beat and take control of the sound that puts you on top of the world with Bose QuietComfort Wireless Noise Cancelling Headphones. Experience powerful high-fidelity audio with legendary noise cancellation in these wireless Bluetooth headphones that allow you to block everything out but the beat and control what you hear. These Bose wireless headphones feature new custom modes that give you the power to adjust noise cancellation based in the moment and the option to turn on Wind Block to tune out breezy environments. Or simply toggle your Bose over ear headphones between Quiet and Aware Modes for a quick change when the world calls for it. These Bose wireless headphones come in Black, White Smoke, and a striking limited-edition Cypress Green headphones color option that are as bold as they are iconic. Adjustable EQ puts you in control of tuning your music and Spotify Tap starts your listening session at the push of a button on the side of the over the ear headphones. With up to 24 hours of battery life on a single charge, your Bluetooth headphones are ready for any adventure. Multi-point toggle lets you switch between multiple wireless connections on these around ear headphones without disconnecting and reconnecting each time. Plug in the optional audio cable with in-line microphone into these wireless headphones to make the headphones wired and use without a Bluetooth connection. The Bose Music app guides you through setup, lets you personalize settings, and keeps your headphones’ software up-to-date. Press play and take charge of your music with Bose QuietComfort Noise Cancelling Headphones.

Name: Bose QuietComfort Earbuds - True Wireless Noise Cancelling Earphones, Triple Black (Color:: Triple Black)
Short description: The world’s most effective noise-cancelling earbuds with 11 levels of active noise cancelling, allowing you to enjoy music and podcasts without distractions.
Description:
About this item

The world’s most effective noise cancelling earbuds

• Noise cancelling earbuds: 11 levels of active noise cancelling let you enjoy music, podcasts, & videos without distractions. Transparency mode lets the outside world in for quick conversations.

• Acclaimed Bose sound: Crisp, clear details. Deep, full bass. The innovations in these noise cancelling earphones produce exciting, lifelike sound that’s full and balanced at every volume level.

• Comfortable earbuds: Easy to wear all day long because every surface that touches your ear is made of soft silicone. Includes 3 eartip sizes to help you get the best fit.

• Sweat & weather resistant: These IPX4-rated wireless noise cancelling earbuds are proven to pump out great-sounding music, even when they’re subjected to rain, sleet, hail, snow, or sweat.

• Powerful battery: These wireless earbuds play for up to 6 hours on a single charge. The wireless charging case provides up to 12 more hours battery life — and it’s compatible with any Qi-certified charging mat.

• Simple touch controls: Controlling your earbuds is as easy as tapping and pressing the surface. Double tap the left Earbud for noise cancellation. Double tap the right to pause & play music and swipe up and down for volume control (opt in feature via Bose Music App).

• Built with Bluetooth 5.1: Bluetooth earbuds work within 30 feet of your device. When you’re on calls, the microphone system rejects most of the noise around you. Compatible with iOS and Android.

1_Intro_B

These sleek wireless earbuds are designed with breakthrough acoustic innovations and Bose Acoustic Noise Cancelling technology. Together, they produce crisp, clear audio and rich, deep bass over a bed of virtual silence — so you can hear all kinds of details that typically get lost.

7_Gallery_5_M 7_Gallery_6_M 7_Gallery_1_M 7_Gallery_2_M 7_Gallery_3_M 7_Gallery_4_M

Made from soft silicone, the StayHear Max tips fit comfortably and securely in your ears. The earbuds come with 3 eartip sizes so you can find the fit that’s best for you.

Sweat from an intense workout. Rain from a sudden shower. They might get the earbuds wet, but they won’t dampen your listening experience.

No matter where the day takes you, take these wireless earbuds. From the commute to the café, they create truly compelling audio for music, podcasts, videos and calls.

For times when you need to be aware of your surroundings, these earbuds enable you to control how much—or how little—of the outside world you hear. This handy feature makes it seem as though you’re not wearing headphones at all—perfect for ordering a coffee or making small talk with co-workers.

These earbuds produce deep, low notes and exciting, lifelike sound. Every time you change the volume, the sound is automatically re-calibrated, so it stays consistently balanced.

3_Hot_Spots_K 4_Case_A

This rugged case is designed to travel with you all day long. Its magnetized interior keeps the wireless earbuds securely in place while they charge, and its battery can recharge the earbuds with up to an additional 12 hours of playback time.

To charge the case, use the included cable or a Qi-certified wireless charging mat (not included). The exterior LED lights show the battery status of your charging case. And the instant you open the lid, the earbuds begin pairing with your device.

4_App_A

Just by touching the earbud, you can toggle between three noise cancelling levels, skip tracks, take calls, and more. But for full control of your QuietComfort Earbuds, download the Bose Music App. It lets you customize your noise cancellation favorites, manage your Bluetooth connections, set a shortcut, and much more.

Name: Anker Soundcore Liberty 4 NC Bluetooth In-Ear Headphones - Dark Blue
Short description: Travel comfortably with noise reduction up to 98.5%. Enjoy noise-free travel using an advanced noise-canceling system that effectively detects and cancels ambient sounds.
Description:
Travel Comfortably by Reducing Noise by Up to 98.5%

Enjoy noise-free travel with our cutting-edge noise canceling system that effectively detects and cancels up to 98.5% of outside noise.

Adaptive Active Noise Cancellation 2.0

Personalized noise cancellation that adapts to your ears and environment in real time. Wireless noise canceling headphones feature in-ear and external noise sensors and an artificial intelligence algorithm, allowing you to enjoy maximum silence anytime and anywhere.

Adjustable Environment with 4 Travel Modes

Choose from 5 levels of noise canceling, 2 transparency modes, or 4 noise canceling modes suited to specific modes of travel: Plane, Train, Bus and Taxi.

Continuous Clear Voice

The 11mm drivers are High Definition certified and with LDAC technology, it feels like you're opening up HD for your ears. Test HearID 2.0 to find your perfect EQ profile, mix with fully customizable EQ, or choose from 22 presets to suit your sound.

Ultra Long Battery for Uninterrupted Listening

The music never stops, with 10 hours of playtime and 50 hours with the charging case, plus wireless charging compatibility and a 10-minute quick charge for 4 hours of listening time.

Filled with Easy-to-Use Technology

These wireless noise canceling headphones feature simple technology that anyone can use. Liberty 4 NC offers fast and seamless Bluetooth pairing with Android™ devices, wireless charging, auto play and pause when worn, and multi-point connectivity with Bluetooth 5.3.

Hassle-Free Conversations in Crowded Crowds

6 beamline microphones and an AI algorithm amplify your voice while reducing background noise, so your voice is always heard clearly.

IPX4 Waterproof

Liberty 4 NC wireless noise canceling headphones are durable and can handle sudden situations like a sudden spill of your morning coffee or rain.
