Description: Premium Bluetooth headphones that are designed for superior comfort and the ultimate crystal-clear stereo sound reproduction. They are compatible with mobile devices that support Bluetooth, but also have AUX capability so they can be used with a cable. Onyx's active noise control (ANC) function reduces unwanted ambient noise to improve sound quality when in a louder environment. The volume and track are able to be changed directly from the headphones and they have a microphone that allows the user to receive and make phone calls. They can be recharged from any USB port or a mains adapter and are beautifully presented in an elegant EVA carry case with a Micro-B USB cable, a 3.5 mm AUX cable and an instruction leaflet.

Name: Shure Aonic 50 Wireless Noise Cancelling Headphones SBH2350 Brown (SBH2350-BR-A)
Short description: Wireless noise-cancelling headphones with premium sound quality, engineered from decades of stage and studio experience. Includes a 2-year local Singapore warranty.
Description:
Shure Aonic 50 Wireless Noise Cancelling Headphones SBH2350 Brown (SBH2350-BR-A) - 2 Years Local Singapore Warranty

Engineered from decades of stage and studio experience, the AONIC 50 Wireless Noise Cancelling Headphones deliver premium listening with exceptional comfort and durability. Immerse yourself in an uninterrupted, world-class listening experience wherever you go.

Born in the studio  
Shure provides headphones for the professional audio industry – people who wear headphones all day for a living. So creating comfortable, high-quality headphones with studio-quality sound is in the Shure DNA.

Customize your features  
The ShurePlus™ PLAY app allows you to customize your noise cancellation and Environment Mode levels. Free to download for iOS and Android.

Get comfortable  
Built to withstand the rigors of the road with long-wearing comfort and durability. Folds flat for portability with a protective carrying case.

Eliminate distractions or hear the outside world  
Adjustable noise cancellation to eliminate distractions for a truly immersive listening experience or flip the switch to Environment Mode to hear the outside world.

Key Features  
• Premium, wireless studio-quality sound engineered from decades of professional experience. No cords. No wires. Just pure listening anywhere you go.  
• Adjustable noise cancellation to eliminate distractions for a truly immersive listening experience.  
• Environment mode allows you to hear the outside world with the flip of a switch.  
• Up to 20 hours battery life provides uninterrupted audio wherever you go – on the train, on an airplane, at work or at home.  
• Long-wearing comfort and durability built to withstand the rigors of the road.  
• Folds flat for portability with protective carrying case.  
• Fingertip controls for quick access to answer calls, adjust volume, or pause your music with the push of a button.  
• Bluetooth® 5 wireless technology for enhanced stability and a range of up to 30 feet (10 meters). Pairs with phones, tablets and laptops.  
• Premium headphone amplifier and support for multiple codecs including Qualcomm® aptX™, aptX™ HD, aptX™ Low Latency audio, Sony LDAC, AAC, and SBC.  
• Connect to wired sources with 3.5mm analog audio input to stay connected to any device, including airplane entertainment systems, or USB-C digital input for charging and High-Resolution audio.  
• ShurePlus™ PLAY app allows you to customise your noise cancellation and Environment Mode levels. Free to download for iOS and Android.

Technical Specifications  
Model: SBH2350  
Transducer Type: Dynamic, Neodymium magnet  
Driver Size: 50 mm  
Frequency Response: 20 to 22,000 Hz  
Sensitivity: @ 1 kHz, 97.5 dB/mW  
Impedance: @ 1 kHz 39 Ω  
Maximum Input Power: 100 mW  
Weight: 334 g (11.8 oz.)  
Operating Temperature: 0°C to 45°C (32°F to 113°F)  
Storage Temperature: -10°C to 45°C (14°F to 113°F)  
Antenna Type: Internal Monopole  
Gain: +2.05 dBi  
Operating Frequency: 2402 MHz-2480 MHz  
Modulation Type: FHSS  
RF Output Power: +4 dBm (EIRP)  
Supported Codecs: aptX, aptX HD, aptX Low Latency, SBC, AAC, LDAC

What's Included  
• Shure Aonic 50 Wireless Noise Cancelling Headphones  
• Protective carrying case  
• 3.5mm audio cable  
• USB-C charging cable

Name: Bose QuietComfort 45 noise cancelling (Color:: Black)
Short description: Enhanced Acoustic Noise Cancelling technology uses six discreet microphones to continuously measure, compare, and react to outside noise for superior sound quality.
Description:
About this item

Enhanced Acoustic Noise Cancelling technology uses six discreet microphones to continuously measure, compare and react to outside noise, then cancels it with the opposite signal to minimise distractions. Choose Quiet Mode for full noise cancelling or Aware Mode to hear your environment and your music at the same time. Toggle through the modes with the button on the left earcup.

The new mic system uses four tiny microphones to better focus on your voice, improving audio pickup. Plus a noise-rejecting algorithm filters out environmental sounds for clearer conversations.

24 hours of battery life* lets you keep the music playing even throughout the longest wireless listening sessions. The headphones charge via USB-C.

Optimised for Bluetooth 5.1 for a strong, consistent connection as long as you’re within 9.1 metres of the paired device.

Bose headphones, Quietcomfort 45

The first noise cancelling headphones are back, now with lightweight materials for premium comfort and proprietary acoustic technology for deep, clear audio. They’re not just an icon reborn – they’re the perfect balance of quiet, comfort, and sound.

Comfort

The pair that started it all. More music. And awareness. Longer listening. Everything that made the original headphones an icon is still here – just updated. Like a refined design with smooth cushions and earcup caps crafted from one piece for a clean look. The pair’s plush synthetic leather, impact-resistant glass-filled nylon, and custom cast-metal hinges were all chosen for their comfort and durability. Add in minimal clamping force, and you might even forget you still have them on.

Acoustic Noise Cancelling began with the original QuietComfort headphones from Bose. Tiny mics hidden in the earcups measure, compare, and react to outside noise, then cancel it with the opposite signal. Choose from Quiet Mode for full noise cancelling, or Aware Mode to let your environment in.

Aware Mode brings the outside in. Microphones pick up the sounds around you and play them naturally through the headphones for increased awareness of your surroundings. It’s your music (or messages, or podcasts) and your environment at the same time.

QC45 headphones have more listening time than their predecessor, with up to 25 hours from a single charge. They charge via USB-C in up to 3 hours. In a hurry? Just a 15-minute charge offers up to 2.5 hours of play time. Or plug in the included audio cable and listen for longer in wired mode.

Bose QuietComfort 45 wireless headphone

Bluetooth 5.1 provides a strong, reliable connection to your device within 30 feet. Find guided setup, get tips, and personalize your settings in the app.

Acoustic architecture adds depth and fullness. Volume-optimized Active EQ keeps it all balanced. The hidden mic system focuses on your voice while filtering out environmental sounds.

This pair offers more play time than their predecessor – up to 24 hours from one charge.

Name: Bose QuietComfort SC Wireless Noise Cancelling Headphones - Black
Short description: Legendary noise-cancelling headphones with customizable listening modes, adjustable EQ, and audio cable.
Description:
Bose QuietComfort SC Wireless Noise Cancelling Headphones - Black

Legendary noise cancelling headphones  
Customisable listening modes  
Adjustable EQ  
Audio cable with in-line microphone  
All-day comfort

Take charge of your music and stride along to the beat with Bose QuietComfort SC Headphones. High-fidelity audio and legendary noise cancellation allow you to block out the noise or let the world in by toggling between Quiet and Aware Modes. Or create a new custom mode and adjust outside sound so it fits the moment. These over-ear noise cancelling headphones come in an iconic, comfortable design, include a soft yet protective carry case and offer an optional audio cable with an in-line microphone to plug you into sound as bold as you (even without a Bluetooth connection).

Control the sound  
Take charge of what you hear and what you don’t. These wireless headphones come with legendary noise cancelling technology that works its magic by sealing you in with high-fidelity audio, eliminating distractions, and letting you dive deep into your own rhythm.

Own the beat, drop the bass  
Control the music from your Bluetooth headphones as you please with the Bose app. Adjustable EQ allows you to crank the bass, tweak the treble and balance the mid-range to get the sound that best suits you. You can also manage your Bluetooth connections, change your VPA, check your battery life, adjust your noise cancelling presets and more. Plug in the included audio cable for headphones wired to bold sound, even when there’s no Bluetooth connection.

Modes for any musical moment  
You decide how much of the outside world you let in. These over-ear headphones come equipped with Quiet and Aware Modes that let you toggle between full noise cancelling or full awareness of your surroundings. Or better yet, create your own custom mode and have the power to adjust the noise cancellation as you see fit, add Wind Block to tune out breezy environments and revisit the custom setting at any time.

Power up your sound  
QuietComfort SC noise cancelling headphones are ready for even your marathon playlists, with up to 24 hours on a single charge using a USB-C. A quick, 15-minute boost gives your Bluetooth headphones up to 2.5 hours of play time.

Premium materials. Bold design  
Iconic, comfortable design gives you a fashionable look you can rock all day and night. The plush ear cushions are perfect for long listening sessions, and the secure yet comfortable headband uses steel in just the right places to optimise both strength and feel. The underside of the band uses soft protein-leather-covered foam to rest your over-ear headphones gently on your head.

Bose SimpleSync  
With Bose SimpleSync technology, you can pair your Bose QuietComfort SC noise cancelling headphones with select Bose smart soundbars and speakers for a personal TV listening experience. Independent volume controls allow you to lower or mute your soundbar while keeping your Bluetooth headphones as loud as you like. Away from your phone? No app, no problem. Press and hold the Bluetooth button on each device to group and sync their sound. You can now also connect to a pre-existing group or smart device at a moment’s notice by pressing the Action button on the connecting device.

Browse music without touching your phone  
Spotify Tap gives Spotify users the power to access their music at the press of a button. Press and hold the “Action” button on the left earcup of your around-ear headphones to start your listening session and press down again for Spotify to offer up recommendations for other music you might like. Set your shortcut to “Spotify” in the Bose app to enable this feature.

Hands-free, hassle-free switching  
Bluetooth Multipoint offers seamless, uninterrupted listening. Switch between your phone, your laptop, and other devices with ease — all without missing a moment.

Brand: Siindoo  
Color: Silver  
Features:  
• 【Active Noise Cancelling Technology】 Siindoo Bluetooth headphones with advanced noise cancellation technology can detect and reduces a wider range of low and mid-frequency noises. Switch quickly to Ambient Mode via the ANC button on the right earcup and let in outside sound to be more aware of your environment such as city traffic, airplane engines and busy office. You can immerse yourself into your ideal music without interruptions.  
• 【Hi-Fi Sounds, Deep Bass】 In superb silence, the Siindoo wireless 5.3 headphones surrounds you with the deepest bass and hits you with the highest highs thanks to the powerful 40mm drivers. Call, track change, and volume controls are conveniently located with easy-to-use tactile buttons. You can also make clear hands-free calls thanks to the built-in noise suppression mic.  
• 【30 Hours Playtime & Fast Charging】 Up to 35 hours of non-stop playtime, over the ear headphones support Type-C charge. A single charge gives you enough juice to listen to over 600 songs or soundtrack multiple long haul flights. You can also plug in 3.5 mm stereo audio cable to prolong using time when battery is low. Don't need to worry the power running out problem, it is absolutely the best partner for your long travel.  
• 【Wireless Connection】 Latest BT5.3 ensures an ultra-fast and virtually unbreakable connection up to 33 feet (10 meters). Siindoo wireless noise cancelling headphones are compatible with all devices that support wireless or 3.5 mm plug cables. Such as iPhone, iPad, laptops, Televisions, computers, smartphones, and more.  
• 【All-day Comfort & Adjustable Design】 The ultra-soft protein leather earcups with memory foam padding, adjustable headband and the 90° rotating earcups, makes it easy to adjust the Bluetooth headphones to fit the shape of your head for all-day comfort.

Name: Sony WH-ULT900 BC Noise Cancelling Headphones, Black
Short description: Featuring powerful bass, exceptional clarity, and advanced noise cancelling, experience high-quality sound wherever you go.
Description: Introducing ULT WEAR: Featuring huge, powerful bass, next-level clarity, and seriously impressive noise cancelling, take the ULT POWER SOUND experience, wherever you go. At the tap of the ULT button, these headphones offer two unique sound settings to deliver exhilarating audio experiences for the power sound obsessives: Deep Bass, which adds huge resonating depth to the lower frequencies, and Attack Bass, bringing impressive drive and energy to the music. And thanks to its Noise Cancelling and Ambient Sound modes, you can use the ULT WEAR however you want, wherever you are. The battery life is impressive. Even with noise cancelling on, you can keep the beats playing for 30 hours straight, and since ULT WEAR are designed to be seriously comfy, you can keep even the longest playlists going without compromise. Hands-free calls are clear and easy to understand, even when you’re surrounded by noise. You can even connect ULT WEAR to two devices at the same time using the Multipoint Connection. So, if you’re listening to music on your laptop and then get a call on your phone, the sound will switch over automatically without needing to push a button. With unrivalled power and breath-taking detail, ULT WEAR deliver the ULT POWER SOUND experience, perfect for the bass obsessives.

Short description: The NVIDIA Quadro FX 5500 surpasses performance limits in CAD, DCC, and visualization applications. It features a new graphics architecture engineered for enhanced efficiency and power.
Description: The NVIDIA Quadro FX 5500 surpasses the performance limits facing CAD, DCC, and visualization applications. Designed with a new graphics architecture engineered to address the most demanding challenges, NVIDIA Quadro FX 5500 delivers 33.6 GB/sec. memory bandwidth and a 256-bit memory interface with support for 1024 MB of ultra-fast GDDR2 memory. Name: NVIDIA ASUS GeForce RTX 4070 Dual OC Graphics Card
Short description: Based on the Ada Lovelace architecture, this graphics card is designed to handle demanding graphics tasks with advanced performance and efficiency. It features dual fans for effective cooling and comes with a local warranty.
Description:
NVIDIA ASUS GeForce RTX 4070 Dual OC Graphics Card (DUAL-RTX4070-O12G) - Local Warranty

Based on the Ada Lovelace architecture and designed to handle the graphical demands of 4K gaming and 1440p at high frame rates, the ASUS GeForce RTX 4070 Dual OC Graphics Card brings the power of real-time ray tracing and AI to your PC games. The GPU features 12 GB of GDDR6X VRAM and a 192-bit memory interface, offering improved performance and power efficiency over the previous Ampere-based generation.

The front panel of the card features a variety of outputs, such as DisplayPort 1.4a and HDMI 2.1. HDMI 2.1 supports up to 48 Gb/s bandwidth and a range of higher resolutions and refresh rates, including 8K @ 60 fps, 4K @ 120 fps, and even up to 10K.

The RTX 4070 is not just about high-resolution gaming. Computationally intensive programs can utilize the GPU's cores to accelerate tasks using CUDA and other APIs.

For cooling, ASUS implemented dual Axial-tech fans, providing improved airflow and dispersion.

• NVIDIA Ada Lovelace Architecture

WINDFORCE COOLING SYSTEM  

The WINDFORCE cooling system features three 80mm unique blade fans, alternate spinning, 4 composite copper heat pipes directly touch the GPU, 3D active fans and Screen cooling, which together provide high efficiency heat dissipation.  

SCREEN COOLING  

Extended heatsink design allows air flow to pass through, providing better heat dissipation.  

HEAT PIPES DIRECT TOUCH  

The shape of the pure copper heat pipe maximizes the direct contact area with the GPU. The heat pipe also covers the VRAM through a metal plate contact to ensure proper cooling.  

RGB FUSION  

With 16.7M customizable color options and numerous lighting effects, you can choose any lighting effect or synchronize with other devices in GIGABYTE CONTROL CENTER.  

PROTECTION METAL BACK PLATE  

The metal back plate not only provides an aesthetical shape, but also enhances the structure of the graphics card to provide complete protection.  

DUAL BIOS  

The factory default setting is OC mode, which provides users with the best performance. However, switching to silent mode will enjoy a quieter experience.  

POWER INDICATOR  

When experiencing any power supply abnormality, the indicator will alert gamers by flashing light.

Core Clock

• 1830 MHz (Reference Card: 1770 MHz)  

WINDFORCE 3X COOLING SYSTEM

The WINDFORCE 3X cooling system features two 90mm and one 80mm unique blade fans, alternate spinning, 7 composite copper heat pipes, a large copper plate direct touches the GPU, 3D active fans and Screen cooling, which together provide high efficiency heat dissipation.

ALTERNATE SPINNING

Alternate Spinning can reduce the turbulence of adjacent fans and increase air pressure.

SMOOTH AIRFLOW

GIGABYTE turns the adjacent fans in the opposite direction, so that the airflow direction between the two fans is the same, reducing the turbulence and enhancing the airflow pressure.

3D ACTIVE FAN

3070 TI GAMING OC 3D Active Fan provides semi-passive cooling, and the fans will remain off when the GPU is in a low load or low power game.

The Barco MXRT-4700 graphics card packs all the power expected from larger display controllers into a compact package capable of delivering seamless performance whether reading at the hospital or from home. With 4GB of graphics memory driving three DisplayPort 1.4 outputs, it is the ideal solution for those looking for a no-compromise, reliable professional graphics card versatile enough to drive larger resolution displays. Accelerate your workflow application responsiveness with 512 stream processors and enable more efficient data transfers between the GPU and CPU with PCIe® 3.0 support. Key features include 3 ports to cover most basic display configurations, increased memory for larger PACS data loading, EDID emulation for multiworkstation configurations, and 30-bit color depth support in a low power, compact form factor.

Let your little one browse and play games safely with the Fire 7 Kids 16 GB Tablet with 7-in. Display. Let your little one browse and play games safely with the Fire 7 Kids 16 GB Tablet with 7-in. School-age kids will enjoy a 1-year subscription to Kids+ that unlocks over 20,000 apps, games, books, videos, songs, and Audible books. Subscription automatically renews monthly, starting at $2.99/month plus tax (may be canceled at any time through Parent Dashboard). Easy-to-use Parent Dashboard allows you to filter content based on child's age, set educational goals and time limits, and grant access to additional content from Netflix, Disney+, and Zoom. Name: Amazon Fire 7 Kids Edition Tablet, 7" Display, 8 GB, + Kid-Proof Case - Blue
Short description: The tablet features Amazon FreeTime with kid-friendly navigation and personalized child profiles. Parents can easily switch between Amazon FreeTime and their own profiles.
Description:
Fire Kids Edition Tablet has Amazon FreeTime with kid-friendly navigation and personalized child profiles. Parents can switch between Amazon FreeTime and their profile with a password to access the full-featured Fire tablet experience as needed.

Designed with kids in mind  
Fire Kids Tablet has Amazon FreeTime, which is built from the ground up just for kids. The background color and fonts change to a kid-friendly design, they only see the titles that they have access to see, the home screen carousel shows their recently viewed titles, and they can even navigate visually to content based on characters or topics—for example "Elmo," "Dinosaurs," or "Puppies."

Profile for kids  
Parents can create up to four individual child profiles and choose titles from their own collection of content that they want to give each of their kids access to. It's like giving each kid their very own, personalized tablet. A child’s profile does not have access to the Fire built-in web browser, in-app purchases, email, or social media features.

Profile for parents  
Parents can take Fire Kids Tablet out of Amazon FreeTime using a password. Fine tune settings, download apps, or share kids’ drawings with family on Facebook. You can choose specific books, videos, and apps for your child to see in Amazon FreeTime from your library.

Charge time Fully charges in approximately 4 hours using the micro-USB power adapter included in the box.  
Processor MediaTek 8163  
Wi-Fi connectivity Single-antenna dual-band Wi-Fi. Supports public and private Wi-Fi networks or hotspots that use the dual-band 802.11a, 802.11b, 802.11g, or 802.11n standard with support for WEP, WPA, and WPA2 security using password authentication; does not support connecting to ad-hoc (or peer-to-peer) Wi-Fi networks.

(Captions are not available for all content.) Learn more

Name: Zebra ET4X Rugged Tablet 10.1" WXGA (ET40AB-001C1B0-A6)
Short description: 1 Year local warranty. Designed for workers inside your facilities, the ET40 features Wi-Fi 6 wireless connectivity for reliable performance.
Description:
Zebra ET4X Rugged Tablet 10.1" WXGA (ET40AB-001C1B0-A6) - 1 Year Local Warranty

FOR WORKERS INSIDE YOUR FACILITIES

The ET40 with Wi-Fi 6 wireless connectivity is ideal for workers who spend their shifts inside your facility. In retail, associates can scan a barcode to look up price, inventory availability and related items for cross selling; help customers make buying decisions with assisted selling; line bust with mobile point of sale solutions; and more. Restaurant wait staff can use the ET40 to take orders, show guests photos of menu items to help upsell everything from appetisers to dessert, monitor when orders are ready for pickup and take payment at the end of the meal. Supervisors can easily delegate tasks and monitor task execution. And staff members with an ET40 or other Zebra device can easily collaborate with instant push-to-talk and secure text messaging via Zebra's optional Workforce Connect PTT Pro.

Features

• The convenient slate design offers portability and productivity simultaneously  
• 2.20 GHz processor and 4 GB memory deliver a powerful tablet performance; allows rapid switching between apps, smooth gaming experience, and effortless web browsing  
• 25.7 cm (10.1") screen allows a great view of movies and TV shows and yet is small enough to easily carry

Name: SAMSUNG Galaxy Tab S8 Android Tablet, 11 inch LCD Screen, 256GB Storage (Color: Pink Gold)
Short description: Meet a top-of-the-line tablet designed to help you get more out of your day, wherever you are. Take video calls for work, enjoy entertainment, and stay productive with an 11-inch LCD screen and 256GB of storage. Available in Pink Gold.
Description: Meet SAMSUNG Galaxy Tab S8, a top-of-the-line tablet designed to help you get more out of your day, wherever you happen to be. Take that video call for work at a coffee shop. Lose yourself in your favorite music videos at the park. Whatever you’re doing, make the day yours with an impressive but surprisingly portable 11" LCD display that’s easy on the eyes, giving you plenty of space to get things done no matter where you are. The large screen also levels up your video call experience, so you can feel closer to whoever you’re speaking to; and an ultra-wide camera with auto framing and auto zoom keeps the spotlight on you. Power through your day like never before with an updated Qualcomm Snapdragon chipset processor that packs one of Galaxy’s most powerful performances yet. And keep going strong all day long with a long-life battery that’s all that, plus some. We also reduced the latency on S Pen so it feels faster, making it feel more like a real pen in your hands, so you can write and sketch your heart out. Convert your handwriting to text automatically with Samsung Notes, a note-taking app that keeps your notes in sync with your phone, thanks to seamless Galaxy connectivity. Samsung Kids offers a library of fun games, books, and videos that are safe, kid friendly, and parent approved. Smart Switch helps you safely move files from your new Galaxy Tab S8, no matter what operating system you’re switching from. Expand your storage up to 1 TB with a microSD card***. Galaxy Tab S8 helps you crush the day. *Wi-Fi 6E enabled router required. Sold separately. **When using the included cable. Battery life may vary depending on usage patterns and other factors. ***MicroSD card sold separately.

QUICK RESUME: The new Quick Resume feature lets you continue multiple games from a suspended state almost instantly, returning you to where you were and what you were doing, without waiting through long loading screens.

Name: PlayStation®5 Console PS5
Short description: Stunning games with incredible graphics and new features. Experience breathtaking immersion for a deeper gaming experience.
Description:
Stunning Games - Marvel at incredible graphics and experience new PlayStation®5 Console PS5 features.  
Breathtaking Immersion - Discover a deeper gaming experience with support for haptic feedback, adaptive triggers, and 3D Audio technology.  
Lightning Speed - Harness the power of a custom CPU, GPU, and SSD with Integrated I/O that rewrite the rules of what a PlayStation®5 Console PS5.  

The PlayStation®5 (PS5) Console is the next-generation gaming system from Sony, offering cutting-edge technology, breathtaking graphics, and an immersive gaming experience like never before. With its lightning-fast load times, haptic feedback, adaptive triggers, and 3D audio, the PS5 brings games to life in ways that redefine what’s possible in console gaming. Whether you’re diving into the latest blockbuster titles or exploring innovative indie games, the PS5 is built to deliver.  

Key Features:  
• Ultra-High-Speed SSD: Experience near-instant load times for installed PS5 games with the custom SSD and integrated I/O that allow for quick loading of expansive game worlds.  
• Stunning 4K Graphics: Play games in dynamic 4K with HDR technology, delivering vivid colors, sharp details, and breathtaking visuals.  
• Ray Tracing: Realistic lighting, shadows, and reflections for more immersive and true-to-life gaming environments.  
• Haptic Feedback and Adaptive Triggers: The DualSense™ wireless controller offers immersive tactile feedback and dynamic trigger resistance, allowing you to feel the action in your hands.  
• 3D Audio Technology: Immerse yourself in soundscapes where audio feels as though it’s coming from every direction, putting you right in the heart of the game.  
• Backward Compatibility: Play a vast library of PS4™ games on your PS5 console with enhanced performance and smoother gameplay.  
• Ultra HD Blu-ray Disc Drive: Watch your favorite 4K UHD movies and enjoy physical copies of your favorite games with the built-in disc drive.  
• Game Boost: Enhanced frame rates on select PS4 games deliver smoother gameplay on the PS5.  

The PS5 console unleashes new gaming possibilities that you never anticipated. Experience lightning fast loading with an ultra-high speed SSD, deeper immersion with support for haptic feedback, adaptive triggers, and 3D Audio, and an all-new generation of incredible PlayStation games.

Name: Playstation 5 Access Controller
Short description: Create new ways to play with this highly customizable controller kit for PS5 consoles, designed to help those with disabilities enjoy games more comfortably.
Description:
Create new ways to play with this highly customizable controller kit for PS5 consoles, designed to help those with disabilities play games more comfortably, for longer.  
Configure the Access controller's button layout to suit your range of mobility and switch between the included stick caps to find the shape and texture that works best for you.  
Lengthen or shorten the control stick’s extension arm, then lock it down at your ideal length for comfort and convenience.  
Place the controller wherever play is most comfortable for you: from any 360° orientation, on different flat surfaces, a wheelchair tray, or attached to an AMPS pattern mount*.  
Use up to two Access controllers together or combine one or two Access controllers with a DualSense or DualSense Edge wireless controller to add features like haptic feedback, adaptive trigger, motion sensor, and touch pad swipe to your setup.  
Connect additional buttons, specialty trigger switches and other compatible accessories via the Access controller's four industry standard 3.5mm expansion ports, and configure their inputs via your PS5 console settings.  
Configure up to 30 individual control profiles from your PS5 console settings, store three profiles on the Access controller and quickly switch between them with a dedicated button, enabling you to use the most suitable control layout and button functions for what’s happening in-game.  
Map button inputs so the commands you need are exactly where you want them, set button presses to toggle commands on/off or to serve as a single-press input, or disable buttons altogether to stop accidental pressing. You can even map two commands to a single button for more user-friendly play.

Name: NEOGEO MINI international Game console SNK NEO GEO Pro Gear Spec Black ver.
Short description: The original and iconic arcade console returns! To celebrate 40 years of gaming, SNK presents the NEOGEO Mini, a portable arcade console.
Description:
The original and arguably greatest arcade console is back! To celebrate 40 years of gaming, SNK are proud to present the NEOGEO Mini, a portable arcade console with 40 classic NEOGEO games from legendary franchises such as King of Fighters, Metal Slug, Fatal Fury and many more. Featuring a 3.5 inch display and classic arcade stick controls, the NEOGEO mini delivers an authentic arcade experience in the palm of your hand. Measuring at 152 mm x 135 mm x 108 mm, connect the NEOGEO to any portable power bank using the included type C cable and enjoy portable arcade quality gaming on the go. Once home, you can continue the action on your big screen. NEOGEO features HDMI output (HDMI Cable not included) to allow you to connect your console to your TV or monitor. You can even connect up to two additional controllers (sold separately) to enjoy home console style multiplayer action. NEOGEO – the legacy lives on.

Includes 40 Classic SNK NEOGEO games:  
• Metal Slug  
• Metal Slug 2  
• Metal Slug 3
